                      other Organisation which is a Payment Handler
                      for the IOTP Transaction
                    o DeliveryHandler. The person or Organisation
                      that is the delivering the goods or services
                      for the IOTP Transaction
                    o DelivTo. The person or Organisation that is
                      receiving the delivery of goods or services in
                      the IOTP Transaction
                    o CustCare. The Organisation and/or individual
                      who will provide customer care for an IOTP
                      Transaction.
Values of TradingRole are controlled under the procedures defined in section 12 IANA Considerations which also allows user defined values to be defined.
contents.zh-CHS: TradingRole的值根据第12节IANA注意事项中定义的程序进行控制，该节还允许定义用户定义的值。

contents.text: IotpMsgIdPrefix Contains the prefix which must be used for all IOTP Messages sent by the Trading Role in this IOTP Transaction. The values to be used are defined in 3.4.1 IOTP Message ID Attribute Definition.
contents.zh-CHS: IotpMsgIdPrefix包含必须用于此IOTP交易中交易角色发送的所有IOTP消息的前缀。要使用的值在3.4.1 IOTP消息ID属性定义中定义。

contents.text: CancelNetLocn This contains the net location of where the Consumer should go to if the Consumer cancels the transaction for some reason. It can be used by the Trading Role to provide a response which is more tailored to the circumstances of a particular transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: CancelNetLocn This contains the net location of where the Consumer should go to if the Consumer cancels the transaction for some reason. It can be used by the Trading Role to provide a response which is more tailored to the circumstances of a particular transaction.translate error, please retry

contents.text: This attribute: o must not be present when TradingRole is set to Consumer role or DelivTo,
contents.zh-CHS: 当TradingRole设置为Consumer role或DeliverTo时，此属性：o不得存在，

contents.text: o must be present when TradingRole is set to Merchant, PaymentHandler or DeliveryHandler.
contents.zh-CHS: o TradingRole设置为Merchant、PaymentHandler或DeliveryHandler时必须存在。

contents.text: The content of this attribute is dependent on the Transport Mechanism see the Transport Mechanism Supplement.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性的内容取决于传输机制，请参见传输机制补充。

contents.text: ErrorNetLocn This contains the net location that should be displayed by the Consumer after the Consumer has either received or generated an Error Block containing an Error Component with the Severity attribute set to either: o HardError, o Warning but the Consumer decides to not continue with the transaction o TransientError and the transaction has subsequently timed out.
contents.zh-CHS: ErrorNetLocn这包含使用者在收到或生成包含错误组件的错误块（严重性属性设置为：o HardError，o警告，但消费者决定不继续交易o TransientError，交易随后已超时。

contents.text: See section 7.21.1 Error Processing Guidelines for more details.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关更多详细信息，请参阅第7.21.1节错误处理指南。

contents.text: This attribute: o must not be present when TradingRole is set to Consumer or DelivTo, o must be present when TradingRole is set to Merchant, PaymentHandler or DeliveryHandler.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性：当TradingRole设置为Consumer或Deliverto时，o不得存在；当TradingRole设置为Merchant、PaymentHandler或DeliveryHandler时，o必须存在。

contents.text: The content of this attribute is dependent on the Transport Mechanism see the Transport Mechanism Supplement.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性的内容取决于传输机制，请参见传输机制补充。

contents.text: ErrorLogNetLocn Optional. This contains the net location that Consumers should send IOTP Messages that contain Error Blocks with an Error Component with the Severity attribute set to either: o HardError, o Warning but the Consumer decides to not continue with the transaction o TransientError and the transaction has subsequently timed out.
contents.zh-CHS: ErrorLogNetLocn可选。这包含使用者应发送IOTP消息的净位置，该消息包含错误块，错误组件的严重性属性设置为：o HardError，o Warning，但使用者决定不继续事务o TransientError，事务随后已超时。

contents.text: This attribute: o must not be present when TradingRole is set to Consumer role,
contents.zh-CHS: 当TradingRole设置为Consumer role时，此属性：o不能存在，

contents.text: o must be present when TradingRole is set to Merchant, PaymentHandler or DeliveryHandler.
contents.zh-CHS: o TradingRole设置为Merchant、PaymentHandler或DeliveryHandler时必须存在。

contents.text: The content of this attribute is dependent on the Transport Mechanism see the Transport Mechanism Supplement.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性的内容取决于传输机制，请参见传输机制补充。

contents.text: The ErrorLogNetLocn can be used to send error messages to the software company or some other Organisation responsible for fixing problems in the software which sent the incoming message. See section 7.21.1 Error Processing Guidelines for more details.
contents.zh-CHS: ErrorLogNetLocn可用于向软件公司或负责修复发送传入消息的软件中的问题的其他组织发送错误消息。有关更多详细信息，请参阅第7.21.1节错误处理指南。

contents.text: 7.6.3 Contact Information Element
contents.zh-CHS: 7.6.3 联系信息元素

contents.text: This contains information which can be used to contact an Organisation or an individual. All attributes are optional however at least one item of contact information should be present. Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 其中包含可用于联系组织或个人的信息。所有属性都是可选的，但至少应显示一项联系人信息。其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT ContactInfo EMPTY >
<!ATTLIST ContactInfo
 xml:lang           NMTOKEN #IMPLIED
 Tel                CDATA   #IMPLIED
 Fax                CDATA   #IMPLIED
 Email              CDATA   #IMPLIED
 NetLocn            CDATA   #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: xml:lang Defines the language used by attributes within this element. See section 3.8 Identifying Languages.
contents.zh-CHS: xml:lang定义此元素中的属性所使用的语言。参见第3.8节识别语言。

contents.text: Tel A telephone number by which the Organisation may be contacted. Note that this is a text field and no validation is carried out on it.
contents.zh-CHS: 电话：联系该组织的电话号码。请注意，这是一个文本字段，没有对其进行验证。

contents.text: Fax A fax number by which the Organisation may be contacted. Note that this is a text field and no validation is carried out on it.
contents.zh-CHS: 传真一个可以联系组织的传真号码。请注意，这是一个文本字段，没有对其进行验证。

contents.text: Email An email address by which the Organisation may be contacted. Note that this field should conform to the conventions for address specifications contained in [RFC822].
contents.zh-CHS: 电子邮件联系组织的电子邮件地址。请注意，此字段应符合[RFC822]中包含的地址规范的约定。

contents.text: NetLocn A location on the Internet by which information about the Organisation may be obtained that can be displayed using a web browser.
contents.zh-CHS: NetLocn互联网上的一个位置，通过该位置可以获得有关组织的信息，并可使用web浏览器显示。

contents.text: The content of this attribute must conform to [RFC1738].
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性的内容必须符合[RFC1738]。

contents.text: 7.6.4 Person Name Element
contents.zh-CHS: 7.6.4 人名元素

contents.text: This contains the name of an individual person. All fields are optional however as a minimum either the GivenName or the FamilyName should be present. Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 其中包含个人的姓名。所有字段都是可选的，但至少应显示GivenName或FamilyName。其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT PersonName EMPTY >
<!ATTLIST PersonName
 xml:lang           NMTOKEN #IMPLIED
 Title              CDATA   #IMPLIED
 GivenName          CDATA   #IMPLIED
 Initials           CDATA   #IMPLIED
 FamilyName         CDATA   #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: xml:lang Defines the language used by attributes within this element. See section 3.8 Identifying Languages.
contents.zh-CHS: xml:lang定义此元素中的属性所使用的语言。参见第3.8节识别语言。

contents.text: Title A distinctive name; personal appellation, hereditary or not, denoting or implying office (e.g., judge, mayor) or nobility (e.g., duke, duchess, earl), or used in addressing or referring to a person (e.g., Mr, Mrs, Miss)
contents.zh-CHS: 标题：一个独特的名称；个人称谓，世袭与否，表示或暗示职务（如法官、市长）或贵族（如公爵、公爵夫人、伯爵），或用于称呼或指代某人（如先生、夫人、小姐）

contents.text: GivenName The primary or main name by which a person is known amongst and identified by their family, friends and acquaintances. Otherwise known as first name or Christian Name.
contents.zh-CHS: 给名字一个人的主要或主要名字，通过这个名字，一个人在他的家人、朋友和熟人中被认识并被识别。另称为名或教名。

contents.text: Initials The first letter of the secondary names (other than the Given Name) by which a person is known amongst or identified by their family, friends and acquaintances.
contents.zh-CHS: 姓名首字母是次要姓名的第一个字母（姓名除外），家人、朋友和熟人通过该字母认识或识别某个人。

contents.text: FamilyName The name by which family of related individuals are known. It is typically the part of an individual's name which is passed on by parents to their children.
contents.zh-CHS: FamilyName了解相关个人家庭的名称。它通常是个人名字中父母传给子女的部分。

contents.text: 7.6.5 Postal Address Element
contents.zh-CHS: 7.6.5 邮政地址元素

contents.text: This contains an address which can be used, for example, for the physical delivery of goods, services or letters. Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 其中包含一个地址，可用于实际交付货物、服务或信件。其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT PostalAddress EMPTY >
<!ATTLIST PostalAddress
 xml:lang           NMTOKEN #IMPLIED
 AddressLine1       CDATA   #IMPLIED
 AddressLine2       CDATA   #IMPLIED
 CityOrTown         CDATA   #IMPLIED
 StateOrRegion      CDATA   #IMPLIED
 PostalCode         CDATA   #IMPLIED
 Country            CDATA   #IMPLIED
 LegalLocation (True | False) 'False' >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: xml:lang Defines the language used by attributes within this element. See section 3.8 Identifying Languages.
contents.zh-CHS: xml:lang定义此元素中的属性所使用的语言。参见第3.8节识别语言。

contents.text: AddressLine1 The first line of a postal address. e.g., "The Meadows"
contents.zh-CHS: AddressLine1邮政地址的第一行。e、 g.“草地”

contents.text: AddressLine2 The second line of a postal address. e.g., "Sandy Lane"
contents.zh-CHS: AddressLine2邮政地址的第二行。e、 g.“沙巷”

contents.text: CityOrTown The city of town of the address. e.g., "Carpham"
contents.zh-CHS: CityOrTown地址所在的城市。e、 g.“卡帕姆”

contents.text: StateOrRegion The state or region within a country where the city or town is placed. e.g., "Surrey"
contents.zh-CHS: 州或地区城市或城镇所在的国家或地区。e、 g.“萨里”

contents.text: PostalCode The code known as, for example a post code or zip code, that is typically used by Postal Organisations to organise postal deliveries into efficient sequences. e.g., "KT22 1AA"
contents.zh-CHS: 邮政编码（PostalCode）：邮政组织通常使用的一种代码，例如邮政编码或邮政编码，用于将邮件传递组织成有效的序列。e、 g.，“KT22 1AA”

contents.text: Country The country for the address. e.g., "UK"
contents.zh-CHS: 国家地址的国家。e、 g.“英国”

contents.text: LegalLocation This identifies whether the address is the Registered Address for the Organisation. At least one address for the Organisation must have a value set to True unless the Trading Role is either Consumer or DeliverTo.
contents.zh-CHS: LegalLocation标识该地址是否为组织的注册地址。组织的至少一个地址的值必须设置为True，除非交易角色是消费者或发货人。

contents.text: 7.7 Brand List Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.7 品牌列表组件

contents.text: Brand List Components are contained within the Trading Protocol Options Block (see section 8.1) of the IOTP Transaction. They contains lists of:
contents.zh-CHS: 品牌列表组件包含在IOTP交易的交易协议选项块（见第8.1节）中。它们包含以下内容的列表：

contents.text: o payment Brands (see also section 11.1 Brand Definitions and Brand Selection),
contents.zh-CHS: o 支付品牌（另见第11.1节品牌定义和品牌选择），

contents.text: o amounts to be paid in the currencies that are accepted or offered by the Merchant,
contents.zh-CHS: o 以商户接受或提供的货币支付的金额，

contents.text: o the payment protocols which can be used to make payments with a Brand, and
contents.zh-CHS: o 可用于使用品牌进行支付的支付协议，以及

contents.text: o the net locations of the Payment Handlers which accept payment for a payment protocol
contents.zh-CHS: o 接受支付协议支付的支付处理程序的净位置

contents.text: The definition of a Brand List Component is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 品牌列表组件的定义如下所示。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT BrandList (Brand+, ProtocolAmount+,
 CurrencyAmount+, PayProtocol+) >
<!ATTLIST BrandList
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED
 xml:lang           NMTOKEN #REQUIRED
 ShortDesc          CDATA   #REQUIRED
 PayDirection (Debit | Credit) #REQUIRED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Brand List Component within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP事务中品牌列表组件的标识符。

contents.text: xml:lang Defines the language used by attributes or child elements within this component, unless overridden by an xml:lang attribute on a child element. See section 3.8 Identifying Languages.
contents.zh-CHS: xml:lang定义此组件中的属性或子元素所使用的语言，除非被子元素上的xml:lang属性覆盖。参见第3.8节识别语言。

contents.text: ShortDesc A text description in the language defined by xml:Lang giving details of the purpose of the Brand List. This information must be displayed to the receiver of the Brand List in order to assist with making the selection. It is of particular benefit in allowing a Consumer to distinguish the purpose of a Brand List when an IOTP Transaction involves more than one payment.
contents.zh-CHS: ShortDesc：用xml:Lang定义的语言进行的文本描述，详细说明品牌列表的用途。此信息必须显示给品牌列表的接收者，以帮助进行选择。当IOTP交易涉及多个付款时，允许消费者区分品牌列表的目的尤其有益。

contents.text: PayDirection Indicates the direction in which the payment for which a Brand is being selected is to be made. Its values may be: o Debit The sender of the Payment Request Block (e.g., the Consumer) to which this Brand List relates will make the payment to the Payment Handler, or o Credit The sender of the Payment Request Block to which this Brand List relates will receive a payment from the Payment Handler.
contents.zh-CHS: PayDirection表示选择品牌的付款方向。其值可以是：o借记与该品牌列表相关的支付请求块的发送者（例如消费者）将向支付处理程序付款，或o贷记与该品牌列表相关的支付请求块的发送者将从支付处理程序收到付款。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: Brand This describes a Brand. The sequence of the Brand elements (see section 7.7.1) within the Brand List does not indicate any preference. It is recommended that software which processes this Brand List presents Brands in a sequence which the receiver of the Brand List prefers.
contents.zh-CHS: 品牌这描述了一个品牌。品牌列表中品牌元素的顺序（见第7.7.1节）不表示任何偏好。建议处理此品牌列表的软件按照品牌列表接收者喜欢的顺序呈现品牌。

contents.text: ProtocolAmount This links a particular Brand to: o the currencies and amounts in CurrencyAmount elements that can be used with the Brand, and o the Payment Protocols and Payment Handlers, which can be used with those currencies and amounts, and a particular Brand
contents.zh-CHS: ProtocolAmount将特定品牌链接到：o可用于品牌的货币和货币金额元素，o可用于这些货币和金额的支付协议和支付处理程序，以及特定品牌

contents.text: CurrencyAmount This contains a currency code and an amount.
contents.zh-CHS: CurrencyAmount包含货币代码和金额。

contents.text: PayProtocol This contains information about a Payment Protocol and the Payment Handler which may be used with a particular Brand.
contents.zh-CHS: PayProtocol包含有关支付协议和支付处理程序的信息，这些信息可能与特定品牌一起使用。

contents.text: The relationships between the elements which make up the content of the Brand List is illustrated in the diagram below.
contents.zh-CHS: 构成品牌列表内容的元素之间的关系如下图所示。

contents.text: Brand List Component
contents.zh-CHS: 品牌列表组件

contents.text:
|                   ProtocolAmountRefs
|-Brand Element-----------------------------
|  |                                        |
|   - Protocol Brand Element--------        |
|                                   |       |
|                         ProtocolId|       |
|                                   |       |
|-Protocol Amount Element<----------+-------
|  |                      |         |
|  |                      |         |
|  |CurrencyAmountRefs    |Pay      |
|  |                      |Protocol |
|  v                      |Ref      |
|-Currency Amount Element |         |
| Element                 |         |
|                         |         |
 -PayProtocolElement<------<--------
Figure 15 Brand List Element Relationships
contents.zh-CHS: 图15品牌列表元素关系

contents.text: Examples of complete Brand Lists are contained in section 11.2 Brand List Examples.
contents.zh-CHS: 第11.2节“品牌列表示例”中包含完整品牌列表的示例。

contents.text: 7.7.1 Brand Element
contents.zh-CHS: 7.7.1 品牌元素

contents.text: A Brand Element describes a brand that can be used for making a payment. One or more of these elements is carried in each Brand List Component that has the PayDirection attribute set to Debit. Exactly one Brand Element may be carried in a Brand List Component that has the PayDirection attribute set to Credit.
contents.zh-CHS: 品牌元素描述可用于支付的品牌。这些元素中的一个或多个包含在PayDirection属性设置为借记的每个品牌列表组件中。将PayDirection属性设置为Credit的品牌列表组件中可能只包含一个品牌元素。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT Brand (ProtocolBrand*, PackagedContent*) >
<!ATTLIST Brand
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED
 xml:lang           NMTOKEN #IMPLIED
 BrandId            CDATA   #REQUIRED
 BrandName          CDATA   #REQUIRED
 BrandLogoNetLocn   CDATA   #REQUIRED
 BrandNarrative     CDATA   #IMPLIED
 ProtocolAmountRefs IDREFS  #REQUIRED
 ContentSoftwareId  CDATA   #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID Element identifier, potentially referenced in a Brand Selection Component contained in a later Payment Request message and uniquely identifies the Brand element within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID元素标识符，可能在后续付款请求消息中包含的品牌选择组件中引用，并唯一标识IOTP交易中的品牌元素。

contents.text: xml:lang Defines the language used by attributes and content of this element. See section 3.8 Identifying Languages.
contents.zh-CHS: xml:lang定义此元素的属性和内容所使用的语言。参见第3.8节识别语言。

contents.text: BrandId This contains a unique identifier for the brand (or promotional brand). It is used to match against a list of Payment Instruments which the Consumer holds to determine whether or not the Consumer can pay using the Brand.
contents.zh-CHS: BrandId包含品牌（或促销品牌）的唯一标识符。它用于匹配消费者持有的支付工具列表，以确定消费者是否可以使用该品牌支付。

contents.text: Values of BrandId are managed under the procedure described in section 12 IANA Considerations.
contents.zh-CHS: BrandId值根据第12节IANA注意事项中描述的程序进行管理。

contents.text: As values of BrandId are controlled under the procedures defined in section 12 IANA Considerations user defined values may be defined.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于BrandId的值是根据第12节IANA注意事项中定义的程序进行控制的，因此可以定义用户定义的值。

contents.text: BrandName This contains the name of the brand, for example MasterCard Credit. This is the description of the Brand which is displayed to the consumer in the Consumers language defined by xml:lang. For example it might be "American Airlines Advantage Visa". Note that this attribute is not used for matching against the payment instruments held by the Consumer.
contents.zh-CHS: 品牌名称包含品牌名称，例如万事达信用卡。这是以xml:lang定义的消费者语言向消费者展示的品牌描述。例如，它可能是“美国航空公司优势签证”。请注意，此属性不用于与消费者持有的支付工具进行匹配。

contents.text: BrandLogoNetLocn The net location which can be used to download the logo for the Organisation. See section Retrieving Logos (see section 10).
contents.zh-CHS: BrandLogoNetLocn可用于下载组织徽标的网络位置。请参阅“检索徽标”一节（请参阅第10节）。

contents.text: The content of this attribute must conform to [RFC1738].
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性的内容必须符合[RFC1738]。

contents.text: BrandNarrative This optional attribute is designed to be used by the Merchant to indicate some special conditions or benefit which would apply if the Consumer selected that brand. For example "5% discount", "free shipping and handling", "free breakage insurance for 1 year", "double air miles apply", etc.
contents.zh-CHS: 品牌叙事此可选属性旨在由商户使用，以指示如果消费者选择该品牌，将适用的一些特殊条件或利益。例如“5%折扣”、“免费装运和搬运”、“1年免费破碎险”、“适用双倍航空里程”等。

contents.text: ProtocolAmountRefs Identifies the protocols and related currencies and amounts which can be used with this Brand. Specified as a list of ID's of Protocol Amount Elements (see section 7.7.3) contained within the Brand List.
contents.zh-CHS: ProtocolaMontrefs确定了可用于该品牌的协议、相关货币和金额。指定为品牌列表中包含的协议金额元素ID列表（见第7.7.3节）。

contents.text: ContentSoftwareId See section 14.Glossary.
contents.zh-CHS: ContentSoftwareId请参见第14.1节术语表。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: ProtocolBrand Protocol Brand elements contain brand information to be used with a specific payment protocol (see section 7.7.2)
contents.zh-CHS: 协议品牌协议品牌元素包含与特定支付协议一起使用的品牌信息（见第7.7.2节）

contents.text: PackagedContent Optional Packaged Content (see section 3.7) elements containing information about the brand which may be used by the payment protocol. The content of this information is defined in the supplement for a payment protocol which describes how the payment protocol works with IOTP.
contents.zh-CHS: PackagedContent可选的打包内容（见第3.7节）包含支付协议可能使用的品牌信息的元素。该信息的内容在支付协议补充文件中定义，该补充文件描述了支付协议如何与IOTP协同工作。

contents.text: Example Brand Elements are contained in section 11.2 Brand List Examples.
contents.zh-CHS: 第11.2节“品牌列表示例”中包含了品牌元素示例。

contents.text: 7.7.2 Protocol Brand Element
contents.zh-CHS: 7.7.2 协议品牌要素

contents.text: The Protocol Brand Element contains information that is specific to the use of a particular Protocol with a Brand. Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 协议品牌元素包含特定于对品牌使用特定协议的信息。其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT ProtocolBrand (PackagedContent*) >
<!ATTLIST ProtocolBrand
 ProtocolId         CDATA   #REQUIRED
 ProtocolBrandId    CDATA   #REQUIRED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ProtocolId This must match the value of a ProtocolId attribute in a Pay Protocol Element (see section 7.7.5).
contents.zh-CHS: ProtocolId必须与支付协议元素中ProtocolId属性的值匹配（参见第7.7.5节）。

contents.text: The values of ProtocolId should be unique within a Brand Element otherwise there is an error.
contents.zh-CHS: ProtocolId的值在品牌元素中应该是唯一的，否则会出现错误。

contents.text: ProtocolBrandId This is the Payment Brand Id to be used with a particular payment protocol. For example, SET and EMV have their own well defined, yet different, values for the Brand Id to be used with each protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: ProtocolBrandId这是用于特定支付协议的支付品牌Id。例如，SET和EMV对每个协议使用的品牌Id都有自己定义良好但不同的值。

contents.text: The valid values of this attribute are defined in the supplement for the payment protocol identified by ProtocolId that describes how the payment protocol works with IOTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 该属性的有效值在ProtocolId标识的支付协议补充文件中定义，该补充文件描述了支付协议如何与IOTP一起工作。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: PackagedContent Optional Packaged Content (see section 3.7) elements containing information about the protocol/brand which may be used by the payment protocol. The content of this information is defined in the supplement for a payment protocol which describes how the payment protocol works with IOTP.
contents.zh-CHS: PackagedContent可选的打包内容（见第3.7节）元素，包含支付协议可能使用的协议/品牌信息。该信息的内容在支付协议补充文件中定义，该补充文件描述了支付协议如何与IOTP协同工作。

contents.text: 7.7.3 Protocol Amount Element
contents.zh-CHS: 7.7.3 协议量元素

contents.text: The Protocol Amount element links a Brand to:
contents.zh-CHS: 协议金额元素将品牌链接到：

contents.text: o the currencies and amounts in Currency Amount Elements (see section 7.7.4) that can be used with the Brand, and
contents.zh-CHS: o 可与品牌一起使用的货币和金额（见第7.7.4节），以及

contents.text: o the Payment Protocols and Payment Handlers defined in a Pay Protocol Element (see section 7.7.5), which can be used with those currencies and amounts.
contents.zh-CHS: o 支付协议元素中定义的支付协议和支付处理程序（见第7.7.5节），可与这些货币和金额一起使用。

contents.text: Its definition is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 其定义如下：

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT ProtocolAmount (PackagedContent*) >
<!ATTLIST ProtocolAmount
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED
 PayProtocolRef     IDREF   #REQUIRED
 CurrencyAmountRefs IDREFS  #REQUIRED
 ContentSoftwareId  CDATA   #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID Element identifier, potentially referenced in a Brand element; or in a Brand Selection Component contained in a later Payment Request message which uniquely identifies the Protocol Amount element within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID元素标识符，可能在品牌元素中引用；或者在包含在稍后付款请求消息中的品牌选择组件中，该消息唯一标识IOTP交易中的协议金额元素。

contents.text: PayProtocolRef Contains an Element Reference (see section 3.5) that refers to the Pay Protocol Element (see section 7.7.5) that contains the Payment Protocol and Payment Handlers that can be used with the Brand.
contents.zh-CHS: PayProtocolRef包含一个元素引用（见第3.5节），该元素引用了支付协议元素（见第7.7.5节），该元素包含可与品牌一起使用的支付协议和支付处理程序。

contents.text: CurrencyAmountRefs Contains a list of Element References (see section 3.5) that refer to the Currency Amount Element (see section 7.7.4) that describes the currencies and amounts that can be used with the Brand.
contents.zh-CHS: CurrencyCamountRefs包含一个元素引用列表（见第3.5节），该列表引用了货币金额元素（见第7.7.4节），描述了可用于品牌的货币和金额。

contents.text: ContentSoftwareId See section 14. Glossary.
contents.zh-CHS: 内容见第14节。术语汇编

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: PackagedContent Optional Packaged Content (see section 3.7) elements containing information about the protocol amount which may be used by the payment protocol. The content of this information is defined in the supplement for a payment protocol which describes how the payment protocol works with IOTP.
contents.zh-CHS: PackagedContent可选的打包内容（见第3.7节）元素，包含支付协议可能使用的协议金额信息。该信息的内容在支付协议补充文件中定义，该补充文件描述了支付协议如何与IOTP协同工作。

contents.text: Examples of Protocol Amount Elements are contained in section 11.2 Brand List Examples.
contents.zh-CHS: 协议金额要素示例见第11.2节品牌清单示例。

contents.text: 7.7.4 Currency Amount Element
contents.zh-CHS: 7.7.4 货币金额要素

contents.text: A Currency Amount element contains:
contents.zh-CHS: 货币金额元素包含：

contents.text: o a currency code (and its type), and
contents.zh-CHS: o 货币代码（及其类型），以及

contents.text: o an amount.
contents.zh-CHS: o 一笔钱。

contents.text: One or more of these elements is carried in each Brand List Component. Its definition is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 这些元素中的一个或多个包含在每个品牌列表组件中。其定义如下：

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT CurrencyAmount EMPTY >
<!ATTLIST CurrencyAmount
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED
 Amount             CDATA   #REQUIRED
 CurrCodeType       NMTOKEN 'ISO4217-A'
 CurrCode           CDATA   #REQUIRED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID Element identifier, potentially referenced in a Brand element; or in a Brand Selection Component
contents.zh-CHS: ID元素标识符，可能在品牌元素中引用；或者在品牌选择组件中

contents.text: contained in a later Payment Request message which uniquely identifies the Currency Amount Element within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: 包含在稍后的付款请求消息中，该消息唯一标识IOTP交易中的货币金额元素。

contents.text: Amount Indicates the amount to be paid in whole and fractional units of the currency. For example $245.35 would be expressed "245.35". Note that values smaller than the smallest denomination are allowed. For example one tenth of a cent would be "0.001".
contents.zh-CHS: 金额表示以货币的整数和小数单位支付的金额。例如，245.35美元将表示为“245.35”。请注意，允许使用小于最小面额的值。例如，十分之一美分将是“0.001”。

contents.text: CurrCodeType Indicates the domain of the CurrCode. This attribute is included so that the currency code may support non-standard "currencies" such as frequent flyer points, trading stamps, etc. Its values may be: o ISO4217-A (the default) indicates the currency code is a three character alphabetic currency code that conforms to [ISO 4217] o IOTP indicates that values of CurrCode are managed under the procedure described in section 12 IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: CurrCodeType表示CurrCode的域。包含此属性是为了使货币代码可以支持非标准“货币”，如常旅客积分、交易戳记等。其值可能为：o ISO4217-A（默认值）表示货币代码是符合[ISO 4217]的三字符字母货币代码o IOTP表明，CurrCode值按照第12节IANA注意事项中所述的程序进行管理

contents.text: CurrCode A code which identifies the currency to be used in the payment. The domain of valid currency codes is defined by CurrCodeType
contents.zh-CHS: CurrCode用于标识付款中使用的货币的代码。有效货币代码的域由CurrCodeType定义

contents.text: As values of CurrCodeType are managed under the procedure described in section 12 IANA Considerations user defined values of CurrCodeType may be defined.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于CurrCodeType的值是根据第12节IANA注意事项中描述的程序进行管理的，因此可以定义用户定义的CurrCodeType值。

contents.text: Examples of Currency Amount Elements are contained in section 11.2 Brand List Examples.
contents.zh-CHS: 第11.2节“品牌列表示例”中包含了货币金额元素的示例。

contents.text: 7.7.5 Pay Protocol Element
contents.zh-CHS: 7.7.5 支付协议要素

contents.text: A Pay Protocol element specifies details of a Payment Protocol and the Payment Handler that can be used with a Brand. One or more of these elements is carried in each Brand List.
contents.zh-CHS: Pay Protocol元素指定可与品牌一起使用的支付协议和支付处理程序的详细信息。这些元素中的一个或多个包含在每个品牌列表中。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT PayProtocol (PackagedContent*) >
<!ATTLIST PayProtocol
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED
 xml:lang           NMTOKEN #IMPLIED
 ProtocolId         NMTOKEN #REQUIRED
 ProtocolName       CDATA   #REQUIRED
 ActionOrgRef       NMTOKEN #REQUIRED
PayReqNetLocn CDATA #IMPLIED SecPayReqNetLocn CDATA #IMPLIED ContentSoftwareId CDATA #IMPLIED >
contents.zh-CHS: PayReqNetLocn CDATA#隐含SecPayReqNetLocn CDATA#隐含内容SoftwareID CDATA#隐含>

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID Element identifier, potentially referenced in a Brand element; or in a Brand Selection Component contained in a later Payment Request message which uniquely identifies the Pay Protocol element within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID元素标识符，可能在品牌元素中引用；或者在包含在稍后支付请求消息中的品牌选择组件中，该消息唯一标识IOTP交易中的支付协议元素。

contents.text: xml:lang Defines the language used by attributes and content of this element. See section 3.8 Identifying Languages.
contents.zh-CHS: xml:lang定义此元素的属性和内容所使用的语言。参见第3.8节识别语言。

contents.text: ProtocolId Consists of a protocol name and version. For example "SETv1.0".
contents.zh-CHS: ProtocolId由协议名称和版本组成。例如“SETv1.0”。

contents.text: The values of ProtocolId are defined by the payment scheme/method owners in the document that describes how to encapsulate a payment protocol within IOTP.
contents.zh-CHS: ProtocolId的值由支付方案/方法所有者在描述如何在IOTP中封装支付协议的文档中定义。

contents.text: ProtocolName A narrative description of the payment protocol and its version in the language identified by xml:lang. For example "Secure Electronic Transaction Version 1.0". Its purpose is to help provide information on the payment protocol being used if problems arise.
contents.zh-CHS: 协议名称支付协议及其版本的叙述性描述，使用xml:lang标识的语言。例如“安全电子交易版本1.0”。其目的是在出现问题时帮助提供有关所使用的支付协议的信息。

contents.text: ActionOrgRef An Element Reference (see section 3.5) to the Organisation Component for the Payment Handler for the Payment Protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: ActionOrgRef支付协议的支付处理程序的组织组件的要素参考（见第3.5节）。

contents.text: PayReqNetLocn The Net Location indicating where an unsecured Payment Request message should be sent if this protocol choice is used.
contents.zh-CHS: PayReqNetLocn如果使用此协议选项，则指示应在何处发送不安全支付请求消息的净位置。

contents.text: The content of this attribute is dependent on the Transport Mechanism (such must conform to [RFC1738].
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性的内容取决于传输机制（必须符合[RFC1738]）。

contents.text: SecPayReqNetLocn The Net Location indicating where a secured Payment Request message should be sent if this protocol choice is used.
contents.zh-CHS: SecPayReqNetLocn如果使用此协议选项，则指示应在何处发送安全支付请求消息的净位置。

contents.text: A secured payment involves the use of a secure channel such as [SSL/TLS] in order to communicate with the Payment Handler.
contents.zh-CHS: 安全支付涉及使用安全通道，如[SSL/TLS]，以便与支付处理程序通信。

contents.text: The content of this attribute must conform to [RFC1738]. See also See section 3.9 Secure and Insecure Net Locations.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性的内容必须符合[RFC1738]。另见第3.9节安全和不安全网络位置。

contents.text: ContentSoftwareId See section 14. Glossary.
contents.zh-CHS: 内容见第14节。术语汇编

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: PackagedContent Optional Packaged Content elements (see section 3.7) containing information about the protocol which is used by the payment protocol. The content of this information is defined in the supplement for a payment protocol which describes how the payment protocol works with IOTP. An example of its use could be to include a payment protocol message.
contents.zh-CHS: PackagedContent可选的打包内容元素（见第3.7节），包含支付协议使用的协议信息。该信息的内容在支付协议补充文件中定义，该补充文件描述了支付协议如何与IOTP协同工作。其使用的一个示例是包含支付协议消息。

contents.text: Examples of Pay Protocol Elements are contained in section 11.2 Brand List Examples.
contents.zh-CHS: 第11.2节“品牌列表示例”中包含了支付协议要素的示例。

contents.text: 7.8 Brand Selection Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.8 品牌选择组件

contents.text: A Brand Selection Component identifies the choice of payment brand, payment protocol and the Payment Handler. This element is used:
contents.zh-CHS: 品牌选择组件标识支付品牌、支付协议和支付处理程序的选择。此元素用于：

contents.text: o in Payment Request messages within Baseline Purchase and Baseline Value Exchange IOTP Transactions to identify the brand, protocol and payment handler for a payment, or
contents.zh-CHS: o 基线购买和基线价值交换IOTP交易中的支付请求消息，以识别支付的品牌、协议和支付处理程序，或

contents.text: o to, optionally, inform a merchant in a purchase of the payment brand being used so that the offer and order details can be amended accordingly.
contents.zh-CHS: o 可选地，在购买时通知商户所使用的支付品牌，以便可以相应地修改报价和订单详细信息。

contents.text: In Baseline IOTP, the integrity of Brand Selection Components is not guaranteed. However, modification of Brand Selection Components can only cause denial of service if the payment protocol itself is secure against message modification, duplication, and swapping attacks.
contents.zh-CHS: 在基线IOTP中，无法保证品牌选择组件的完整性。但是，只有在支付协议本身能够抵御消息修改、复制和交换攻击的情况下，修改品牌选择组件才能导致拒绝服务。

contents.text: The definition of a Brand Selection Component is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 品牌选择组件的定义如下。

contents.text: <!ELEMENT BrandSelection (BrandSelBrandInfo?, BrandSelProtocolAmountInfo?, BrandSelCurrencyAmountInfo?) > <!ATTLIST BrandSelection
contents.zh-CHS: <!元素品牌选择（BrandSelBrandInfo？、BrandSelProtocolAmountInfo？、BrandSelCurrencyAmountInfo？><！ATTLIST品牌选择

contents.text: ID ID #REQUIRED BrandListRef NMTOKEN #REQUIRED BrandRef NMTOKEN #REQUIRED ProtocolAmountRef NMTOKEN #REQUIRED CurrencyAmountRef NMTOKEN #REQUIRED >
contents.zh-CHS: ID ID#必需BrandListRef NMTOKEN#必需BrandRef NMTOKEN#必需ProtocolAmountRef NMTOKEN#必需CurrencyAmountRef NMTOKEN#必需>

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Brand Selection Component within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP交易中品牌选择组件的标识符。

contents.text: BrandListRef The Element Reference (see section 3.5) of the Brand List Component from which a Brand is being selected
contents.zh-CHS: BrandListRef——从中选择品牌的品牌列表组件的元素参考（见第3.5节）

contents.text: BrandRef The Element Reference of a Brand element within the Brand List Component that is being selected that is to be used in the payment.
contents.zh-CHS: BrandRef在品牌列表组件中选择的品牌元素的元素引用，该品牌元素将用于支付。

contents.text: ProtocolAmountRef The Element Reference of a Protocol Amount element within the Brand List Component which is to be used when making the payment.
contents.zh-CHS: ProtocolAmountRef支付时使用的品牌列表组件中协议金额元素的元素引用。

contents.text: CurrencyAmountRef The Element Reference of a Currency Amount element within the Brand List Component which is to be used when making the payment.
contents.zh-CHS: CurrencyCamountRef支付时要使用的品牌列表组件中货币金额元素的元素引用。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: BrandSelBrandInfo, This contains any additional data that BrandSelProtocolAmountInfo, may be required by a particular payment BrandSelCurrencyAmountInfo brand or protocol. See sections 7.8.1, 7.8.2, and 7.8.3.
contents.zh-CHS: BrandSelBrandInfo，包含特定支付BrandSelCurrencyAmountInfo品牌或协议可能需要的BrandSelProtocolAmountInfo的任何附加数据。见第7.8.1、7.8.2和7.8.3节。

contents.text: The following rules apply:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下规则适用：

contents.text: o the BrandListRef must contain the ID of a Brand List Component in the same IOTP Transaction
contents.zh-CHS: o BrandListRef必须包含同一IOTP事务中品牌列表组件的ID

contents.text: o every Brand List Component in the Trading Protocol Options Block (see section 8.1) must be referenced by one and only one Brand Selection Component
contents.zh-CHS: o 交易协议选项块（见第8.1节）中的每个品牌列表组件必须由一个且仅一个品牌选择组件引用

contents.text: o the BrandRef must refer to the ID of a Brand contained within the Brand List Component referred to by BrandListRef
contents.zh-CHS: o BrandRef必须引用BrandListRef引用的品牌列表组件中包含的品牌ID

contents.text: o the ProtocolAmountRef must refer to one of the Element IDs listed in the ProtocolAmountRefs attribute of the Brand element identified by BrandRef
contents.zh-CHS: o ProtocolAmountRef必须引用BrandRef标识的品牌元素的ProtocolAmountRefs属性中列出的元素ID之一

contents.text: o the CurrencyAmountRef must refer to one of the Element IDs listed in the CurrencyAmountRefs attribute of the Protocol Amount Element identified by ProtocolAmountRef.
contents.zh-CHS: o CurrencyAmountRef必须引用ProtocolAmountRef标识的协议金额元素的CurrencyAmountRef属性中列出的元素ID之一。

contents.text: An example of a Brand Selection Component is included in 11.2 Brand List Examples.
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2品牌列表示例中包含了品牌选择组件的示例。

contents.text: 7.8.1 Brand Selection Brand Info Element
contents.zh-CHS: 7.8.1 品牌选择品牌信息元素

contents.text: The Brand Selection Brand Info Element contains any additional data that may be required by a particular payment brand. See the IOTP payment method supplement for a description of how and when it used.
contents.zh-CHS: 品牌选择品牌信息元素包含特定支付品牌可能需要的任何附加数据。有关使用方式和时间的说明，请参见《IOTP支付方式补充》。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT BrandSelBrandInfo (PackagedContent+) >
<!ATTLIST BrandSelBrandInfo
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED
 ContentSoftwareId  CDATA   #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ContentSoftwareId See section 14. Glossary.
contents.zh-CHS: 内容见第14节。术语汇编

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: PackagedContent Packaged Content elements (see section 3.7) that contain additional data that may be required by a particular payment brand. See the payment method supplement for IOTP for rules on how this is used.
contents.zh-CHS: PackagedContent包含特定支付品牌可能需要的附加数据的打包内容元素（见第3.7节）。有关如何使用IOTP的规则，请参阅IOTP的付款方式补充。

contents.text: 7.8.2 Brand Selection Protocol Amount Info Element
contents.zh-CHS: 7.8.2 品牌选择协议金额信息元素

contents.text: The Brand Selection Protocol Amount Info Element contains any additional data that is payment protocol specific that may be required by a particular payment brand or payment protocol. See the IOTP payment method supplement for a description of how and when it used.
contents.zh-CHS: 品牌选择协议金额信息元素包含特定支付品牌或支付协议可能需要的特定于支付协议的任何附加数据。有关使用方式和时间的说明，请参见《IOTP支付方式补充》。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT BrandSelProtocolAmountInfo (PackagedContent+) >
<!ATTLIST BrandSelProtocolAmountInfo
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED
 ContentSoftwareId  CDATA   #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ContentSoftwareId See section 14. Glossary.
contents.zh-CHS: 内容见第14节。术语汇编

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: PackagedContent Packaged Content elements (see section 3.7) that may contain additional data that may be required by a particular payment brand. See the payment method supplement for IOTP for rules on how this is used.
contents.zh-CHS: PackagedContent可包含特定支付品牌可能需要的附加数据的打包内容元素（见第3.7节）。有关如何使用IOTP的规则，请参阅IOTP的付款方式补充。

contents.text: 7.8.3 Brand Selection Currency Amount Info Element
contents.zh-CHS: 7.8.3 品牌选择货币金额信息元素

contents.text: The Brand Selection Currency Amount Info Element contains any additional data that is payment brand and currency specific that may be required by a particular payment brand. See the IOTP payment method supplement for a description of how and when it used.
contents.zh-CHS: 品牌选择货币金额信息元素包含特定支付品牌可能需要的支付品牌和特定货币的任何附加数据。有关使用方式和时间的说明，请参见《IOTP支付方式补充》。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT BrandSelCurrencyAmountInfo (PackagedContent+) >
<!ATTLIST BrandSelCurrencyAmountInfo
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED
 ContentSoftwareId  CDATA   #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ContentSoftwareId See section 14. Glossary.
contents.zh-CHS: 内容见第14节。术语汇编

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: PackagedContent Packaged Content elements (see section 3.7) that contain additional data relating to the payment brand and currency. See the payment method supplement for IOTP for rules on how this is used.
contents.zh-CHS: PackagedContent包含与支付品牌和货币相关的附加数据的打包内容元素（见第3.7节）。有关如何使用IOTP的规则，请参阅IOTP的付款方式补充。

contents.text: 7.9 Payment Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.9 支付部分

contents.text: A Payment Component contains information used to control how a payment is carried out. Its provides information on:
contents.zh-CHS: 支付组件包含用于控制如何执行支付的信息。Its提供了以下信息：

contents.text: o the times within which a Payment with a Payment Handler may be started
contents.zh-CHS: o 使用支付处理程序开始支付的时间

contents.text: o a reference to the Brand List (see section 7.7) which identifies the Brands, protocols, currencies and amounts which can be used to make a payment
contents.zh-CHS: o 对品牌列表的参考（见第7.7节），其中确定了可用于支付的品牌、协议、货币和金额

contents.text: o whether or not a payment receipt will be provided
contents.zh-CHS: o 是否提供付款收据

contents.text: o whether another payment precedes this payment.
contents.zh-CHS: o 此付款之前是否有其他付款。

contents.text: Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT Payment EMPTY >
<!ATTLIST Payment
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED
 OkFrom             CDATA   #REQUIRED
 OkTo               CDATA   #REQUIRED
 BrandListRef       NMTOKEN #REQUIRED
 SignedPayReceipt (True | False) #REQUIRED
 StartAfterRefs     NMTOKENS #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Payment Component within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP交易中支付组件的标识符。

contents.text: OkFrom The date and time in [UTC] format after which a Payment Handler may accept for processing a Payment Request Block (see section 8.7) containing the Payment Component.
contents.zh-CHS: 从[UTC]格式的日期和时间开始，在此日期和时间之后，支付处理程序可以接受处理包含支付组件的支付请求块（参见第8.7节）。

contents.text: OkTo The date and time in [UTC] format before which a Payment Handler may accept for processing a Payment Request Block containing the Payment Component.
contents.zh-CHS: OkTo以[UTC]格式表示的日期和时间，在此日期和时间之前，支付处理程序可以接受处理包含支付组件的支付请求块。

contents.text: BrandListRef An Element Reference (see section 3.5) of a Brand List Component (see section 7.7) within the TPO Trading Block for the IOTP Transaction. The Brand List identifies the alternative ways in which the payment can be made.
contents.zh-CHS: BrandListRef是指IOTP交易的TPO交易区块内品牌列表组件（见第7.7节）的元素参考（见第3.5节）。品牌清单确定了付款的替代方式。

contents.text: SignedPayReceipt Indicates whether or not the Payment Response Block (see section 8.9) generated by the Payment Handler for the payment must be digitally signed.
contents.zh-CHS: SignedPayReceive表示是否必须对付款处理程序为付款生成的付款响应块（参见第8.9节）进行数字签名。

contents.text: StartAfter Contains Element References (see section 3.5) of other Payment Components which describe payments which must be complete before this payment can start. If no StartAfter attribute is present then there are no dependencies and the payment can start immediately
contents.zh-CHS: StartAfter包含其他支付组件的元素参考（见第3.5节），这些组件描述了在开始支付之前必须完成的支付。如果没有StartAfter属性，则不存在依赖项，可以立即开始付款

contents.text: 7.10 Payment Scheme Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.10 付款计划组成部分

contents.text: A Payment Scheme Component contains payment protocol information for a specific payment scheme which is transferred between the parties involved in a payment for example a [SET] message. Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 支付方案组件包含特定支付方案的支付协议信息，该支付方案在参与支付的各方之间传输，例如[设置]消息。其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT PaySchemeData (PackagedContent+) >
<!ATTLIST PaySchemeData
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED
 PaymentRef         NMTOKEN #IMPLIED
 ConsumerPaymentId  CDATA   #IMPLIED
 PaymentHandlerPayId CDATA  #IMPLIED
 ContentSoftwareId  CDATA   #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Payment Scheme Component within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP交易中支付方案组件的标识符。

contents.text: PaymentRef An Element Reference (see section 3.5) to the Payment Component (see section 7.9) to which this Payment Scheme Component relates. It is required unless the Payment Scheme Component is part of an Transaction Inquiry Status Transaction (see section 9.2.1).
contents.zh-CHS: PaymentRef指与该支付方案组成部分相关的支付组成部分（见第7.9节）的要素参考（见第3.5节）。除非付款方案组件是交易查询状态交易的一部分（见第9.2.1节），否则必须使用该选项。

contents.text: ConsumerPaymentId An identifier specified by the Consumer which, if returned by the Payment Handler in another Payment Scheme Component or by other means, will enable the Consumer to identify which payment is being referred to.
contents.zh-CHS: ConsumerPaymentId由消费者指定的标识符，如果该标识符由另一个支付方案组件中的支付处理程序返回或通过其他方式返回，将使消费者能够识别所引用的支付。

contents.text: PaymentHandlerPayId An identifier specified by the Payment Handler which, if returned by the Consumer in another Payment Scheme Component, or by other means, will enable the Payment Handler to identify which payment is being referred to. It is required on every Payment Scheme Component apart from the one contained in a Payment Request Block.
contents.zh-CHS: PaymentHandlerPayId支付处理程序指定的标识符，如果消费者在另一个支付方案组件中返回该标识符，或通过其他方式返回该标识符，则该标识符将使支付处理程序能够识别所引用的付款。除付款请求块中包含的付款方案组件外，每个付款方案组件上都需要该选项。

contents.text: ContentSoftwareId See section 14. Glossary.
contents.zh-CHS: 内容见第14节。术语汇编

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: PackagedContent Contains payment scheme protocol information as Packaged Content elements (see section 3.7). See the payment scheme supplement for the definition of its content.
contents.zh-CHS: PackagedContent包含作为打包内容元素的支付方案协议信息（参见第3.7节）。其内容定义见《支付方案补充》。

contents.text: Note that: o the values of the Name attribute of each packaged content element are defined by the Payment Protocol Supplement o the value of each Name must be unique within a Payment where a Payment is defined as all Payment Scheme or Payment Receipt Components with the same value of the PaymentRef attribute
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：o每个打包内容元素的名称属性值由支付协议附录定义o每个名称的值在付款中必须是唯一的，其中付款定义为具有相同PaymentRef属性值的所有付款方案或付款收据组件

contents.text: 7.11 Payment Receipt Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.11 付款收据组件

contents.text: A Payment Receipt is a record of a payment which demonstrates how much money has been paid or received. It is distinct from a purchase receipt in that it contains no record of what was being purchased.
contents.zh-CHS: 付款收据是一种付款记录，显示已支付或收到的金额。它与采购收据的不同之处在于，它不包含所采购物品的记录。

contents.text: Typically the content of a Payment Receipt Component will contain data which describes:
contents.zh-CHS: 通常，付款收据组件的内容将包含以下数据：

contents.text: o the amount paid and its currency
contents.zh-CHS: o 支付的金额及其货币

contents.text: o the date and time of the payment
contents.zh-CHS: o 付款的日期和时间

contents.text: o internal reference numbers which identify the payment to the payment system
contents.zh-CHS: o 识别支付系统付款的内部参考号

contents.text: o potentially digital signatures generated by the payment method which can be used to prove after the event that the payment occurred.
contents.zh-CHS: o 可能由支付方法生成的数字签名，可用于在发生支付事件后证明。

contents.text: If the Payment Method being used provides the facility then the Payment Receipt Component should contain payment protocol messages, or references to messages, which prove the payment occurred.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果使用的付款方法提供了便利，则付款收据组件应包含付款协议消息或对消息的引用，以证明付款已发生。

contents.text: The precise definition of the content is Payment Method dependent. Refer to the supplement for the payment method being used to determine the rules that apply.
contents.zh-CHS: 内容的精确定义取决于付款方式。请参阅附录，了解用于确定适用规则的付款方法。

contents.text: Information contained in the Payment Receipt Component should be displayed or otherwise made available to the Consumer.
contents.zh-CHS: 应显示或以其他方式向消费者提供付款收据组件中包含的信息。

contents.text: Note: If the Payment Receipt Component contains Payment Protocol Messages, then the Messages will need to be processed by Payment Method software to convert it into a format which can be understood by the Consumer
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：如果付款收据组件包含付款协议消息，则需要由付款方法软件处理这些消息，以将其转换为消费者可以理解的格式

contents.text: The definition of a Payment Receipt Component is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 付款收据组件的定义如下所示。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT PayReceipt (PackagedContent*) >
<!ATTLIST PayReceipt
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED
 PaymentRef         NMTOKEN #REQUIRED
 PayReceiptNameRefs NMTOKENS #IMPLIED
 ContentSoftwareId  CDATA   #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Payment Receipt Component within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP交易中付款收据组件的标识符。

contents.text: PaymentRef Contains an Element Reference (see section 3.5) to the Payment Component (see section 7.9) to which this payment receipt applies
contents.zh-CHS: PaymentRef包含本付款收据适用的付款组成部分（见第7.9节）的要素参考（见第3.5节）

contents.text:
PayReceiptNameRefs  Optionally contains a list of the values of the
                    Name attributes of Packaged Content elements that
                    together make up the receipt. The Packaged
                    Content elements are contained either within:
                     o Payment Scheme Data components exchanged
                       between the Payment Handler and the Consumer
                       roles during the Payment, and/or
                     o the Payment Receipt component itself.
                    Note that:
                     o each payment scheme defines in its supplement
                       the Names of the Packaged Content elements
                       that must be listed in this attribute (if
                       any).
                     o if a Payment Scheme Component contains
                       Packaged Content elements with a name that
                       matches a name within PayReceiptNameRefs, then
                       those Payment Scheme Components must be
                       referenced by Digests in the Payment Response
                       signature component (if such a signature is
                       being used)
The client software should save all the components referenced so that the payment receipt can be reconstructed when required.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端软件应保存所有引用的组件，以便在需要时重新生成付款收据。

contents.text: ContentSoftwareId See section 14. Glossary.
contents.zh-CHS: 内容见第14节。术语汇编

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: PackagedContent Optionally contains payment scheme payment receipt information as Packaged Content elements (see section 3.7). See the payment scheme supplement for the definition of its content.
contents.zh-CHS: PackagedContent可选地包含作为打包内容元素的付款方案付款收据信息（参见第3.7节）。其内容定义见《支付方案补充》。

contents.text: Note that: o the values of the Name attribute of each packaged content element are defined by the Payment Protocol Supplement o the value of each Name must be unique within a Payment where a Payment is defined as all Payment Scheme or Payment Receipt Components, with the same value of the PaymentRef attribute
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：o每个打包内容元素的名称属性值由支付协议附录定义o每个名称的值在付款中必须是唯一的，其中付款定义为所有付款方案或付款收据组件，具有相同的PaymentRef属性值

contents.text: Note that either the PayReceiptNameRefs attribute, the PackagedContent element, or both must be present.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，PayReceiptNameRefs属性、PackagedContent元素或两者都必须存在。

contents.text: 7.12 Payment Note Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.12 付款通知单组件

contents.text: The Payment Note Component contains additional, non payment related, information which the Payment Handler wants to provide to the Consumer. For example, if a withdrawal or deposit were being made then it could contain information on the remaining balance on the account after the transfer was complete. The information should duplicate information contained within the Payment Receipt Component.
contents.zh-CHS: 付款通知组件包含付款处理程序希望向消费者提供的其他非付款相关信息。例如，如果正在进行取款或存款，则该取款或存款可能包含转账完成后账户上剩余余额的信息。该信息应与付款收据组件中包含的信息重复。

contents.text: Information contained in the Payment Note Component should be displayed or otherwise made available to the Consumer. For interoperability, the Payment Note Component should support, as a minimum, the content types of "Plain Text", HTML and XML. Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 应向消费者显示或以其他方式提供付款通知单组件中包含的信息。为了实现互操作性，付款通知组件应至少支持“纯文本”、HTML和XML的内容类型。其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT PaymentNote (PackagedContent+) >
<!ATTLIST PaymentNote
  ID                ID      #REQUIRED
  ContentSoftwareId CDATA   #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Payment Receipt Component within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP交易中付款收据组件的标识符。

contents.text: ContentSoftwareId See section 14. Glossary.
contents.zh-CHS: 内容见第14节。术语汇编

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: PackagedContent Contains additional, non payment related, information which the Payment Handler wants to provide to the Consumer as one or more Packaged Content elements (see section 3.7).
contents.zh-CHS: PackagedContent包含支付处理程序希望作为一个或多个打包内容元素提供给消费者的其他非支付相关信息（请参见第3.7节）。

contents.text: 7.13 Delivery Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.13 交付组件

contents.text: The Delivery Element contains information required to deliver goods or services. Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: Delivery元素包含交付商品或服务所需的信息。其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT Delivery (DeliveryData?, PackagedContent*) >
<!ATTLIST Delivery
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED
 xml:lang           NMTOKEN #REQUIRED
 DelivExch          (True | False) #REQUIRED
 DelivAndPayResp    (True | False) #REQUIRED
 ActionOrgRef       NMTOKEN #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Delivery Component within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP事务中交付组件的标识符。

contents.text: xml:lang Defines the language used by attributes or child elements within this component, unless overridden by an xml:lang attribute on a child element. See section 3.8 Identifying Languages.
contents.zh-CHS: xml:lang定义此组件中的属性或子元素所使用的语言，除非被子元素上的xml:lang属性覆盖。参见第3.8节识别语言。

contents.text: DelivExch Indicates if this IOTP Transaction includes the messages associated with a Delivery Exchange. Valid values are: o True indicates it does include a Delivery Exchange o False indicates it does not include a Delivery Exchange
contents.zh-CHS: DeliveExch表示此IOTP事务是否包括与传递交换关联的消息。有效值为：o True表示它确实包含传递交换；o False表示它不包含传递交换

contents.text: If set to true then a DeliveryData element must be present. If set to false it may be absent.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果设置为true，则必须存在DeliveryData元素。如果设置为false，则可能不存在。

contents.text: DelivAndPayResp Indicates if the Delivery Response Block (see section 8.11) and the Payment Response Block (see section 8.9 ) are combined into one IOTP Message. Valid values are: o True indicates both blocks will be in the same IOTP Message, and
contents.zh-CHS: DeliverandPayResp表示交付响应块（见第8.11节）和支付响应块（见第8.9节）是否合并为一条IOTP消息。有效值为：o True表示两个块将位于同一IOTP消息中，且

contents.text: o False indicates each block will be in a different IOTP Message
contents.zh-CHS: o False表示每个块将位于不同的IOTP消息中

contents.text: DelivAndPayResp should not be true if DelivExch is False.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果DeliveExch为False，则DeliveAndPayResp不应为true。

contents.text: In practice combining the Delivery Response Block and Payment Response Block is only likely to be practical if the Merchant, the Payment Handler and the Delivery Handler are the same Organisation since: o the Payment Handler must have access to Order Component information so that they know what to deliver, and o the Payment Handler must be able to carry out the delivery
contents.zh-CHS: 在实践中，只有当商户、支付处理人和交付处理人是同一组织时，才可能将交付响应块和支付响应块结合起来，因为：o支付处理人必须能够访问订单组件信息，以便他们知道交付什么，o支付处理人员必须能够执行交付

contents.text: ActionOrgRef An Element Reference to the Organisation Component of the Delivery Handler for this delivery.
contents.zh-CHS: ActionOrgRef此交付的交付处理程序的组织组件的元素引用。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: DeliveryData Contains details about how the delivery will be carried out. See 7.13.1 Delivery Data Element below.
contents.zh-CHS: DeliveryData包含有关如何执行交付的详细信息。见下文7.13.1交付数据元素。

contents.text: PackagedContent Contains "user" data defined for the Merchant which is required by the Delivery Handler as one or more Packaged Content Elements see section 3.7.
contents.zh-CHS: PackagedContent包含为商户定义的“用户”数据，交付处理程序需要这些数据作为一个或多个打包内容元素，请参见第3.7节。

contents.text: 7.13.1 Delivery Data Element
contents.zh-CHS: 7.13.1 交付数据元

contents.text: The DeliveryData element contains information about where and how goods are to be delivered. Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: DeliveryData元素包含有关在何处以及如何交付货物的信息。其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT DeliveryData (PackagedContent*) >
<!ATTLIST DeliveryData
 xml:lang           NMTOKEN #IMPLIED
 OkFrom             CDATA   #REQUIRED
 OkTo               CDATA   #REQUIRED
 DelivMethod        NMTOKEN #REQUIRED
 DelivToRef         NMTOKEN #REQUIRED
 DelivReqNetLocn    CDATA   #REQUIRED
 SecDelivReqNetLocn CDATA   #REQUIRED
 ContentSoftwareId  CDATA   #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: xml:lang Defines the language used by attributes within this component. See section 3.8 Identifying Languages.
contents.zh-CHS: xml:lang定义此组件中的属性所使用的语言。参见第3.8节识别语言。

contents.text: OkFrom The date and time in [UTC] format after which the Delivery Handler may accept for processing a Delivery Request Block (see section 8.10).
contents.zh-CHS: 从[UTC]格式的日期和时间开始，在此日期和时间之后，交付处理人可以接受处理交付请求块（参见第8.10节）。

contents.text: OkTo The date and time in [UTC] format before which the Delivery Handler may accept for processing a Delivery Request Block.
contents.zh-CHS: 确定以[UTC]格式显示的日期和时间，在此日期和时间之前，交付处理程序可以接受以处理交付请求块。

contents.text: DelivMethod Indicates the method by which goods or services may be delivered. Valid values are: o Post the goods will be delivered by post or courier o Web the goods will be delivered electronically in the Delivery Note Component o Email the goods will be delivered electronically by e-mail
contents.zh-CHS: DeliverMethod表示交付商品或服务的方法。有效值为：o邮寄货物将通过邮寄或快递方式交付o网络货物将通过电子方式在送货单组件中交付o电子邮件货物将通过电子方式交付

contents.text: Values of DelivMethod are managed under the procedure described in section 12 IANA Considerations which allows user defined codes to be defined.
contents.zh-CHS: 方法的值根据第12节IANA注意事项中描述的程序进行管理，允许定义用户定义的代码。

contents.text: DelivToRef The Element Reference (see section 3.4) of an Organisation Component within the IOTP Transaction which has a role of DelivTo. The information in this block is used to determine where delivery is to be made. It must be compatible with DelivMethod. Specifically if the DelivMethod is: o Post, then the there must be a Postal Address Element containing sufficient information for a postal delivery, o Web, then there are no specific requirements. The information will be sent in a web page back to the Consumer o Email, then there must be Contact Information Element with a valid e-mail address
contents.zh-CHS: 交付物IOTP交易中具有交付物角色的组织组成部分的要素参考（见第3.4节）。本栏中的信息用于确定交货地点。它必须与方法兼容。具体来说，如果deliverMethod是：o Post，那么必须有一个包含邮政递送的足够信息的邮政地址元素，o Web，那么就没有具体的要求。信息将在网页中发送回消费者o电子邮件，然后必须有带有有效电子邮件地址的联系人信息元素

contents.text: DelivReqNetLocn This contains the Net Location to which an unsecured Delivery Request Block (see section 8.10) which contains the Delivery Component should be sent.
contents.zh-CHS: DeliverReqNetLocn包含包含交付组件的不安全交付请求块（见第8.10节）应发送到的净位置。

contents.text: The content of this attribute is dependent on the Transport Mechanism and must conform to [RFC1738].
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性的内容取决于传输机制，并且必须符合[RFC1738]。

contents.text: SecDelivReqNetLocn This contains the Net Location to which a secured Delivery Request Block (see section 8.10) which contains the Delivery Component should be sent.
contents.zh-CHS: SecDeliverReqNetLocn包含安全交付请求块（见第8.10节）应发送到的净位置，其中包含交付组件。

contents.text: A secured delivery request involves the use of a secure channel such as [SSL/TLS] in order to communicate with the Payment Handler.
contents.zh-CHS: 安全交付请求涉及使用安全通道，如[SSL/TLS]，以便与支付处理程序通信。

contents.text: The content of this attribute is dependent on the Transport Mechanism must conform to [RFC1738].
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性的内容取决于传输机制，必须符合[RFC1738]。

contents.text: See also Section 3.9 Secure and Insecure Net Locations.
contents.zh-CHS: 另见第3.9节安全和不安全网络位置。

contents.text: ContentSoftwareId See section 14. Glossary.
contents.zh-CHS: 内容见第14节。术语汇编

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: PackagedContent Additional information about the delivery as one or more Packaged Content elements (see section 3.7) provided to the Delivery Handler by the merchant.
contents.zh-CHS: PackagedContent由商户提供给交付处理人的关于交付的附加信息，作为一个或多个打包内容元素（见第3.7节）。

contents.text: 7.14 Consumer Delivery Data Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.14 消费者交付数据组件

contents.text: A Consumer Delivery Data Component is used by a Consumer to specify an identifier that can be used by the Consumer to identify the Delivery.
contents.zh-CHS: 消费者使用消费者交付数据组件来指定消费者可用于标识交付的标识符。

contents.text: Its definition is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 其定义如下：

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT ConsumerDeliveryData EMPTY >
<!ATTLIST ConsumerDeliveryData
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED
 ConsumerDeliveryId CDATA   #REQUIRED>
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Consumer Delivery Data Component within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP事务中消费者交付数据组件的标识符。

contents.text: ConsumerDeliveryId An identifier specified by the Consumer which, if returned by the Delivery Handler will enable the Consumer to identify which Delivery is being referred to.
contents.zh-CHS: ConsumerDeliveryId由使用者指定的标识符，如果传递处理程序返回该标识符，将使使用者能够识别引用的传递。

contents.text: 7.15 Delivery Note Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.15 交货通知单组件

contents.text: A Delivery Note contains delivery instructions about the delivery of goods or services or potentially the actual Delivery Information itself. It is information which the person or Organisation receiving the Delivery Note can use when delivery occurs.
contents.zh-CHS: 送货单包含关于货物或服务交付的交付说明，或者可能包含实际交付信息本身。该信息是收到交货通知单的人员或组织在交货时可以使用的信息。

contents.text: For interoperability, the Delivery Note Component Packaged Content should support both Plain Text, HTML and XML.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了实现互操作性，Delivery Note组件打包的内容应同时支持纯文本、HTML和XML。

contents.text: It's definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 它的定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT DeliveryNote (PackagedContent+) >
<!ATTLIST DeliveryNote
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED
 xml:lang           NMTOKEN #REQUIRED
 DelivHandlerDelivId CDATA  #IMPLIED
 ContentSoftwareId  CDATA   #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Delivery Note Component within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP事务中的交货通知单组件的标识符。

contents.text: xml:lang Defines the language used by attributes or child elements within this component, unless overridden by an xml:lang attribute on a child element. See section 3.8 Identifying Languages.
contents.zh-CHS: xml:lang定义此组件中的属性或子元素所使用的语言，除非被子元素上的xml:lang属性覆盖。参见第3.8节识别语言。

contents.text: DelivHandlerDelivId An optional identifier specified by the Delivery Handler which, if returned by the Consumer in another Delivery Component, or by other means, will enable the Delivery Handler to identify which Delivery is being referred to. It is required on every Delivery Component apart from the one contained in a Delivery Request Block.
contents.zh-CHS: DeliverHandlerDeliverId由交付处理程序指定的可选标识符，如果消费者在另一个交付组件中返回该标识符，或通过其他方式返回该标识符，则交付处理程序将能够识别引用的交付。除了包含在传递请求块中的传递组件之外，每个传递组件都需要它。

contents.text: An example use of this attribute is to contain a delivery tracking number.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性的一个示例用法是包含交货跟踪号。

contents.text: ContentSoftwareId See section 14. Glossary.
contents.zh-CHS: 内容见第14节。术语汇编

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: PackagedContent Contains actual delivery note information as one or more Packaged Content elements (see section 3.7).
contents.zh-CHS: PackagedContent包含实际的交货通知信息，作为一个或多个打包内容元素（参见第3.7节）。

contents.text: Note: If the content of the Delivery Message is a Mime message then the Delivery Note may trigger an application which causes the actual delivery to occur.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：如果传递消息的内容是Mime消息，则传递消息可能触发导致实际传递发生的应用程序。

contents.text: 7.16 Status Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.16 状态组件

contents.text: A Status Component contains status information about the business success or failure (see section 4.2) of a process.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态组件包含有关流程的业务成功或失败（参见第4.2节）的状态信息。

contents.text: Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT Status EMPTY >
<!ATTLIST Status
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED
 xml:lang           NMTOKEN #REQUIRED
 StatusType         NMTOKEN #REQUIRED
 ElRef              NMTOKEN #IMPLIED
 ProcessState (NotYetStarted | InProgress |
     CompletedOk | Failed | ProcessError) #REQUIRED
 CompletionCode     NMTOKEN #IMPLIED
 ProcessReference   CDATA   #IMPLIED
 StatusDesc         CDATA   #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Status Component within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP事务中状态组件的标识符。

contents.text: xml:lang Defines the language used by attributes within this component. See section 3.8 Identifying Languages.
contents.zh-CHS: xml:lang定义此组件中的属性所使用的语言。参见第3.8节识别语言。

contents.text: StatusType Indicates the type of Document Exchange which the Status is reporting on. It may be set to either Offer, Payment, Delivery, Authentication or Undefined.
contents.zh-CHS: StatusType表示状态报告的文档交换类型。它可以设置为提供、支付、交付、身份验证或未定义。

contents.text: Undefined means that the type of document exchange could not be identified. This is caused by an error in the initial input message of the exchange.
contents.zh-CHS: 未定义表示无法识别文档交换的类型。这是由exchange的初始输入消息中的错误引起的。

contents.text: Values of StatusType are managed under the procedure described in section 12 IANA Considerations which also allows user defined values of StatusType to be defined.
contents.zh-CHS: StatusType的值根据第12节IANA注意事项中描述的程序进行管理，该程序还允许定义用户定义的StatusType值。

contents.text:
ElRef              If the StatusType is not set to Undefined then
                   ElRef contains an Element Reference (see section
                   3.5) to the Component for which the Status is
                   being described. It must refer to either:
                    o an Order Component (see section 7.5), if the
                      StatusType is Offer,
                    o a Payment Component (see section 7.9), if the
                      StatusType is Payment, or
                    o a Delivery Component (see section 7.13), if
                      the StatusType is Delivery
                    o an Authentication Request Component (see
                      section 7.2) if the StatusType is
                      Authentication.

ProcessState       Contains a State Code which indicates the current
                   state of the process being carried out. Valid
                   values for ProcessState are:
                    o NotYetStarted. A Request Block has been
                      received but the process has not yet started
                    o InProgress. Processing of the Request Block
                      has started but it is not yet complete
                    o CompletedOk. The processing of the Request
                      Block has completed successfully without any
                      errors
                    o Failed. The processing of the Request Block
                      has failed because of a Business Error (see
                      section 4.2)
                    o ProcessError. This value is only used when the
                      Status Component is being used in connection
                      with an Inquiry Request Trading Block (see
                      section 8.12). It indicates there was a
                      Technical Error (see section 4.1) in the
                      Request Block which is being processed or some
                      internal processing error.
Note that this code reports on the processing of a Request Block. Further, asynchronous processing may occur after the Response Block associated with the Process has been sent.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，此代码报告请求块的处理情况。此外，异步处理可以在发送与该进程相关联的响应块之后发生。

contents.text: CompletionCode Indicates how the process completed. Valid values for the CompletionCode are given below together with the conditions when it must be present and indications on when recovery from failures are possible.
contents.zh-CHS: CompletionCode指示流程是如何完成的。以下给出了CompletionCode的有效值，以及必须存在的条件和故障恢复时的指示。

contents.text: A CompletionCode is a maximum of 14 characters long.
contents.zh-CHS: CompletionCode的最大长度为14个字符。

contents.text:
ProcessReference   This optional attribute holds a reference for the
                   process whose status is being reported. It may
                   hold the following values:
                    o when StatusType is set to Offer, it should
                      contain the OrderIdentifier from the Order
                      Component
                    o when StatusType is set to Payment, it should
                      contain the PaymentHandlerPayId from the
                      Payment Scheme Data Component
                    o when StatusType is set to Delivery, it should
                      contain the DelivHandlerDelivId from the
                      Delivery Note Component
                    o when StatusType is set to Authentication, it
                      should contain the AuthenticationId from the
                      Authentication Request Component
This attribute should be absent in the Inquiry Request message when the Consumer has not been given such a reference number by the IOTP Service Provider.
contents.zh-CHS: 当IOTP服务提供商未向消费者提供此类参考号时，查询请求消息中应不存在此属性。

contents.text: This attribute can be used inside an Inquiry Response Block (see section 8.13) to give the reference number for a transaction which has previously been unavailable.
contents.zh-CHS: 该属性可在查询响应块（见第8.13节）内使用，以给出以前不可用的事务的参考号。

contents.text: For example, the package tracking number might not be assigned at the time a delivery response was received. However, if the Consumer issues a Baseline Transaction Status Inquiry later, the Delivery Handler can put the package tracking number into this attribute in the Inquiry Response message and send it back to the Consumer.
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，在收到交付响应时，可能未分配包跟踪号。但是，如果消费者稍后发出基线事务状态查询，则交付处理程序可以将包跟踪号放入查询响应消息中的该属性中，并将其发送回消费者。

contents.text: StatusDesc An optional textual description of the current status of the process in the language identified by xml:lang.
contents.zh-CHS: StatusDesc用xml:lang标识的语言对流程当前状态的可选文本描述。

contents.text: 7.16.1 Offer Completion Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 7.16.1 报价完成代码

contents.text: The Completion Code is only required if the ProcessState attribute is set to Failed. The following table contains the valid values for the CompletionCode that may be used and indicates whether or not recovery might be possible. It is recommended that the StatusDesc attribute is used to provide further explanation where appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: 仅当ProcessState属性设置为Failed时，才需要完成代码。下表包含可能使用的CompletionCode的有效值，并指示是否可能进行恢复。建议在适当的情况下使用StatusDesc属性提供进一步的解释。

contents.text: Value Description
contents.zh-CHS: 值描述

contents.text: AuthError Authentication Error. The check of the Authentication Response which was carried out has failed.
contents.zh-CHS: AuthError身份验证错误。对已执行的身份验证响应的检查失败。

contents.text: Recovery may be possible by the Consumer re-submitting a new Authentication Response Block with corrected information.
contents.zh-CHS: 消费者可以通过重新提交带有更正信息的新认证响应块来实现恢复。

contents.text: ConsCancelled Consumer Cancelled. The Consumer decides to cancel the transaction for some reason. This code is only valid in a Status Component contained in a Cancel Block or an Inquiry Response Block.
contents.zh-CHS: 消费者取消消费取消。消费者出于某种原因决定取消交易。此代码仅在包含在取消块或查询响应块中的状态组件中有效。

contents.text: No recovery possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 无法恢复。

contents.text: MerchCancelled Offer Cancelled. The Merchant declines to generate an offer for some reason and cancels the transaction. This code is only valid in a Status Component contained in a Cancel Block or an Inquiry Response Block.
contents.zh-CHS: 水星取消了报价。商户出于某种原因拒绝生成报价并取消交易。此代码仅在包含在取消块或查询响应块中的状态组件中有效。

contents.text: No recovery possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 无法恢复。

contents.text: Unspecified Unspecified error. There is some unknown problem or error which does not fall into one of the other CompletionCodes.
contents.zh-CHS: 未指定的错误。有一些未知问题或错误不属于其他CompletionCode之一。

contents.text: No recovery possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 无法恢复。

contents.text: TimedOutRcvr Recoverable Time Out. Messages were resent but no response received. The document exchange has therefore "Timed Out". This code is only valid on a Transaction Inquiry.
contents.zh-CHS: TimedOutRcvr可恢复超时。已重新发送消息，但未收到响应。因此，文件交换已“超时”。此代码仅对交易查询有效。

contents.text: Recovery is possible if the last message from the other Trading Role is received again.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果再次收到来自其他交易角色的最后一条消息，则可以进行恢复。

contents.text: TimedOutNoRcvr Non Recoverable Time Out. Messages were resent but no response received. The document exchange has therefore "Timed Out". This code is only valid on a Transaction Inquiry.
contents.zh-CHS: TimedOutNoRcvr不可恢复超时。已重新发送消息，但未收到响应。因此，文件交换已“超时”。此代码仅对交易查询有效。

contents.text: No recovery possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 无法恢复。

contents.text: 7.16.2 Payment Completion Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 7.16.2 付款完成代码

contents.text: The CompletionCode is only required if the ProcessState attribute is set to Failed. The following table contains the valid values for the CompletionCode that may be used and indicates where recovery may be possible. It is recommended that the StatusDesc attribute is used by individual payment schemes to provide further explanation where appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: 只有当ProcessState属性设置为Failed时，才需要CompletionCode。下表包含可能使用的CompletionCode的有效值，并指明了可以进行恢复的位置。建议各个支付方案使用StatusDesc属性，以便在适当的情况下提供进一步的解释。

contents.text: Value Description
contents.zh-CHS: 值描述

contents.text: BrandNotSupp Brand not supported. The payment brand is not supported by the Payment Handler.
contents.zh-CHS: 不支持BrandNotSupp品牌。付款处理程序不支持付款品牌。

contents.text: See below for recovery options.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关恢复选项，请参见下文。

contents.text: CurrNotSupp Currency not supported. The currency in which the payment is to be made is not supported by either the Payment Instrument or the Payment Handler.
contents.zh-CHS: 不支持CurrentSupp货币。支付工具或支付处理程序均不支持支付所用的货币。

contents.text: If the payment is Brand Independent, then the Consumer may recover by selecting a different currency, if available, or a different brand. Note that this may involve a different Payment Handler.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果支付是品牌独立的，那么消费者可以通过选择不同的货币（如果可用）或不同的品牌来恢复。请注意，这可能涉及不同的付款处理程序。

contents.text: ConsCancelled Consumer Cancelled. The Consumer decides to cancel the payment for some reason. This code is only valid in a Status Component contained in a Cancel Block or an Inquiry Response Block.
contents.zh-CHS: 消费者取消消费取消。消费者出于某种原因决定取消付款。此代码仅在包含在取消块或查询响应块中的状态组件中有效。

contents.text: Recovery is not possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 恢复是不可能的。

contents.text: PaymtCancelled Payment Cancelled. The Payment Handler declines to complete the payment for some reason and cancels the transaction. This code is only valid in a Status Component contained in a Cancel Block or an Inquiry Response Block.
contents.zh-CHS: 付款已取消付款已取消。付款处理人出于某种原因拒绝完成付款并取消交易。此代码仅在包含在取消块或查询响应块中的状态组件中有效。

contents.text: See below for recovery options.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关恢复选项，请参见下文。

contents.text: AuthError Authentication Error. The Payment Scheme specific authentication check which was carried out has failed.
contents.zh-CHS: AuthError身份验证错误。执行的特定于支付方案的身份验证检查失败。

contents.text: Recovery may be possible. See the payment scheme supplement to determine what is allowed.
contents.zh-CHS: 恢复是可能的。请参阅付款方案补充，以确定允许的付款方式。

contents.text: InsuffFunds Insufficient funds. There are insufficient funds available for the payment to be made.
contents.zh-CHS: 资金不足。没有足够的资金支付这笔款项。

contents.text: See below for recovery options.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关恢复选项，请参见下文。

contents.text: InstBrandInvalid Payment Instrument not valid for Brand. A Payment Instrument is being used which does not correspond with the Brand selected. For example a Visa credit card is being used when MasterCard was selected as the Brand.
contents.zh-CHS: InstBrand无效的支付工具对品牌无效。使用的支付工具与所选品牌不符。例如，选择万事达卡作为品牌时，使用的是Visa信用卡。

contents.text: See below for recovery options.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关恢复选项，请参见下文。

contents.text: InstNotValid Payment instrument not valid for trade. The Payment Instrument cannot be used for the proposed type of trade, for some reason.
contents.zh-CHS: InstNotValid付款工具对交易无效。由于某些原因，支付工具不能用于拟议的交易类型。

contents.text: See below for recovery options.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关恢复选项，请参见下文。

contents.text: BadInstrument Bad instrument. There is a problem with the Payment Instrument being used which means that it is unable to be used for the payment.
contents.zh-CHS: 坏仪器坏仪器。正在使用的支付工具存在问题，这意味着它无法用于支付。

contents.text: See below for recovery options.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关恢复选项，请参见下文。

contents.text: Unspecified Unspecified error. There is some unknown problem or error which does not fall into one of the other CompletionCodes. The StatusDesc attribute should provide the explanation of the cause.
contents.zh-CHS: 未指定的错误。有一些未知问题或错误不属于其他CompletionCode之一。StatusDesc属性应提供原因解释。

contents.text: See below for recovery options.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关恢复选项，请参见下文。

contents.text: TimedOutRcvr Recoverable Time Out. Messages were resent but no response received. The document exchange has therefore "Timed Out". This code is only valid on a Transaction Inquiry.
contents.zh-CHS: TimedOutRcvr可恢复超时。已重新发送消息，但未收到响应。因此，文件交换已“超时”。此代码仅对交易查询有效。

contents.text: Recovery is possible if the last message from the other Trading Role is received again.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果再次收到来自其他交易角色的最后一条消息，则可以进行恢复。

contents.text: TimedOutNoRcvr Non Recoverable Time Out. Messages were resent but no response received. The document exchange has therefore "Timed Out". This code is only valid on a Transaction Inquiry.
contents.zh-CHS: TimedOutNoRcvr不可恢复超时。已重新发送消息，但未收到响应。因此，文件交换已“超时”。此代码仅对交易查询有效。

contents.text: No recovery possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 无法恢复。

contents.text: If the Payment is Brand Independent, then recovery may be possible for some values of the Completion Code, by the Consumer selecting either a different payment brand or a different payment instrument for the same brand. Note that this might involve a different Payment Handler. The codes to which this applies are: BrandNotSupp, PaymtCancelled, InsuffFunds, InstBrandInvalid, InstNotValid, BadInstrument and Unspecified.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果支付是独立于品牌的，则消费者可以通过选择不同的支付品牌或同一品牌的不同支付工具来恢复完成代码的某些值。请注意，这可能涉及不同的支付处理程序。适用的代码有：BrandNotSupp、PaymtCancelled、InOffFunds、InstBrandInvalid、InstNotValid、BadInstrument和Unspecified。

contents.text: Recovery from Payments associated with Brand Dependent purchases is only possible, if the Brand Selection component sent by the Merchant to the Consumer does not change. In practice this means that the same Brand, Protocol Amount and PayProtocol elements must be used. All that can change is the Payment Instrument. Any other change will invalidate the Merchant's Offer as a changed selection will invalidate the Offer Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 只有在商户发送给消费者的品牌选择组件没有改变的情况下，才能从与品牌相关的购买相关的付款中恢复。实际上，这意味着必须使用相同的品牌、协议金额和付费协议元素。唯一可以改变的就是支付工具。任何其他更改都将使商户的报价无效，因为更改的选择将使报价响应无效。

contents.text: 7.16.3 Delivery Completion Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 7.16.3 交货完成代码

contents.text: The following table contains the valid values for the CompletionCode attribute for a Delivery. It is recommended that the StatusDesc attribute is used to provide further explanation where appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: 下表包含传递的CompletionCode属性的有效值。建议在适当的情况下使用StatusDesc属性提供进一步的解释。

contents.text: Value Description
contents.zh-CHS: 值描述

contents.text: BackOrdered Back Ordered. The goods to be delivered are on order but they have not yet been received. Shipping will be arranged when they are received. This is only valid if ProcessState is CompletedOk.
contents.zh-CHS: 延期交货延期交货。待交付的货物已订购，但尚未收到。收到后将安排装运。这仅在ProcessState为CompletedOk时有效。

contents.text: Recovery is not possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 恢复是不可能的。

contents.text: PermNotAvail Permanently Not Available. The goods are permanently unavailable and cannot be re-ordered. This is only valid if ProcessState is Failed.
contents.zh-CHS: 永久不可用。货物永久不可用，无法重新订购。这仅在ProcessState失败时有效。

contents.text: Recovery is not possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 恢复是不可能的。
