contents.text: TempNotAvail Temporarily Not Available. The goods are temporarily unavailable and may become available if they can be ordered. This is only valid if ProcessState is CompletedOk.
contents.zh-CHS: TempNotAvail暂时不可用。货物暂时不可用，如果可以订购，则可能可用。这仅在ProcessState为CompletedOk时有效。

contents.text: Recovery is not possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 恢复是不可能的。

contents.text: ShipPending Shipping Pending. The goods are available and are scheduled for shipping but they have not yet been shipped. This is only valid if ProcessState is CompletedOk.
contents.zh-CHS: 发货待定发货待定。货物已备妥，并已安排装运，但尚未装运。这仅在ProcessState为CompletedOk时有效。

contents.text: Recovery is not possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 恢复是不可能的。

contents.text: Shipped Goods Shipped. The goods have been shipped. Confirmation of delivery is awaited. This is only valid if ProcessState is CompletedOk.
contents.zh-CHS: 已装运的货物已装运。货物已装船。正在等待交货确认。这仅在ProcessState为CompletedOk时有效。

contents.text: Recovery is not possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 恢复是不可能的。

contents.text: ShippedNoConf Shipped - No Delivery Confirmation. The goods have been shipped but it is not possible to confirm delivery of the goods. This is only valid if ProcessState is CompletedOk.
contents.zh-CHS: ShippedNoConf已装运-无交付确认。货物已装运，但无法确认货物已交付。这仅在ProcessState为CompletedOk时有效。

contents.text: Recovery is not possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 恢复是不可能的。

contents.text: ConsCancelled Consumer Cancelled. The Consumer decides to cancel the delivery for some reason. This code is only valid in a Status Component contained in a Cancel Block or an Inquiry Response Block.
contents.zh-CHS: 消费者取消消费取消。消费者出于某种原因决定取消交货。此代码仅在包含在取消块或查询响应块中的状态组件中有效。

contents.text: Recovery is not possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 恢复是不可能的。

contents.text: DelivCancelled Delivery Cancelled. The Delivery Handler declines to complete the Delivery for some reason and cancels the transaction. This code is only valid in a Status Component contained in a Cancel Block or an Inquiry Response Block.
contents.zh-CHS: 交货取消交货取消。交付处理程序出于某种原因拒绝完成交付，并取消交易。此代码仅在包含在取消块或查询响应块中的状态组件中有效。

contents.text: Recovery is not possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 恢复是不可能的。

contents.text: Confirmed Confirmed. All goods have been delivered and confirmation of their delivery has been received. This is only valid if ProcessState is CompletedOk.
contents.zh-CHS: 确认。所有货物均已交付，且已收到交付确认书。这仅在ProcessState为CompletedOk时有效。

contents.text: Recovery is not possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 恢复是不可能的。

contents.text: Unspecified Unspecified error. There is some unknown problem or error which does not fall into one of the other CompletionCodes. The StatusDesc attribute should provide the explanation of the cause.
contents.zh-CHS: 未指定的错误。有一些未知问题或错误不属于其他CompletionCode之一。StatusDesc属性应提供原因解释。

contents.text: Recovery is not possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 恢复是不可能的。

contents.text: TimedOutRcvr Recoverable Time Out. Messages were resent but no response received. The document exchange has therefore "Timed Out". This code is only valid on a Transaction Inquiry.
contents.zh-CHS: TimedOutRcvr可恢复超时。已重新发送消息，但未收到响应。因此，文件交换已“超时”。此代码仅对交易查询有效。

contents.text: Recovery is possible if the last message from the other Trading Role is received again.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果再次收到来自其他交易角色的最后一条消息，则可以进行恢复。

contents.text: TimedOutNoRcvr Non Recoverable Time Out. Messages were resent but no response received. The document exchange has therefore "Timed Out". This code is only valid on a Transaction Inquiry.
contents.zh-CHS: TimedOutNoRcvr不可恢复超时。已重新发送消息，但未收到响应。因此，文件交换已“超时”。此代码仅对交易查询有效。

contents.text: No recovery possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 无法恢复。

contents.text: Note: Recovery from failed, or partially completed deliveries is not possible. The Consumer should use the Transaction Status Inquiry Transaction (see section 9.2.1) to determine up-to- date information on the current state.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：无法从失败或部分完成的交付中恢复。消费者应使用交易状态查询交易（见第9.2.1节）确定当前状态的最新信息。

contents.text: 7.16.4 Authentication Completion Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 7.16.4 认证完成码

contents.text: The Completion Code is only required if the ProcessState attribute is set to Failed. The following table contains the valid values for the CompletionCode that may be used. It is recommended that the StatusDesc attribute is used to provide further explanation where appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: 仅当ProcessState属性设置为Failed时，才需要完成代码。下表包含可能使用的CompletionCode的有效值。建议在适当的情况下使用StatusDesc属性提供进一步的解释。

contents.text: Value Description
contents.zh-CHS: 值描述

contents.text: AutEeCancel Authenticatee Cancel. The Organisation being authenticated declines to be authenticated for some reason. This could be, for example because the signature on an Authentication Request was invalid or the Authenticator was not known or acceptable to the Authenticatee.
contents.zh-CHS: AutEeCancel认证取消。被认证的组织出于某种原因拒绝认证。例如，这可能是因为身份验证请求上的签名无效，或者身份验证人不知道或不接受身份验证人。

contents.text: Recovery is not possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 恢复是不可能的。

contents.text: AutOrCancel Authenticator Cancel. The Organisation requesting authentication declines to validate the Authentication Response received for some reason and cancels the transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: 自动取消验证器取消。请求认证的组织出于某种原因拒绝验证收到的认证响应，并取消交易。

contents.text: Recovery is not possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 恢复是不可能的。

contents.text: NoAuthReq Authentication Request Not Available. The Authenticatee does not have the data that must be provided so that they may be successfully authenticated. For example a password may have been forgotten, the Authenticatee has not yet become a member, or a smart card token is not present.
contents.zh-CHS: NoAuthReq身份验证请求不可用。AuthenticateTee没有必须提供的数据，因此无法成功对其进行身份验证。例如，密码可能已被遗忘，AuthenticateTee尚未成为成员，或者智能卡令牌不存在。

contents.text: Recovery is not possible
contents.zh-CHS: 恢复是不可能的

contents.text: AuthFailed Authentication Failed. The Authenticator checked the Authentication Response but the authentication failed for some reason. For example a password may have been incorrect.
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证失败。身份验证程序检查了身份验证响应，但由于某种原因身份验证失败。例如，密码可能不正确。

contents.text: Recovery may be possible by the Authenticatee re-sending a revised Authentication Response with corrected data.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过被认证者使用更正的数据重新发送修订的认证响应，可以进行恢复。

contents.text: TradRolesIncon Trading Roles Inconsistent. The Trading Roles contained within the TradingRoleList attribute of the Trading Role Information Request Component (see section 7.4) are inconsistent with the Trading Role which the Authenticatee is taking in the IOTP Transaction or is able to take. Examples of inconsistencies include: o asking a PaymentHandler for DeliveryHandler information o asking a Consumer for Merchant information
contents.zh-CHS: 交易角色与交易角色不一致。交易角色信息请求组件（见第7.4节）的TradingRoleList属性中包含的交易角色与被认证人在IOTP交易中正在扮演或能够扮演的交易角色不一致。不一致的例子包括：o向PaymentHandler询问DeliveryHandler信息o向消费者询问商户信息

contents.text: Recovery may be possible by the Authenticator re-sending a revised Authentication Request Block with corrected information.
contents.zh-CHS: 可以通过认证器重新发送带有更正信息的修订认证请求块来进行恢复。

contents.text: Unspecified Unspecified error. There is some unknown problem or error which does not fall into one of the other CompletionCodes.
contents.zh-CHS: 未指定的错误。有一些未知问题或错误不属于其他CompletionCode之一。

contents.text: Recovery is not possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 恢复是不可能的。

contents.text: TimedOutRcvr Recoverable Time Out. Messages were resent but no response received. The document exchange has therefore "Timed Out". This code is only valid on a Transaction Inquiry.
contents.zh-CHS: TimedOutRcvr可恢复超时。已重新发送消息，但未收到响应。因此，文件交换已“超时”。此代码仅对交易查询有效。

contents.text: Recovery is possible if the last message from the other Trading Role is received again.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果再次收到来自其他交易角色的最后一条消息，则可以进行恢复。

contents.text: TimedOutNoRcvr Non Recoverable Time Out. Messages were resent but no response received. The document exchange has therefore "Timed Out". This code is only valid on a Transaction Inquiry.
contents.zh-CHS: TimedOutNoRcvr不可恢复超时。已重新发送消息，但未收到响应。因此，文件交换已“超时”。此代码仅对交易查询有效。

contents.text: No recovery possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 无法恢复。

contents.text: 7.16.5 Undefined Completion Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 7.16.5 未定义的完成代码

contents.text: The Completion Code is only required if the ProcessState attribute is set to Failed. The following table contains the valid values for the CompletionCode that may be used. It is recommended that the StatusDesc attribute is used to provide further explanation where appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: 仅当ProcessState属性设置为Failed时，才需要完成代码。下表包含可能使用的CompletionCode的有效值。建议在适当的情况下使用StatusDesc属性提供进一步的解释。

contents.text: Value Description
contents.zh-CHS: 值描述

contents.text: InMsgHardError Input Message Hard Error. The type of Request Block could not be identified or was inconsistent. Therefore no single Document Exchange could be identified. This will cause a Hard Error in the transaction
contents.zh-CHS: InMsgHarderError输入消息硬错误。无法识别请求块的类型或类型不一致。因此，无法确定单一的文件交换。这将导致事务中出现硬错误

contents.text: 7.16.6 Transaction Inquiry Completion Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 7.16.6 交易查询完成代码

contents.text: The Completion Code is only required if the ProcessState attribute is set to Failed. The following table contains the valid values for the CompletionCode that may be used. It is recommended that the StatusDesc attribute is used to provide further explanation where appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: 仅当ProcessState属性设置为Failed时，才需要完成代码。下表包含可能使用的CompletionCode的有效值。建议在适当的情况下使用StatusDesc属性提供进一步的解释。

contents.text: Value Description
contents.zh-CHS: 值描述

contents.text: UnAuthReq Unauthorised Request. The recipient of the Transaction Status Request declines to respond to the request.
contents.zh-CHS: 未经授权的请求。事务状态请求的收件人拒绝响应该请求。

contents.text: 7.17 Trading Role Data Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.17 交易角色数据组件

contents.text: The Trading Role Data Component contains opaque data which needs to be communicated between the Trading Roles involved in an IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: 交易角色数据组件包含不透明数据，需要在IOTP交易中涉及的交易角色之间进行通信。

contents.text: Trading Role Components identify:
contents.zh-CHS: 交易角色组件确定：

contents.text: o the Organisation that generated the component, and
contents.zh-CHS: o 生成组件的组织，以及

contents.text: o the Organisation that is to receive it.
contents.zh-CHS: o 将接收它的组织。

contents.text: They are first generated and included in a "Response" Block, and then copied to the appropriate "Request" Block. For example a Payment Handler might need to inform a Delivery Handler that a credit card payment had been authorised but not captured. There may also be other information that the Payment Handler has generated where the format is privately agreed with the Delivery Handler which needs to be communicated. In another example a Merchant might need to provide a Payment Handler with some specific information about a Consumer so that consumer can acquire double loyalty points with the payment.
contents.zh-CHS: 它们首先生成并包含在“响应”块中，然后复制到相应的“请求”块中。例如，支付处理人员可能需要通知交付处理人员信用卡支付已被授权但未被捕获。付款经办人还可能生成其他信息，其中格式与交付经办人私下约定，需要沟通。在另一个示例中，商户可能需要向支付处理程序提供有关消费者的某些特定信息，以便消费者可以通过支付获得双重忠诚度。

contents.text: Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT TradingRoleData (PackagedContent+) >
<!ATTLIST TradingRoleData
  ID                ID      #REQUIRED
  OriginatorElRef   NMTOKEN #REQUIRED
  DestinationElRefs NMTOKENS #REQUIRED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Trading Role Data Component within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP交易中交易角色数据组件的标识符。

contents.text: OrginatorElRef Contains an element reference to the Organisation Component of the Organisation that created the Trading Role Data Component and included it in a "Response" Block (e.g., an Offer Response or a Payment Response Block).
contents.zh-CHS: OrginatorElRef包含对创建交易角色数据组件的组织的组织组件的元素引用，并将其包含在“响应”块（例如，要约响应或支付响应块）中。

contents.text: DestinationElRefs Contains element references to the Organisation Components of the Organisations that are to receive the Trading Role Data Component in a "Request" Block (e.g., either a Payment Request or a Delivery Request Block).
contents.zh-CHS: DestinationElRefs包含对将在“请求”块（例如，付款请求或交付请求块）中接收交易角色数据组件的组织的组织组件的元素引用。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: PackagedContent This contains the data which is to be sent between the various Trading Roles as one or more PackagedContent elements see section 3.7.
contents.zh-CHS: PackagedContent包含作为一个或多个PackagedContent元素在不同交易角色之间发送的数据，请参见第3.7节。

contents.text: 7.17.1 Who Receives a Trading Role Data Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.17.1 谁接收交易角色数据组件

contents.text: The rules for deciding what to do with Trading Role Data Components are described below.
contents.zh-CHS: 决定如何处理交易角色数据组件的规则如下所述。

contents.text: o whenever a Trading Role Data Component is received in a "Response" block identify the Organisation Components of the Organisations that are to receive it as identified by the DestinationElRefs attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: o 每当在“响应”块中接收到交易角色数据组件时，请按照DestinationElRefs属性标识要接收该数据的组织的组织组件。

contents.text: o whenever a "Request" Block is being sent, check to see if it is being sent to one of the Organisations identified by the DestinationElRefs attribute. If it is then include in the "Request" block:
contents.zh-CHS: o 每当发送“请求”块时，请检查是否将其发送给DestinationElRefs属性标识的组织之一。如果是，则包括在“请求”块中：

contents.text: - the Trading Role Data Component as well as,
contents.zh-CHS: - 交易角色数据组件以及，

contents.text: - the Organisation Component of the Organisation identified by the OriginatorElRef attribute (if not already present)
contents.zh-CHS: - 由OriginatorElRef属性标识的组织的组织组成部分（如果尚未存在）

contents.text: 7.18 Inquiry Type Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.18 查询类型组件

contents.text: The Inquiry Type Component contains the information which indicates the type of process that is being inquired upon. Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 查询类型组件包含指示正在查询的进程类型的信息。其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT InquiryType EMPTY >
<!ATTLIST InquiryType
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED
 Type               NMTOKEN #REQUIRED
 ElRef              NMTOKEN #IMPLIED
 ProcessReference   CDATA   #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Inquiry Type Component within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP事务中查询类型组件的标识符。

contents.text: Type Contains the type of inquiry. Valid values for Type are: o Offer. The inquiry is about the status of an offer and is addressed to the Merchant. o Payment. The inquiry is about the status of a payment and is addressed to the Payment Handler. o Delivery. The inquiry is about the status of a delivery and addressed to the Delivery Handler.
contents.zh-CHS: 类型包含查询的类型。类型的有效值为：o Offer。查询是关于报价的状态，并发送给商户。o付款。查询是关于付款状态的，并发送给付款处理人。o交付。查询是关于交付状态的，并发送给交付处理人员。

contents.text: ElRef Contains an Element Reference (see section 3.5) to the component to which this Inquiry Type Component applies. That is, o TPO Block when Type is Offer
contents.zh-CHS: ElRef包含适用于该查询类型组件的组件的元素参考（见第3.5节）。即，当类型为Offer时，o TPO块

contents.text: o Payment Component when Type is Payment o Delivery Component when Type is Delivery
contents.zh-CHS: o 类型为付款时的付款组件或类型为交货时的交货组件

contents.text: ProcessReference Optionally contains a reference to the process being inquired upon. It should be set if the information is available. For the definition of the values it may contain, see the ProcessReference attribute of the Status Component (see section 7.16).
contents.zh-CHS: ProcessReference可选地包含对正在查询的进程的引用。如果信息可用，则应进行设置。有关它可能包含的值的定义，请参阅状态组件的ProcessReference属性（请参阅第7.16节）。

contents.text: 7.19 Signature Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.19 签名组件

contents.text: Note: Definitions of the XML structures for signatures and certificates are described in the document titled "Digital Signatures for the Internet Open Trading Protocol" by Kent Davidson and Yoshiaki Kawatsura published at the same time as this document - see [IOTPDSIG].
contents.zh-CHS: 注：签名和证书的XML结构定义在Kent Davidson和Yoshiaki Kawatsura与本文件同时发布的题为“互联网开放交易协议的数字签名”的文件中进行了描述-参见[IOTPDSIG]。

contents.text: In the future it is anticipated that future versions of IOTP will adopt a whatever method for digitally signing XML becomes the standard.
contents.zh-CHS: 在未来，预计IOTP的未来版本将采用任何方法对XML进行数字签名成为标准。

contents.text: Each Signature Component digitally signs one or more Blocks or Components including other Signature Components.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个签名组件对一个或多个块或组件（包括其他签名组件）进行数字签名。

contents.text: The Signature Component:
contents.zh-CHS: 签名部分：

contents.text: o contains digests of one or more Blocks or Components in one or more IOTP Messages within the same IOTP Transaction and places the result in a Digest Element
contents.zh-CHS: o 包含同一IOTP事务中一个或多个IOTP消息中一个或多个块或组件的摘要，并将结果放入摘要元素中

contents.text: o concatenates these Digest elements with other information on the type of signature, the originator and potential recipients of the signature and details of the signature algorithms being used and places them in a Manifest element, and
contents.zh-CHS: o 将这些摘要元素与签名类型、签名的发起人和潜在接收人以及正在使用的签名算法的详细信息等其他信息连接起来，并将它们放置在清单元素中，以及

contents.text: o signs the Manifest element using the optional certificate identified in the Certificate element within the Signature Block placing the result in a Value element within a Signature Component
contents.zh-CHS: o 使用签名块中的证书元素中标识的可选证书对清单元素进行签名，将结果放置在签名组件中的值元素中

contents.text: Note that there may be multiple Value elements that contain signatures of a Manifest Element.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，可能有多个值元素包含清单元素的签名。

contents.text: A Signature Component can be one of four types either:
contents.zh-CHS: 签名组件可以是以下四种类型之一：

contents.text: o an Offer Response Signature,
contents.zh-CHS: o 报价响应签名，

contents.text: o a Payment Response Signature,
contents.zh-CHS: o 付款响应签名，

contents.text: o a Delivery Response Signature, or
contents.zh-CHS: o 交付响应签名，或

contents.text: o an Authentication Response Signature.
contents.zh-CHS: o 身份验证响应签名。

contents.text: For a general explanation of signatures see section 6 Digital Signatures.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关签名的一般说明，请参见第6节数字签名。

contents.text: 7.19.1 IOTP usage of signature elements and attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 7.19.1 签名元素和属性的IOTP使用

contents.text: Definitions of the elements and attributes are contained in [IOTPDSIG]. The following contains additional information that describes how these elements and attributes are used by IOTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 元素和属性的定义包含在[IOTPDSIG]中。以下包含描述IOTP如何使用这些元素和属性的附加信息。

contents.text: SIGNATURE ELEMENT
contents.zh-CHS: 特征元素

contents.text: The ID attribute is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: ID属性是必需的。

contents.text: MANIFEST ELEMENT
contents.zh-CHS: 清单元素

contents.text: The optional LocatorHrefBase attribute contains text which should be concatenated before the text contained in the LocatorHREF attribute of all Digest elements within the Manifest.
contents.zh-CHS: 可选的LocatorHrefBase属性包含的文本应在清单中所有摘要元素的LocatorHREF属性包含的文本之前连接。

contents.text: Its purpose is to reduce the size of LocatorHREF attribute values since the first part of the LocatorHREF attributes in the same signature are likely to be the same.
contents.zh-CHS: 其目的是减小LocatorHREF属性值的大小，因为同一签名中LocatorHREF属性的第一部分可能相同。

contents.text: Typically, within IOTP, it will contain all the characters in a LocatorHref attribute up to the sharp ("#") character (see immediately below).
contents.zh-CHS: 通常，在IOTP中，它将包含LocatorHref属性中的所有字符，直到夏普（#）字符（见下文）。

contents.text: ALGORITHM AND PARAMETER ELEMENTS
contents.zh-CHS: 算法和参数元素

contents.text: The algorithm element identifies the algorithms used in generating the signature. The type of the algorithm is defined by the value of the Type attribute which indicates if it is to be used as a Digest algorithm, a Signature algorithm or a Key Agreement algorithm.
contents.zh-CHS: algorithm元素标识生成签名时使用的算法。算法的类型由type属性的值定义，该值指示它是用作摘要算法、签名算法还是密钥协商算法。

contents.text: The following Digest algorithms must be implemented:
contents.zh-CHS: 必须实现以下摘要算法：

contents.text: o a [DOM-HASH] algorithm. This is identified by setting the Name attribute of the Algorithm element to "urn:ibm:dom-hash"
contents.zh-CHS: o [DOM-HASH]算法。这是通过将算法元素的Name属性设置为“urn:ibm:domhash”来标识的

contents.text: o a [SHA1] algorithm. This is identified by setting the Name attribute of the Algorithm element to "urn:fips:sha1", and
contents.zh-CHS: o [SHA1]算法。这是通过将算法元素的Name属性设置为“urn:fips:sha1”来标识的，并且

contents.text: o a [MD5] algorithm. This is identified by setting the Name attribute of the Algorithm element to "urn:rsa:md5"
contents.zh-CHS: o 一种[MD5]算法。这是通过将算法元素的Name属性设置为“urn:rsa:md5”来标识的

contents.text: o The following Signature algorithms must be implemented:
contents.zh-CHS: o 必须实现以下签名算法：

contents.text: o a [DSA] algorithm. This is identified by setting the Name attribute of the Algorithm element to "urn:us.gov:dsa"
contents.zh-CHS: o 一种[DSA]算法。这是通过将算法元素的Name属性设置为“urn:us.gov:dsa”来标识的

contents.text: o a [HMAC] algorithm. This is identified by setting the Name attribute of the Algorithm element to "urn:ibm:hmac"
contents.zh-CHS: o 一种[HMAC]算法。这是通过将算法元素的Name属性设置为“urn:ibm:hmac”来标识的

contents.text: It is recommended that the following Signature algorithm is also implemented:
contents.zh-CHS: 建议还实施以下签名算法：

contents.text: o a [RSA] algorithm. This is identified by setting the Name attribute of the Algorithm element to "urn:rsa:rsa"
contents.zh-CHS: o 一种[RSA]算法。这可以通过将算法元素的Name属性设置为“urn:rsa:rsa”来识别

contents.text: In addition other payment scheme specific algorithms may be used. In this case the value of the name attribute to use is specified in the payment scheme supplement for that algorithm.
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，还可以使用其他特定于支付方案的算法。在这种情况下，要使用的name属性的值在该算法的支付方案补充中指定。

contents.text: One algorithm may make use of other algorithms by use of the Parameter element, for example:
contents.zh-CHS: 一种算法可以通过使用参数元素使用其他算法，例如：

contents.text:
<Algorithm ID=A1 type="digest" name="urn:ibm:dom-hash">
  <Parameter type='AlgorithmRef'>A2</Parameter>
</Algorithm>
<Algorithm ID=A2 type="digest" name="urn:fips:sha1">
</Algorithm>
<Algorithm ID=A3 type="signature" name="urn:ibm:hmac">
    <Parameter type='AlgorithmRef'>A1</Parameter>
</Algorithm>
DIGEST ELEMENT
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要元素

contents.text: The LocatorHREF attribute identifies the IOTP element which is being digitally signed. Specifically it consists of:
contents.zh-CHS: LocatorHREF属性标识正在进行数字签名的IOTP元素。具体而言，它包括：

contents.text: o the value of the IotpTransId attribute of the Transaction ID Component, followed by:
contents.zh-CHS: o 事务ID组件的IotpTransId属性的值，后跟：

contents.text: o a sharp character, i.e. "#", followed by
contents.zh-CHS: o 尖锐的字符，即“#”，后跟

contents.text: o an Element Reference (see section 3.5) to the element within the IOTP Transaction which is the subject of the digest.
contents.zh-CHS: o 作为摘要主题的IOTP交易中的要素参考（见第3.5节）。

contents.text: Before analysing the structure of the LocatorHREF attribute, it must be concatenated with the value of the LocatorHrefBase attribute of the Manifest element (see immediately above).
contents.zh-CHS: 在分析LocatorHREF属性的结构之前，必须将其与清单元素的LocatorHrefBase属性的值连接起来（请参见上文）。

contents.text: ATTRIBUTE ELEMENT
contents.zh-CHS: 属性元素

contents.text: There must be one and only one Attribute Element that contains a Type attribute with a value of IOTP Signature Type and with content set to either: OfferResponse, PaymentResponse, DeliveryResponse,
contents.zh-CHS: 必须有且只有一个属性元素包含值为IOTP Signature Type且内容设置为以下任一项的类型属性：OfferResponse、PaymentResponse、DeliveryResponse、，

contents.text: AuthenticationRequest, AuthenticationResponse, PingRequest or PingResponse; depending on the type of the signature.
contents.zh-CHS: AuthenticationRequest、AuthenticationResponse、PingRequest或PingResponse；取决于签名的类型。

contents.text: Values of the content of the Attribute element are controlled under the procedures defined in section 12 IANA Considerations which also allows user defined values to be defined.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性元素内容的值根据第12节IANA注意事项中定义的程序进行控制，该节还允许定义用户定义的值。

contents.text: The Critical attribute must be set to true.
contents.zh-CHS: 临界属性必须设置为true。

contents.text: ORIGINATORINFO ELEMENT
contents.zh-CHS: 原始信息元素

contents.text: The OriginatorRef attribute of the OriginatorInfo element must always be present and contain an Element Reference (see section 3.5) to the Organisation Component of the Organisation that generated the Signature Component.
contents.zh-CHS: OriginatorInfo要素的OriginatorRef属性必须始终存在，并包含对生成签名要素的组织的组织要素的要素引用（见第3.5节）。

contents.text: RECIPIENTINFO ELEMENT
contents.zh-CHS: RECIPIENTINFO元素

contents.text: The RecipientRefs attribute contains a list of Element References (see section 3.5), that point to the Organisations that might need to validate the signature. For details see below.
contents.zh-CHS: RecipientRefs属性包含元素引用列表（参见第3.5节），这些元素引用指向可能需要验证签名的组织。详情见下文。

contents.text: 7.19.2 Offer Response Signature Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.19.2 提供响应签名组件

contents.text: The Manifest Element of a signature which has a type of OfferResponse should contain Digest elements for the following Components:
contents.zh-CHS: 具有报价响应类型的签名的清单元素应包含以下组件的摘要元素：

contents.text: o the Transaction Id Component (see section 3.3.1) of the IOTP message that contains the Offer Response Signature
contents.zh-CHS: o 包含报价响应签名的IOTP消息的事务Id组件（见第3.3.1节）

contents.text: o the Transaction Reference Block (see section 3.3) of the IOTP Message that contains the Offer Response Signature
contents.zh-CHS: o 包含报价响应签名的IOTP消息的交易参考块（见第3.3节）

contents.text: o from the TPO Block:
contents.zh-CHS: o 从TPO块：

contents.text: - the Protocol Options Component
contents.zh-CHS: - 协议选项组件

contents.text: - each of the Organisation Components
contents.zh-CHS: - 每个组织组成部分

contents.text: - each of the Brand List Components
contents.zh-CHS: - 每个品牌列表组件

contents.text: o optionally, all the Brand Selection Components if they were sent to the Merchant in a TPO Selection Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 可选地，所有品牌选择组件（如果它们在TPO选择块中发送给商户）

contents.text: o from the Offer Response Block:
contents.zh-CHS: o 从报价响应块：

contents.text: - the Order Component
contents.zh-CHS: - 订单组件

contents.text: - each of the Payment Components
contents.zh-CHS: - 每个支付组件

contents.text: - the Delivery Component
contents.zh-CHS: - 交付组件

contents.text: - each of the Authentication Request Components
contents.zh-CHS: - 每个身份验证请求组件

contents.text: - any Trading Role Data Components
contents.zh-CHS: - 任何交易角色数据组件

contents.text: The Offer Response Signature should also contain Digest elements for the components that describe each of the Organisations that may or will need to verify the signature. This involves:
contents.zh-CHS: 要约响应签名还应包含描述可能或将需要验证签名的每个组织的组件摘要元素。这包括：

contents.text: o if the Merchant has received a TPO Selection Block containing Brand Selection Components, then generate a Digest element for the Payment Handler identified by the Brand Selection Component and the Delivery Handler identified by the Delivery Component. See section 6.3.1 Check Request Block sent Correct Organisation for a description of how this can be done.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果商户已收到包含品牌选择组件的TPO选择块，则为品牌选择组件标识的支付处理程序和交付组件标识的交付处理程序生成摘要元素。请参阅第6.3.1节“检查请求块发送到正确的组织”，了解如何执行此操作。

contents.text: o if the Merchant is not expecting to receive a TPO Selection Block then generate a Digest element for the Delivery Handler and all the Payment Handlers that are involved.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果商户不希望收到TPO选择块，则为交付处理程序和所有涉及的支付处理程序生成摘要元素。

contents.text: 7.19.3 Payment Receipt Signature Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.19.3 付款收据签名组件

contents.text: The Manifest Element of the Payment Receipt Signature Component should contain Digest Elements for the following Components:
contents.zh-CHS: 付款收据签名组件的清单元素应包含以下组件的摘要元素：

contents.text: o the Transaction Id Component (see section 3.3.1) of the IOTP message that contains the Payment Receipt Signature
contents.zh-CHS: o 包含付款收据签名的IOTP消息的交易Id组件（见第3.3.1节）

contents.text: o the Transaction Reference Block (see section 3.3) of the IOTP Message that contains the Payment Receipt Signature
contents.zh-CHS: o 包含付款收据签名的IOTP消息的交易参考块（见第3.3节）

contents.text: o the Offer Response Signature Component
contents.zh-CHS: o 提供响应签名组件

contents.text: o the Payment Receipt Component
contents.zh-CHS: o 付款收据组件

contents.text: o the Payment Note Component
contents.zh-CHS: o 付款通知单组件

contents.text: o the Status Component
contents.zh-CHS: o 状态组件

contents.text: o the Brand Selection Component.
contents.zh-CHS: o 品牌选择组件。

contents.text: o any Trading Role Data Components
contents.zh-CHS: o 任何交易角色数据组件

contents.text: 7.19.4 Delivery Response Signature Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.19.4 交付响应签名组件

contents.text: The Manifest Element of the Delivery Response Signature Component should contain Digest Elements for the following Components:
contents.zh-CHS: 交付响应签名组件的Manifest元素应包含以下组件的摘要元素：

contents.text: o the Transaction Id Component (see section 3.3.1) of the IOTP message that contains the Delivery Response Signature
contents.zh-CHS: o 包含交付响应签名的IOTP消息的事务Id组件（见第3.3.1节）

contents.text: o the Transaction Reference Block (see section 3.3) of the IOTP Message that contains the Delivery Response Signature
contents.zh-CHS: o 包含交付响应签名的IOTP消息的事务参考块（见第3.3节）

contents.text: o the Consumer Delivery Data component contained in the preceding Delivery Request (if any)
contents.zh-CHS: o 前一个交付请求中包含的消费者交付数据组件（如果有）

contents.text: o the Signature Components contained in the preceding Delivery Request (if any)
contents.zh-CHS: o 上述交付请求中包含的签名组件（如有）

contents.text: o the Status Component
contents.zh-CHS: o 状态组件

contents.text: o the Delivery Note Component
contents.zh-CHS: o 交货通知单组件

contents.text: 7.19.5 Authentication Request Signature Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.19.5 身份验证请求签名组件

contents.text: The Manifest Element of the Authentication Request Signature Component should contain Digest Elements for the following Components:
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证请求签名组件的Manifest元素应包含以下组件的摘要元素：

contents.text: o the Transaction Reference Block (see section 3.3) for the IOTP Message that contains information that describes the IOTP Message and IOTP Transaction
contents.zh-CHS: o IOTP消息的事务参考块（见第3.3节），其中包含描述IOTP消息和IOTP事务的信息

contents.text: o the Transaction Id Component (see section 3.3.1) which globally uniquely identifies the IOTP Transaction
contents.zh-CHS: o 全局唯一标识IOTP交易的交易Id组件（见第3.3.1节）

contents.text: o the following components of the TPO Block :
contents.zh-CHS: o TPO块的以下组件：

contents.text: - the Protocol Options Component
contents.zh-CHS: - 协议选项组件

contents.text: - the Organisation Component
contents.zh-CHS: - 组织部分

contents.text: o the following components of the Authentication Request Block:
contents.zh-CHS: o 身份验证请求块的以下组件：

contents.text: - the Authentication Request Component(s) (if present)
contents.zh-CHS: - 身份验证请求组件（如果存在）

contents.text: - the Trading Role Information Request Component (if present)
contents.zh-CHS: - 交易角色信息请求组件（如果存在）

contents.text: 7.19.6 Authentication Response Signature Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.19.6 身份验证响应签名组件

contents.text: The Manifest Element of the Authentication Response Signature Component should contain Digest Elements for the following Components:
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证响应签名组件的Manifest元素应包含以下组件的摘要元素：

contents.text: o the Transaction Reference Block (see section 3.3) for the IOTP Message that contains information that describes the IOTP Message and IOTP Transaction
contents.zh-CHS: o IOTP消息的事务参考块（见第3.3节），其中包含描述IOTP消息和IOTP事务的信息

contents.text: o the Transaction Id Component (see section 3.3.1) which globally uniquely identifies the IOTP Transaction
contents.zh-CHS: o 全局唯一标识IOTP交易的交易Id组件（见第3.3.1节）

contents.text: o the following components of the Authentication Request Block:
contents.zh-CHS: o 身份验证请求块的以下组件：

contents.text: - the Authentication Request Component that was used in the Authentication (if present)
contents.zh-CHS: - 身份验证中使用的身份验证请求组件（如果存在）

contents.text: - the Trading Role Information Request Component (if present)
contents.zh-CHS: - 交易角色信息请求组件（如果存在）

contents.text: o the Organisation Components contained in the Authentication Response Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 身份验证响应块中包含的组织组件

contents.text: 7.19.7 Inquiry Request Signature Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.19.7 查询请求签名组件

contents.text: If the Inquiry Request is being signed (see section 9.2.1) the Manifest Element of the Inquiry Request Signature Component should contain Digest elements of the Inquiry Type Component, and if present, the Payment Scheme Component.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果正在签署查询请求（见第9.2.1节），则查询请求签名组件的清单元素应包含查询类型组件的摘要元素，如果存在，则包含支付方案组件。

contents.text: 7.19.8 Inquiry Response Signature Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.19.8 查询响应签名组件

contents.text: If the Inquiry Response is being signed (see section 9.2.1) the Manifest Element of the Inquiry Response Signature Component should contain Digest elements of the Trading Response Block and the Status Component.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果正在签署询价响应（见第9.2.1节），询价响应签名组件的清单元素应包含交易响应块和状态组件的摘要元素。

contents.text: 7.19.9 Ping Request Signature Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.19.9 Ping请求签名组件

contents.text: If the Ping Request is being singed (see section 9.2.2), the Manifest Element of the Ping Request Signature Component should contain Digest elements for all the Organisation Components.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果签署Ping请求（见第9.2.2节），Ping请求签名组件的Manifest元素应包含所有组织组件的摘要元素。

contents.text: 7.19.10 Ping Response Signature Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.19.10 Ping响应签名组件

contents.text: If the Ping Response is being singed (see section 9.2.2), the Manifest Element of the Ping Response Signature Component should contain Digest elements fir all the Organisation Components.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果正在签署Ping响应（见第9.2.2节），Ping响应签名组件的清单元素应包含所有组织组件的摘要元素。

contents.text: 7.20 Certificate Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.20 证书组件

contents.text: Note: Definitions of the XML structures for signatures and certificates are described in the paper "Digital Signatures for the Internet Open Trading Protocol", see [IOTPDSIG].
contents.zh-CHS: 注：签名和证书的XML结构定义见“互联网开放交易协议的数字签名”，见[IOTPDSIG]。

contents.text: See note at the start of section 7.19 Signature Component for more details.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关更多详细信息，请参见第7.19节签名组件开头的注释。

contents.text: A Certificate Component contains a Digital Certificate. They are used only when required, for example, when asymmetric cryptography is being used and the recipient of the signature that needs to check has not already received the Public Key.
contents.zh-CHS: 证书组件包含数字证书。它们仅在需要时使用，例如，在使用非对称加密且需要检查的签名接收者尚未收到公钥时。

contents.text: The structure of a Certificate Component is defined in [IOTPDSIG].
contents.zh-CHS: 证书组件的结构在[IOTPDSIG]中定义。

contents.text: 7.20.1 IOTP usage of signature elements and attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 7.20.1 签名元素和属性的IOTP使用

contents.text: Detailed definitions of the above elements and attributes are contained in [IOTPDSIG]. The following contains additional information that describes how these elements and attributes are used by IOTP.
contents.zh-CHS: [IOTPDSIG]中包含上述元素和属性的详细定义。以下包含描述IOTP如何使用这些元素和属性的附加信息。

contents.text: CERTIFICATE COMPONENT
contents.zh-CHS: 证书组件

contents.text: The ID attribute is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: ID属性是必需的。

contents.text: VALUE ELEMENT
contents.zh-CHS: 价值要素

contents.text: The ID attribute is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: ID属性是必需的。

contents.text: 7.21 Error Component
contents.zh-CHS: 7.21 误差分量

contents.text: The Error Component contains information about Technical Errors (see section 4.1) in an IOTP Message which has been received by one of the Trading Roles involved in the trade.
contents.zh-CHS: 错误组件包含IOTP消息中有关技术错误的信息（见第4.1节），该消息已由交易中涉及的一个交易角色接收。

contents.text: For clarity two phrases are defined which are used in the description of an Error Component:
contents.zh-CHS: 为清楚起见，定义了两个用于描述错误组件的短语：

contents.text: o message in error. An IOTP message which contains or causes an error of some kind
contents.zh-CHS: o 错误消息。包含或导致某种错误的IOTP消息

contents.text: o message reporting the error. An IOTP message that contains an Error Component that describes the error found in a message in error.
contents.zh-CHS: o 报告错误的消息。包含错误组件的IOTP消息，该组件描述在错误消息中发现的错误。

contents.text: The definition of the Error Component is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 错误组件的定义如下所示。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT ErrorComp (ErrorLocation+, PackagedContent*) >
<!ATTLIST ErrorComp
 ID                 NMTOKEN #REQUIRED
 xml:lang           NMTOKEN #REQUIRED
 ErrorCode          NMTOKEN #REQUIRED
 ErrorDesc          CDATA   #REQUIRED
 Severity (Warning|TransientError|HardError) #REQUIRED
 MinRetrySecs       CDATA   #IMPLIED
 SwVendorErrorRef   CDATA   #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Error Component within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP事务中错误组件的标识符。

contents.text: xml:lang Defines the language used by attributes or child elements within this component, unless overridden by an xml:lang attribute on a child element. See section 3.8 Identifying Languages.
contents.zh-CHS: xml:lang定义此组件中的属性或子元素所使用的语言，除非被子元素上的xml:lang属性覆盖。参见第3.8节识别语言。

contents.text: ErrorCode Contains an error code which indicates the nature of the error in the message in error. Valid values for the ErrorCode are given in section 7.21.2 Error Codes.
contents.zh-CHS: ErrorCode包含一个错误代码，指示出错消息中错误的性质。第7.21.2节错误代码中给出了错误代码的有效值。

contents.text: ErrorDesc Contains a narrative description of the error in the language defined by xml:lang. The content of this attribute is defined by the vendor/developer of the software which generated the Error Component
contents.zh-CHS: ErrorDesc包含用xml:lang定义的语言对错误的叙述性描述。此属性的内容由生成错误组件的软件的供应商/开发人员定义

contents.text: Severity Indicates the severity of the error. Valid values are: o Warning. This indicates that although there is a message in error the IOTP Transaction can still continue. o TransientError. This indicates that the error in the message in error may be recovered if the message in error that is referred to by the ErrorLocation element is resent
contents.zh-CHS: 严重性指示错误的严重性。有效值为：o警告。这表明，尽管存在错误消息，但IOTP事务仍可以继续。哦，运输员。这表示如果重新发送ErrorLocation元素引用的message in error，则可以恢复message in error中的错误

contents.text: o HardError. This indicates that there is an unrecoverable error in the message in error and the IOTP Transaction must stop.
contents.zh-CHS: o 硬错误。这表示错误消息中存在不可恢复的错误，必须停止IOTP事务。

contents.text: MinRetrySecs This attribute should be present if Severity is set to TransientError. It is the minimum number of whole seconds which the IOTP aware application which received the message reporting the error should wait before re-sending the message in error identified by the ErrorLocation element.
contents.zh-CHS: MinRetrySecs如果严重性设置为TransineError，则此属性应存在。它是接收到报告错误消息的IOTP感知应用程序在重新发送ErrorLocation元素标识的出错消息之前应等待的最小整秒数。

contents.text: If Severity is not set to TransientError then the value of this attribute is ignored.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果严重性未设置为TransientError，则忽略此属性的值。

contents.text: SwVendorErrorRef This attribute is a reference whose value is set by the vendor/developer of the software which generated the Error Component. It should contain data which enables the vendor to identify the precise location in their software and the set of circumstances which caused the software to generate a message reporting the error. See also the SoftwareId attribute of the Message Id element in the Transaction Reference Block (section 3.3).
contents.zh-CHS: SwVendorErrorRef此属性是一个引用，其值由生成错误组件的软件的供应商/开发人员设置。它应包含使供应商能够识别其软件中的精确位置的数据，以及导致软件生成报告错误的消息的一组情况。另请参见事务参考块中消息Id元素的SoftwareId属性（第3.3节）。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: ErrorLocation This identifies the IOTP Transaction Id of the message in error and, where possible, the element and attribute in the message in error that caused the Error Component to be generated.
contents.zh-CHS: ErrorLocation标识出错消息的IOTP事务Id，如果可能，标识出错消息中导致生成错误组件的元素和属性。

contents.text: If the Severity of the error is not TransientError, more than one ErrorLocation may be specified as appropriate depending on the nature of the error (see section 7.21.2 Error Codes) and at the discretion of the vendor/developer of the IOTP Aware Application.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果错误的严重程度不是TransientError，则根据错误的性质（见第7.21.2节错误代码）以及IOTP感知应用程序的供应商/开发商的决定，可酌情指定多个错误位置。

contents.text: PackagedContent This contains additional data which can be used to understand the error. Its content may vary as appropriate depending on the nature of the error (see section 7.21.2 Error Codes) and at the discretion of the vendor/developer of the IOTP Aware Application. For a definition of PackagedContent see section 3.7.
contents.zh-CHS: PackagedContent包含可用于理解错误的其他数据。根据错误的性质（参见第7.21.2节错误代码）以及IOTP感知应用程序的供应商/开发人员的判断，其内容可能会有所不同。有关包装内容的定义，请参见第3.7节。

contents.text: 7.21.1 Error Processing Guidelines
contents.zh-CHS: 7.21.1 错误处理指南

contents.text: If there is more than one Error Component in a message reporting the error, carry out the actions appropriate for the Error Component with the highest severity. In this context, HardError has a higher severity than TransientError, which has a higher severity than Warning.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果报告错误的消息中有多个错误组件，请执行适用于严重性最高的错误组件的操作。在这种情况下，HardError的严重性高于TransientError，TransientError的严重性高于Warning。

contents.text: 7.21.1.1 Severity - Warning

If an IOTP aware application is generating a message reporting the error with an Error Component where the Severity attribute is set to Warning, then if the message reporting the error does not contain another Error Component with a severity higher than Warning, the IOTP Message must also include the Trading Blocks and Trading Components that would have been included if no error was being reported.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果IOTP感知应用程序正在生成一条消息，其中错误组件的严重性属性设置为警告，则如果报告错误的消息不包含另一个严重性高于警告的错误组件，IOTP消息还必须包括交易区块和交易组件，如果没有报告错误，这些交易区块和交易组件将被包括在内。

contents.text: If a message reporting the error is received with an Error Component where Severity is set to Warning, then:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果接收到报告错误的消息时错误组件的严重性设置为警告，则：

contents.text: o it is recommended that information about the error is either logged, or otherwise reported to the user,
contents.zh-CHS: o 建议记录有关错误的信息，或以其他方式向用户报告，

contents.text: o the implementer of the IOTP aware application must either, at their or the user's discretion:
contents.zh-CHS: o IOTP感知应用程序的实施者必须自行决定或由用户决定：

contents.text: - continue the IOTP transaction as normal, or
contents.zh-CHS: - 继续正常的IOTP事务，或

contents.text: - fail the IOTP transaction by generating a message reporting the error with an Error Component with Severity set to HardError (see section 7.21.1.3).
contents.zh-CHS: - 通过生成报告错误的消息，并将错误组件的严重性设置为HardError，使IOTP事务失败（参见第7.21.1.3节）。

contents.text: If the intention is to continue the IOTP transaction then, if there are no other Error Components with a higher severity, check that the necessary Trading Blocks and Trading Components for normal processing of the transaction to continue are present. If they are not then generate a message reporting the error with an Error Component with Severity set to HardError.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果打算继续IOTP交易，那么，如果没有其他严重性更高的错误组件，请检查是否存在正常处理交易以继续的必要交易块和交易组件。如果没有，则生成一条消息，报告错误，错误组件的严重性设置为HardError。

contents.text: 7.21.1.2 Severity - Transient Error
contents.zh-CHS: 7.21.1.2 严重性-瞬时错误

contents.text: If an IOTP Aware Application is generating a message reporting the error with an Error Component where the Severity attribute is set to TransientError, then there should be only one Error Component in the message reporting the error. In addition, the MinRetrySecs attribute should be present.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果IOTP感知应用程序正在生成报告错误的消息，其中错误组件的严重性属性设置为TransientError，则报告错误的消息中应该只有一个错误组件。此外，应该存在MinRetrySecs属性。

contents.text: If a message reporting the error is received with an Error Component where Severity is set to TransientError then:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果接收到报告错误的消息时错误组件的严重性设置为TransineError，则：

contents.text: o if the MinRetrySecs attribute is present and a valid number, then use the MinRetrySecs value given. Otherwise if MinRetrySecs is missing or is invalid, then:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果存在MinRetrySecs属性且该属性为有效数字，则使用给定的MinRetrySecs值。否则，如果MinRetrySecs丢失或无效，则：

contents.text: - generate a message reporting the error containing an Error Component with a Severity of Warning and send it on the next IOTP message (if any) to be sent to the Trading Role which sent the message reporting the error with the invalid MinRetrySecs, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 生成报告错误的消息，其中包含严重性为警告的错误组件，并在下一条IOTP消息（如果有）发送给交易角色时发送该消息，该交易角色使用无效的MinRetrySecs发送报告错误的消息，以及

contents.text: - use a value for MinRetrySecs which is set by the vendor/developer of the IOTP Aware Application.
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用MinRetrySecs的值，该值由IOTP感知应用程序的供应商/开发人员设置。

contents.text: o check that only one ErrorLocation element is contained within the Error Component and that it refers to an IOTP Message which was sent by the recipient of the Error Component with a Severity of TransientError. If more than one ErrorLocation is present then generate a message reporting the error with a Severity of HardError.
contents.zh-CHS: o 检查错误组件中是否仅包含一个ErrorLocation元素，以及该元素是否引用错误组件收件人发送的严重性为TransientError的IOTP消息。如果存在多个ErrorLocation，则生成一条消息，报告严重性为HardError的错误。

contents.text: 7.21.1.3 Severity - Hard Error
contents.zh-CHS: 7.21.1.3 严重性-硬错误

contents.text: If an IOTP Aware Application is generating a message reporting the error with an Error Component where the Severity attribute set to HardError, then there should be only one Error Component in the message reporting the error.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果IOTP感知应用程序正在生成报告错误的消息，其中错误组件的严重性属性设置为HardError，则报告错误的消息中应该只有一个错误组件。

contents.text: If a message reporting the error is received with an Error Component where Severity is set to HardError then terminate the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果接收到报告错误的消息时错误组件的严重性设置为HardError，则终止IOTP事务。

contents.text: 7.21.2 Error Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 7.21.2 错误代码

contents.text: The following table contains the valid values for the ErrorCode attribute of the Error Component. The first sentence of the description contains the text that should be used to describe the error when displayed or otherwise reported. Individual implementations may translate this into alternative languages at their discretion.
contents.zh-CHS: 下表包含错误组件的ErrorCode属性的有效值。描述的第一句包含显示或以其他方式报告时应用于描述错误的文本。个别实现可自行决定将其转换为其他语言。

contents.text: An Error Code must not be more that 14 characters long.
contents.zh-CHS: 错误代码的长度不得超过14个字符。

contents.text: Value Description
contents.zh-CHS: 值描述

contents.text: Reserved Reserved. This error is reserved by the vendor/developer of the software. Contact the vendor/developer of the software for more information See the SoftwareId attribute of the Message Id element in the Transaction Reference Block(section 3.3).
contents.zh-CHS: 保留的。此错误由软件供应商/开发人员保留。有关更多信息，请联系软件的供应商/开发人员，参见事务参考块中消息Id元素的SoftwareId属性（第3.3节）。

contents.text: XmlNotWellFrmd XML not well formed. The XML document is not well formed. See [XML] for the meaning of "well formed". Even if the XML is not well formed, it should still be scanned to find the Transaction Reference Block so that a properly formed Error Response may be generated.
contents.zh-CHS: XmlNotWellFrmd XML格式不正确。XML文档的格式不正确。有关“格式良好”的含义，请参见[XML]。即使XML格式不正确，也应扫描它以查找事务参考块，以便生成格式正确的错误响应。

contents.text: XmlNotValid XML not valid. The XML document is well formed but the document is not valid. See [XML] for the meaning of "valid". Specifically: o the XML document does not comply with the constraints defined in the IOTP document type declaration (DTD) (see section 13 Internet Open Trading Protocol Data Type Definition), and o the XML document does not comply with the constraints defined in the document type declaration of any additional [XML Namespace] that are declared.
contents.zh-CHS: XmlNotValid XML无效。XML文档格式正确，但文档无效。有关“有效”的含义，请参见[XML]。具体而言：o XML文档不符合IOTP文档类型声明（DTD）中定义的约束（参见第13节互联网开放交易协议数据类型定义），并且o XML文档不符合所声明的任何其他[XML命名空间]的文档类型声明中定义的约束。

contents.text: As for XML not well formed, attempts should still be made to extract the Transaction Reference Block so that a properly formed Error Response may be generated.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于格式不正确的XML，仍应尝试提取事务引用块，以便生成格式正确的错误响应。

contents.text: ElUnexpected Unexpected element. Although the XML document is well formed and valid, an element is present that is not expected in the particular context according to the rules and constraints contained in this specification.
contents.zh-CHS: ElUnexpected意外元素。尽管XML文档格式良好且有效，但根据本规范中包含的规则和约束，存在特定上下文中不需要的元素。

contents.text: ElNotSupp Element not supported. Although the document is well formed and valid, an element is present that: o is consistent with the rules and constraints contained in this specification, but o is not supported by the IOTP Aware Application which is processing the IOTP Message.
contents.zh-CHS: 不支持ElNotSupp元素。尽管文档格式良好且有效，但存在一个元素：o与本规范中包含的规则和约束一致，但处理IOTP消息的IOTP感知应用程序不支持o。

contents.text: ElMissing Element missing. Although the document is well formed and valid, an element is missing that should have been present if the rules and constraints contained in this specification are followed.
contents.zh-CHS: 缺少ElMissing元素。尽管文档格式良好且有效，但如果遵循本规范中包含的规则和约束，则缺少本应存在的元素。

contents.text: In this case set the PackagedContent of the Error Component to the type of the missing element.
contents.zh-CHS: 在这种情况下，将错误组件的PackagedContent设置为缺少元素的类型。

contents.text: ElContIllegal Element content illegal. Although the document is well formed and valid, the element Content contains values which do not conform to the rules and constraints contained in this specification.
contents.zh-CHS: ELCONTLIVALL元素内容非法。尽管文档格式良好且有效，但元素内容包含的值不符合本规范中包含的规则和约束。

contents.text: EncapProtErr Encapsulated protocol error. Although the document is well formed and valid, the PackagedContent of an element contains data from an encapsulated protocol which contains errors.
contents.zh-CHS: EncapProperter封装的协议错误。尽管文档格式良好且有效，但元素的PackagedContent包含来自包含错误的封装协议的数据。

contents.text: AttUnexpected Unexpected attribute. Although the XML document is well formed and valid, the presence of the attribute is not expected in the particular context according to the rules and constraints contained in this specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 意外属性。尽管XML文档格式良好且有效，但根据本规范中包含的规则和约束，在特定上下文中不需要属性的存在。

contents.text: AttNotSupp Attribute not supported. Although the XML document is well formed and valid, and the presence of the attribute in an element is consistent with the rules and constraints contained in this specification, it is not supported by the IOTP Aware Application which is processing the IOTP Message.
contents.zh-CHS: 不支持AttNotSupp属性。尽管XML文档格式良好且有效，并且元素中属性的存在符合本规范中包含的规则和约束，但处理IOTP消息的IOTP感知应用程序不支持该文档。

contents.text: AttMissing Attribute missing. Although the document is well formed and valid, an attribute is missing that should have been present if the rules and constraints contained in this specification are followed.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性缺失。尽管文档格式良好且有效，但如果遵循本规范中包含的规则和约束，则缺少本应存在的属性。

contents.text: In this case set the PackagedContent of the Error Component to the type of the missing attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 在这种情况下，将错误组件的PackagedContent设置为缺少属性的类型。

contents.text: AttValIllegal Attribute value illegal. The attribute contains a value which does not conform to the rules and constraints contained in this specification.
contents.zh-CHS: AttValIllegal属性值非法。该属性包含的值不符合本规范中包含的规则和约束。

contents.text: AttValNotRecog Attribute Value Not Recognised. The attribute contains a value which the IOTP Aware Application generating the message reporting the error could not recognise.
contents.zh-CHS: 无法识别AttValNotRecog属性值。该属性包含一个值，生成报告错误的消息的IOTP感知应用程序无法识别该值。

contents.text: MsgTooLarge Message too large. The message is too large to be processed by the IOTP Aware Application.
contents.zh-CHS: MsgTooLarge消息太大。消息太大，IOTP感知应用程序无法处理。

contents.text: ElTooLarge Element too large. The element is too large to be processed by the IOTP Aware Application
contents.zh-CHS: ELTOOLAGE元素太大。元素太大，IOTP感知应用程序无法处理

contents.text: ValueTooSmall Value too small or early. The value of all or part of the Content of an element or an attribute, although valid, is too small.
contents.zh-CHS: 值太小值太小或太早。元素或属性的全部或部分内容的值虽然有效，但太小。

contents.text: ValueTooLarge Value too large or in the future. The value of all or part of the Content of an element or an attribute, although valid, is too large.
contents.zh-CHS: ValueTooLarge值太大或在将来。元素或属性的全部或部分内容的值（虽然有效）太大。

contents.text: ElInconsistent Element Inconsistent. Although the document is well formed and valid, according to the rules and constraints contained in this specification: o the content of an element is inconsistent with the content of other elements or their attributes, or o the value of an attribute is inconsistent with the value of one or more other attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 元素不一致。尽管文档格式良好且有效，但根据本规范中包含的规则和约束：o元素的内容与其他元素或其属性的内容不一致，或o属性的值与一个或多个其他属性的值不一致。

contents.text: In this case create ErrorLocation elements which identify all the attributes or elements which are inconsistent.
contents.zh-CHS: 在这种情况下，创建ErrorLocation元素，该元素标识所有不一致的属性或元素。

contents.text: TransportError Transport Error. This error code is used to indicate that there is a problem with the Transport Mechanism which is preventing the message from being received. It is typically associated with a Transient Error. Explanation of the Transport Error is contained within the ErrorDesc attribute. The values which can be used inside ErrorDesc with a TransportError is specified in the IOTP supplement for the Transport mechanism.
contents.zh-CHS: 传输错误传输错误。此错误代码用于指示传输机制存在问题，导致无法接收消息。它通常与瞬时误差有关。传输错误的解释包含在ErrorDesc属性中。传输机制的IOTP补充文件中规定了可在带有TransportError的ErrorDesc内部使用的值。

contents.text: MsgBeingProc Message Being Processed. This error code is only used with a Severity of Transient Error. It indicates that the previous message, which may be an exchange message or a request message, is being processed and, if no response is received by the time indicated by the MinRetrySecs attribute, then the original message should be resent.
contents.zh-CHS: 正在处理MsgBeingProc消息。此错误代码仅在严重程度为暂时错误时使用。它表示前一条消息（可能是交换消息或请求消息）正在处理中，如果在MinRetrySecs属性指示的时间内未收到响应，则应重新发送原始消息。

contents.text: SystemBusy System Busy. This error code is only used with a Severity of Transient Error. It indicates that the server that received a message is currently too busy to handle the message. If no response is received by
contents.zh-CHS: 系统忙系统忙。此错误代码仅在严重程度为暂时错误时使用。它表示接收消息的服务器当前太忙，无法处理该消息。如果没有收到响应

contents.text: the time indicated by the MinRetrySecs attribute, then the original message should be resent.
contents.zh-CHS: MinRetrySecs属性指示的时间，则应重新发送原始消息。

contents.text: Note: If the server/system handling the Transport Mechanism (e.g., HTTP) is busy then a Transport Specific error message should be used instead of an IOTP Error message. This code should be used in association with IOTP servers/systems or other servers/systems to which the IOTP server is connected.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：如果处理传输机制（例如HTTP）的服务器/系统正忙，则应使用传输特定的错误消息，而不是IOTP错误消息。此代码应与IOTP服务器/系统或IOTP服务器所连接的其他服务器/系统一起使用。

contents.text: UnknownError Unknown Error. Indicates that the transaction cannot complete for some reason that is not covered explicitly by any of the other errors. The ErrorDesc attribute should be used to indicate the nature of the problem.
contents.zh-CHS: 未知错误未知错误。表示由于其他任何错误都没有明确说明的原因，事务无法完成。ErrorDesc属性应用于指示问题的性质。

contents.text: This could be used to indicate, for example, an internal error in a backend server or client process of some kind.
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，这可用于指示后端服务器或某种客户端进程中的内部错误。

contents.text: 7.21.3 Error Location Element
contents.zh-CHS: 7.21.3 错误定位元素

contents.text: An Error Location Element identifies an element and optionally an attribute in the message in error which is associated with the error. It contains a reference to the IOTP Message, Trading Block, Trading Component, element and attribute, which is in error.
contents.zh-CHS: 错误位置元素标识一个元素，还可以标识错误消息中与错误关联的属性。它包含对错误的IOTP消息、交易块、交易组件、元素和属性的引用。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT ErrorLocation EMPTY >
<!ATTLIST ErrorLocation
 ElementType        NMTOKEN #REQUIRED
 IotpMsgRef         NMTOKEN #IMPLIED
 BlkRef             NMTOKEN #IMPLIED
 CompRef            NMTOKEN #IMPLIED
 ElementRef         NMTOKEN #IMPLIED
 AttName            NMTOKEN #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ElementType This is the name of the type of the element where the error is located. For example if the element was declared as <!ELEMENT Org ... then its name is "Org".
contents.zh-CHS: ElementType这是错误所在元素类型的名称。例如，如果元素被声明为<！元素组织。。。然后它的名字是“Org”。

contents.text: IotpMsgRef This is the value of the ID attribute of the of the Message Id Component (see section 3.3.2) of the message in error to which this Error Component applies.
contents.zh-CHS: IotpMsgRef这是该错误组件适用的错误消息的消息ID组件（见第3.3.2节）的ID属性的值。

contents.text: BlkRef If the error is associated with a specific Trading Block, then this is the value of the ID attribute of the Trading Block where the error is located.
contents.zh-CHS: BlkRef如果错误与特定交易区块关联，则这是错误所在交易区块的ID属性值。

contents.text: CompRef If the error is associated with a specific Trading Component, then this is the value of the ID attribute of the Trading Component where the error is located.
contents.zh-CHS: CompRef如果错误与特定交易组件关联，则这是错误所在交易组件的ID属性值。

contents.text: ElementRef If the error is associated with a specific element within a Trading Component then, if the element has an attribute with an "attribute type" (see [XML]) of "ID", then this is the value of that attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: ElementRef如果错误与交易组件中的特定元素相关联，则如果该元素具有“属性类型”（参见[XML]）为“ID”的属性，则这是该属性的值。

contents.text: AttName If the error is associated with the value of an attribute, then this is the name of that attribute. In this case the PackagedContent of the Error Component should contain the value of the attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: AttName如果错误与属性值关联，则这是该属性的名称。在这种情况下，错误组件的PackagedContent应该包含该属性的值。

contents.text: Note that as many as the attributes as possible should be included. For example if an attribute in a child element of a Trading Component contains an incorrect value, then all the attributes of ErrorLocation should be present.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，应包含尽可能多的属性。例如，如果交易组件的子元素中的属性包含不正确的值，那么ErrorLocation的所有属性都应该存在。

contents.text: 8. Trading Blocks
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 交易区块

contents.text: Trading Blocks are child elements of the top level IOTP Messages that are sent in the form of [XML] documents directly between the different Trading Roles that are taking part in a trade.
contents.zh-CHS: 交易区块是顶级IOTP消息的子元素，以[XML]文档的形式直接在参与交易的不同交易角色之间发送。

contents.text: Each Trading Blocks consist of one or more Trading Components (see section 7). This is illustrated in the diagram below.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个交易区块由一个或多个交易组成（见第7节）。下图对此进行了说明。

contents.text:
IOTP MESSAGE  <-----------IOTP Message - an XML Document
           |                        which is transported between the
           |                        Trading Roles
           |-Trans Ref Block <----- Trans Ref Block - contains
           |  |                     information which describes the
           |  |                     IOTP Transaction and the IOTP
           |  |                     Message.
           |  |-Trans Id Comp. <--- Transaction Id Component -
           |  |                     uniquely identifies the IOTP
           |  |                     Transaction. The Trans Id
           |  |                     Components are the same across
           |  |                     all IOTP messages that comprise a
           |  |                     single IOTP transaction.
           |  |-Msg Id Comp. <----- Message Id Component - identifies
           |                        and describes an IOTP Message
           |                        within an IOTP Transaction
           |-Signature Block <----- Signature Block (optional) -
           |  |                     contains one or more Signature
           |  |                     Components and their associated
           |  |                     Certificates
           |  |-Signature Comp. <-- Signature Component - contains
           |  |                     digital signatures. Signatures
           |  |                     may sign digests of the Trans Ref
           |  |                     Block and any Trading Component
           |  |                     in any IOTP Message in the same
           |  |                     IOTP Transaction.
           |  |-Certificate Comp. <-Certificate Component. Used to
           |                        check the signature. (Optional)
   ------> |-Trading Block <--------Trading Block - an XML Element
  |        |  |-Trading Comp.       within an IOTP Message that
Trading    |  |-Trading Comp.       contains a predefined set of
Blocks     |  |-Trading Comp.       Trading Components
  |        |  |-Trading Comp.
  |        |  |-Trading Comp. <-----Trading Components - XML Elements
  |        |                        within a Trading Block that
   ------> |-Trading Block          contain a predefined set of XML
           |  |-Trading Comp.       elements and attributes
           |  |-Trading Comp.       containing information required
           |  |-Trading Comp.       to support a Trading Exchange
           |  |-Trading Comp.
           |  |-Trading Comp.
           |
*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
Figure 16 Trading Blocks
contents.zh-CHS: 图16交易区块

contents.text: Trading Blocks are defined as part of the definition of an IOTP Message (see section 3.1.1). The definition of an IOTP Message element is repeated here:
contents.zh-CHS: 交易区块定义为IOTP消息定义的一部分（见第3.1.1节）。此处重复IOTP消息元素的定义：

contents.text: <!ELEMENT IotpMessage ( TransRefBlk, SigBlk?, ErrorBlk?, ( AuthReqBlk | AuthRespBlk | AuthStatusBlk | CancelBlk | DeliveryReqBlk | DeliveryRespBlk | InquiryReqBlk | InquiryRespBlk | OfferRespBlk | PayExchBlk | PayReqBlk | PayRespBlk | PingReqBlk | PingRespBlk | TpoBlk | TpoSelectionBlk )* ) >
contents.zh-CHS: <!元素IotpMessage（TransRefBlk，SigBlk？，ErrorBlk？，（AuthReqBlk | AuthRespBlk | AuthStatusBlk | CancelBlk | DeliveryReqBlk | DeliveryReqBlk | InquiryReqBlk | InquiryRespBlk | offerSpblk | payXchblk | PayReqBlk | payPayReqblk | PayRespBlk | PayReqBlk | PayReqBlk | PingReqBlk | PingReqbl

contents.text: The remainder of this section defines the Trading Blocks in this version of IOTP. They are:
contents.zh-CHS: 本节剩余部分定义了本版本IOTP中的交易区块。他们是：

contents.text: o Authentication Request Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 身份验证请求块

contents.text: o Authentication Response Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 身份验证响应块

contents.text: o Authentication Status Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 身份验证状态块

contents.text: o Cancel Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 取消块

contents.text: o Delivery Request Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 传递请求块

contents.text: o Delivery Response Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 传递响应块

contents.text: o Error Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 错误块

contents.text: o Inquiry Request Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 查询请求块

contents.text: o Inquiry Response Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 查询响应块

contents.text: o Offer Response Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 报价响应块

contents.text: o Payment Exchange Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 支付交换区

contents.text: o Payment Request Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 付款请求块

contents.text: o Payment Response Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 支付响应块

contents.text: o Signature Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 签名块

contents.text: o Trading Protocol Options Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 交易协议期权组

contents.text: o TPO Selection Block
contents.zh-CHS: o TPO选择块

contents.text: The Transaction Reference Block is described in section 3.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 第3.3节描述了事务参考块。

contents.text: 8.1 Trading Protocol Options Block
contents.zh-CHS: 8.1 交易协议期权组

contents.text: The TPO Trading Block contains options which apply to the IOTP Transaction. The definition of a TPO Trading Block is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: TPO交易区块包含适用于IOTP交易的选项。TPO交易区块的定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT TpoBlk ( ProtocolOptions, BrandList*, Org* ) >
<!ATTLIST TpoBlk
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Trading Protocol Options Block within the IOTP Transaction (see section 3.4 ID Attributes).
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP交易中交易协议选项块的标识符（见第3.4节ID属性）。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: ProtocolOptions The Protocol Options Component (see section 7.1)defines the options which apply to the whole IOTP Transaction (see section 9).
contents.zh-CHS: 协议选项协议选项组件（见第7.1节）定义了适用于整个IOTP事务的选项（见第9节）。

contents.text: BrandList This Brand List Component contains one or more payment brands and protocols which may be selected (see section 7.7).
contents.zh-CHS: 品牌列表该品牌列表组件包含一个或多个可选择的支付品牌和协议（见第7.7节）。

contents.text: Org The Organisation Components (see section 7.6) identify the Organisations and their roles in the IOTP Transaction. The roles and Organisations which must be present will depend on the particular type of IOTP Transaction. See the definition of each transaction in section 9. Internet Open Trading Protocol Transactions.
contents.zh-CHS: 组织组织组成部分（见第7.6节）确定组织及其在IOTP交易中的角色。必须出席的角色和组织将取决于IOTP交易的特定类型。参见第9节中每个交易的定义。互联网开放交易协议交易。

contents.text: The TPO Block should contain:
contents.zh-CHS: TPO块应包含：

contents.text: o the Protocol Options Component
contents.zh-CHS: o 协议选项组件

contents.text: o the Organisation Component with the Trading Role of Merchant
contents.zh-CHS: o 具有商户交易角色的组织组成部分

contents.text: o the Organisation Component with the Trading Role of Consumer
contents.zh-CHS: o 具有消费者交易角色的组织组成部分

contents.text: o optionally, the Organisation Component with the Trading Role of DeliverTo, if there is a Delivery included in the IOTP Transaction
contents.zh-CHS: o （可选）如果IOTP交易中包含交付，则具有DeliverTo交易角色的组织组成部分

contents.text: o Brand List Components for each payment in the IOTP Transaction
contents.zh-CHS: o IOTP交易中每次付款的品牌列表组件

contents.text: o Organisation Components for all the Payment Handlers involved
contents.zh-CHS: o 所有相关支付处理人员的组织构成

contents.text: o optionally, Organisation Components for the Delivery Handler (if any) for the transaction
contents.zh-CHS: o （可选）交易交付处理人（如果有）的组织组件

contents.text: o additional Organisation Components that the Merchant may want to include. For example
contents.zh-CHS: o 商户可能希望包括的其他组织组件。例如

contents.text: - a Customer Care Provider
contents.zh-CHS: - 客户服务提供者

contents.text: - an Certificate Authority that offers Merchant "Credentials" or some other warranty on the goods or services being offered.
contents.zh-CHS: - 一种证书颁发机构，提供商户“凭证”或对所提供商品或服务的其他担保。

contents.text: 8.2 TPO Selection Block
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2 TPO选择块

contents.text: The TPO Selection Block contains the results of selections made from the options contained in the Trading Protocol Options Block (see section 8.1).The definition of a TPO Selection Block is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: TPO选择块包含从交易协议选项块中包含的选项进行选择的结果（参见第8.1节）。TPO选择块的定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT TpoSelectionBlk (BrandSelection+) >
<!ATTLIST TpoSelectionBlk
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the TPO Selection Block within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP事务中TPO选择块的标识符。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: BrandSelection This identifies the choice of payment brand and payment protocol to be used in a payment within the IOTP Transaction. There is one Brand Selection Component (see section 7.8) for each payment to be made in the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: 品牌选择-标识在IOTP交易中用于支付的支付品牌和支付协议的选择。IOTP交易中的每笔付款都有一个品牌选择组件（见第7.8节）。

contents.text: The TPO Selection Block should contain one Brand Selection Component for each Brand List in the TPO Block.
contents.zh-CHS: TPO选择块应包含TPO块中每个品牌列表的一个品牌选择组件。

contents.text: 8.3 Offer Response Block
contents.zh-CHS: 8.3 报价响应块

contents.text: The Offer Response Block contains details of the goods, services, amount, delivery instructions or financial transaction which is to take place. Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 报价响应栏包含货物、服务、金额、交货说明或即将发生的金融交易的详细信息。其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT OfferRespBlk (Status, Order?, Payment*,
             Delivery?, TradingRoleData*) >
<!ATTLIST OfferRespBlk
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Offer Response Block within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP事务中的报价响应块的标识符。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: Status Contains status information about the business success (see section 4.2) or failure of the generation of the Offer. Note that in an Offer Response Block, a ProcessState of NotYetStarted or InProgress are illegal values.
contents.zh-CHS: Status包含有关业务成功（见第4.2节）或生成报价失败的状态信息。请注意，在提供响应块中，NotYetStarted或InProgress的ProcessState是非法值。

contents.text: Order The Order Component contains details about the goods, services or financial transaction which is taking place see section 7.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 订单订单组件包含有关正在进行的商品、服务或金融交易的详细信息，请参见第7.5节。

contents.text: The Order Component must be present unless the ProcessState attribute of the Status Component is set to Failed.
contents.zh-CHS: 除非状态组件的ProcessState属性设置为Failed，否则订单组件必须存在。

contents.text: Payment The Payment Components contain information about the payments which are to be made see section 7.9.
contents.zh-CHS: 付款付款组成部分包含有关要进行的付款的信息，请参见第7.9节。

contents.text: Delivery The Delivery Component contains details of the delivery to be made (see section 7.13).
contents.zh-CHS: 交付交付组件包含待交付的详细信息（见第7.13节）。

contents.text: TradingRoleData The Trading Role Data Component contains opaque data which is needs to be communicated between the Trading Roles involved in an IOTP Transaction (see section 7.17).
contents.zh-CHS: TradingRoleData交易角色数据组件包含不透明数据，需要在IOTP交易中涉及的交易角色之间进行沟通（见第7.17节）。

contents.text: The Offer Response Block should contain:
contents.zh-CHS: 报价响应块应包含：

contents.text: o the Order Component for the IOTP Transaction
contents.zh-CHS: o IOTP事务的订单组件

contents.text: o Payment Components for each Payment in the IOTP Transaction
contents.zh-CHS: o IOTP交易中每笔支付的支付组件

contents.text: o the Delivery Component the IOTP Transaction requires (if any).
contents.zh-CHS: o IOTP事务所需的交付组件（如有）。

contents.text: 8.4 Authentication Request Block
contents.zh-CHS: 8.4 身份验证请求块

contents.text: The Authentication Request Block contains the data which is used by one Trading Role to obtain information about and optionally authenticate another Trading Role.
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证请求块包含一个交易角色用来获取另一个交易角色的信息并可选地对其进行身份验证的数据。

contents.text: In outline it contains:
contents.zh-CHS: 其概要包括：

contents.text: o information about how the authentication itself will be carried out, and/or
contents.zh-CHS: o 有关如何执行身份验证本身的信息，和/或

contents.text: o a request for additional information about the Organisation being authenticated.
contents.zh-CHS: o 关于被认证组织的附加信息的请求。

contents.text: Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT AuthReqBlk (AuthReq*, TradingRoleInfoReq?) >
<!ATTLIST AuthReqBlk
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Authentication Request Block within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP事务中身份验证请求块的标识符。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: AuthReq Each Authentication Request (see section 7.2) component describes an alternative way in which the recipient of the Authentication Request may authenticate themselves by generating an Authentication Response Component (see section 7.3).
contents.zh-CHS: AuthReq每个身份验证请求（见第7.2节）组件描述了身份验证请求的接收者可以通过生成身份验证响应组件（见第7.3节）对自己进行身份验证的替代方式。

contents.text: If one Authentication Request Component is present then that Authentication Request Component should be used.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果存在一个身份验证请求组件，则应使用该身份验证请求组件。

contents.text: If more than one Authentication Request Component is present then the recipient should choose one of the components based on personal preference of the recipient or their software.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果存在多个身份验证请求组件，则收件人应根据收件人或其软件的个人偏好选择其中一个组件。

contents.text: If no Authentication Request Component is present it means that the Authentication Request Block is requesting the return of Organisation Components as specified in the Trading Role Information Request Component.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果不存在任何身份验证请求组件，则表示身份验证请求块正在请求退回交易角色信息请求组件中指定的组织组件。

contents.text: TradingRoleInfoReq The Trading Role Information Request Component (see section 7.4) contains a list of Trading Roles about which information is being requested
contents.zh-CHS: TradingRoleInfo交易角色信息请求组件（见第7.4节）包含请求信息的交易角色列表

contents.text: There must be at least one Component (either an Authentication Request or a Trading Role Information Request) within the Authentication Block otherwise it is an error.
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证块中必须至少有一个组件（身份验证请求或交易角色信息请求），否则这是一个错误。

contents.text: 8.5 Authentication Response Block
contents.zh-CHS: 8.5 身份验证响应块

contents.text: The Authentication Response Block contains the response which results from processing the Authentication Request Block. Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证响应块包含处理身份验证请求块所产生的响应。其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT AuthRespBlk (AuthResp?, Org*) >
<!ATTLIST AuthRespBlk
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Authentication Response Block within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP事务中身份验证响应块的标识符。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: AuthResp The optional Authentication Response Component which contains the results of processing the Authentication Request Component - see section 7.3.
contents.zh-CHS: AuthResp可选的身份验证响应组件，其中包含处理身份验证请求组件的结果-请参阅第7.3节。

contents.text: Org Optional Organisation Components that contain information corresponding to the Trading Roles as requested by the TradingRoleList attribute of the Trading Role Information Request component.
contents.zh-CHS: 组织可选组织组件，包含交易角色信息请求组件的TradingRoleList属性请求的与交易角色对应的信息。

contents.text: The components present in the Authentication Response Block must match the requirement of the corresponding Authentication Request Block otherwise it is an error.
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证响应块中存在的组件必须与相应身份验证请求块的要求相匹配，否则这是一个错误。

contents.text: 8.6 Authentication Status Block
contents.zh-CHS: 8.6 身份验证状态块

contents.text: The Authentication Status Block indicates the success or failure of the validation of an Authentication Response Block by an Authenticator. Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证状态块指示验证器验证身份验证响应块的成功或失败。其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT AuthStatusBlk (Status) >
<!ATTLIST AuthStatusBlk
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Authentication Status Block within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP事务中身份验证状态块的标识符。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: Status Contains status information about the business success (see section 4.2) or failure of the authentication
contents.zh-CHS: Status包含有关业务成功（参见第4.2节）或身份验证失败的状态信息

contents.text: 8.7 Payment Request Block
contents.zh-CHS: 8.7 付款请求块

contents.text: The Payment Request Block contains information which requests that a payment is started. Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 付款请求块包含请求开始付款的信息。其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT PayReqBlk (Status+, BrandList, BrandSelection,
     Payment, PaySchemeData?, Org*, TradingRoleData*) >
<!ATTLIST PayReqBlk
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Payment Request Block within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP交易中付款请求块的标识符。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: Status Contains the Status Components (see section 7.13) of the responses of the steps (e.g., an Offer Response and/or a Payment Response) on which this
contents.zh-CHS: Status（状态）包含响应步骤（例如，报价响应和/或付款响应）的状态组件（见第7.13节）

contents.text: step depends. It is used to indicate the success or failure of those steps. Payment should only occur if the previous steps were successful.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤取决于。它用于指示这些步骤的成功或失败。只有在前面的步骤成功的情况下，才应进行付款。

contents.text: BrandList The Brand List Component contains a list of one or more payment brands and protocols which may be selected (see section 7.7).
contents.zh-CHS: 品牌列表品牌列表组件包含一个或多个可选择的支付品牌和协议列表（见第7.7节）。

contents.text: BrandSelection This identifies the choice of payment brand, the payment protocol and the Payment Handler to be used in a payment within the IOTP Transaction. There is one Brand Selection Component (see section 7.8) for each payment to be made in the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: 品牌选择-标识在IOTP交易中用于支付的支付品牌、支付协议和支付处理程序的选择。IOTP交易中的每笔付款都有一个品牌选择组件（见第7.8节）。

contents.text: Payment The Payment Components contain information about the payment which is being made see section 7.9.
contents.zh-CHS: 付款付款组件包含有关正在进行的付款的信息，请参见第7.9节。

contents.text: PaySchemeData The Payment Scheme Component contains payment scheme specific data see section 7.10.
contents.zh-CHS: PaySchemeData支付方案组件包含特定于支付方案的数据，请参见第7.10节。

contents.text: Org The Organisation Component contains details of Organisations involved in the payment (see section 7.6). The Organisations present are dependent on the IOTP Transaction and the data which is to be signed. See section 6 Digital Signatures for more details.
contents.zh-CHS: 组织-组织部分包含参与付款的组织的详细信息（见第7.6节）。在场的组织取决于IOTP交易和待签署的数据。有关更多详细信息，请参见第6节数字签名。

contents.text: TradingRoleData The Trading Role Data Component contains opaque data which is needs to be communicated between the Trading Roles involved in an IOTP Transaction (see section 7.17).
contents.zh-CHS: TradingRoleData交易角色数据组件包含不透明数据，需要在IOTP交易中涉及的交易角色之间进行沟通（见第7.17节）。

contents.text: The Payment Request Block should contain:
contents.zh-CHS: 付款请求块应包含：

contents.text: o the Organisation Component with a Trading Role of Merchant
contents.zh-CHS: o 具有商户交易角色的组织组成部分

contents.text: o the Organisation Component with the Trading Role of Consumer
contents.zh-CHS: o 具有消费者交易角色的组织组成部分

contents.text: o the Payment Component for the Payment
contents.zh-CHS: o 付款的付款组件

contents.text: o the Brand List Component for the Payment
contents.zh-CHS: o 用于付款的品牌列表组件

contents.text: o the Brand Selection Component for the Brand List
contents.zh-CHS: o 品牌列表的品牌选择组件

contents.text: o the Organisation Component for the Payment Handler of the Payment
contents.zh-CHS: o 付款的付款处理程序的组织组件

contents.text: o the Organisation Component (if any) for the Organisation which carried out the previous step, for example another Payment Handler
contents.zh-CHS: o 执行前一步骤的组织的组织组成部分（如有），例如另一个付款处理人

contents.text: o the Organisation Component for the Organisation which is to carry out the next step, if any. This may be, for example, either a Delivery Handler or a Payment Handler.
contents.zh-CHS: o 要执行下一步的组织的组织组成部分（如有）。例如，这可能是交付处理程序或付款处理程序。

contents.text: o the Organisation Components for any additional Organisations that the Merchant has included in the Offer Response Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 商户已包含在报价响应块中的任何其他组织的组织组件

contents.text: o an Optional Payment Scheme Data Component, if required by the Payment Method as defined in the IOTP supplement for the payment method
contents.zh-CHS: o 可选的付款方案数据组件，如果付款方法需要，如付款方法的IOTP补充文件中所定义

contents.text: o any Trading Role Data Components that may be required (see section 7.17.1).
contents.zh-CHS: o 可能需要的任何交易角色数据组件（见第7.17.1节）。

contents.text: 8.8 Payment Exchange Block
contents.zh-CHS: 8.8 支付交换区

contents.text: The Payment Exchange Block contains payment scheme specific data which is exchanged between two of the roles in a trade. Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 支付交换块包含交易中两个角色之间交换的特定于支付方案的数据。其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT PayExchBlk (PaySchemeData+) >
<!ATTLIST PayExchBlk
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Payment Exchange Block within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP交易中支付交换块的标识符。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: PaySchemeData This Trading Component contains payment scheme specific data see section 7.10 Payment Scheme Component.
contents.zh-CHS: PaySchemeData此交易组件包含特定于支付方案的数据，请参见第7.10节支付方案组件。

contents.text: 8.9 Payment Response Block
contents.zh-CHS: 8.9 支付响应块
