contents.text: This Payment Response Block contains a information about the Payment Status, an optional Payment Receipt, and an optional payment protocol message. Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 此付款响应块包含有关付款状态的信息、可选付款收据和可选付款协议消息。其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT PayRespBlk (Status, PayReceipt?, PaySchemeData?,
     PaymentNote?, TradingRoleData*) >
<!ATTLIST PayRespBlk
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Payment Response Block within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP交易中支付响应块的标识符。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: Status Contains status information about the business success (see section 4.2) or failure of the payment. Note that in a Pay Response Block, a ProcessState of NotYetStarted or InProgress are illegal values.
contents.zh-CHS: Status包含有关业务成功（见第4.2节）或付款失败的状态信息。请注意，在支付响应块中，NotYetStarted或InProgress的ProcessState是非法值。

contents.text: PayReceipt Contains payment scheme specific data which can be used to verify the payment occurred. See section 7.11 Payment Receipt Component. It must be present if the ProcessState attribute of the Status Component is set to CompletedOk. PayReceipt is optional for other values as specified by the appropriate Payment Scheme supplement.
contents.zh-CHS: PayReceive包含特定于付款方案的数据，可用于验证已发生的付款。参见第7.11节“付款收据”部分。如果状态组件的ProcessState属性设置为CompletedOk，则它必须存在。对于适当的付款方案补充文件中指定的其他值，付款收据是可选的。

contents.text: PaySchemeData Contains payment scheme specific data see section, for example a payment protocol message. See 7.10 Payment Scheme Component.
contents.zh-CHS: PaySchemeData包含特定于支付方案的数据，请参见第节，例如支付协议消息。见7.10付款方案组成部分。

contents.text: PaymentNote Contains additional, non payment related, information which the Payment Handler wants to provide to the Consumer. For example, if a withdrawal or deposit were being made then it could contain information on the remaining balance on the account after the transfer was complete. See section 7.12 Payment Note Component.
contents.zh-CHS: PaymentNote包含支付处理程序希望向消费者提供的其他非支付相关信息。例如，如果正在进行取款或存款，则该取款或存款可能包含转账完成后账户上剩余余额的信息。见第7.12节付款通知单组成部分。

contents.text: TradingRoleData The Trading Role Data Component contains opaque data which is needs to be communicated between the Trading Roles involved in an IOTP Transaction (see section 7.17).
contents.zh-CHS: TradingRoleData交易角色数据组件包含不透明数据，需要在IOTP交易中涉及的交易角色之间进行沟通（见第7.17节）。

contents.text: 8.10 Delivery Request Block
contents.zh-CHS: 8.10 传递请求块

contents.text: The Delivery Request Block contains details of the goods or services which are to be delivered together with a signature which can be used to check that delivery is authorised. Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: “交货请求”栏包含将要交付的货物或服务的详细信息，以及可用于检查交付是否得到授权的签名。其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT DeliveryReqBlk (Status+, Order, Org*, Delivery,
     ConsumerDeliveryData?, TradingRoleData*) >
<!ATTLIST DeliveryReqBlk
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Delivery Request Block within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP事务中传递请求块的标识符。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: Status Contains the Status Components (see section 7.13) of the responses of the steps (e.g., a Payment Response) on which this step is dependent. It is used to indicate the success or failure of those steps. Delivery should only occur if the previous steps were successful.
contents.zh-CHS: Status包含本步骤所依赖的步骤（如付款响应）响应的状态组件（见第7.13节）。它用于指示这些步骤的成功或失败。只有在前面的步骤成功的情况下，才能进行交付。

contents.text: Order The Order Component contains details about the goods, services or financial transaction which is taking place see section 7.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 订单订单组件包含有关正在进行的商品、服务或金融交易的详细信息，请参见第7.5节。

contents.text: The Organisation Components (see section 7.6) identify the Organisations and their roles in Org the IOTP Transaction. The roles and Organisations which must be present will depend on the particular type of IOTP Transaction. See the definition of each transaction in section 9. Internet Open Trading Protocol Transactions.
contents.zh-CHS: 组织组成部分（见第7.6节）确定了组织及其在IOTP交易中的角色。必须出席的角色和组织将取决于IOTP交易的特定类型。参见第9节中每个交易的定义。互联网开放交易协议交易。

contents.text: Delivery The Delivery Component contains details of the delivery to be made (see section 7.13).
contents.zh-CHS: 交付交付组件包含待交付的详细信息（见第7.13节）。

contents.text: ConsumerDeliveryData Optional. Contains an identifier specified by the Consumer which, if returned by the Delivery Handler will enable the Consumer to identify which Delivery is being referred to.
contents.zh-CHS: ConsumerDeliveryData可选。包含使用者指定的标识符，如果传递处理程序返回该标识符，将使使用者能够标识引用的传递。

contents.text: TradingRoleData The Trading Role Data Component contains opaque data which is needs to be communicated between the Trading Roles involved in an IOTP Transaction (see section 7.17).
contents.zh-CHS: TradingRoleData交易角色数据组件包含不透明数据，需要在IOTP交易中涉及的交易角色之间进行沟通（见第7.17节）。

contents.text: The Delivery Request Block contains:
contents.zh-CHS: 传递请求块包含：

contents.text: o the Organisation Component with a Trading Role of Merchant
contents.zh-CHS: o 具有商户交易角色的组织组成部分

contents.text: o the Organisation Component for the Consumer and DeliverTo Trading Roles
contents.zh-CHS: o 消费者和发货人交易角色的组织组成部分

contents.text: o the Delivery Component for the Delivery
contents.zh-CHS: o 交付的交付组件

contents.text: o the Organisation Component for the Delivery Handler. Specifically the Organisation Component identified by the ActionOrgRef attribute on the Delivery Component
contents.zh-CHS: o 交付处理人员的组织组件。特别是交付组件上ActionOrgRef属性标识的组织组件

contents.text: o the Organisation Component (if any) for the Organisation which carried out the previous step, for example a Payment Handler
contents.zh-CHS: o 执行前一步骤的组织的组织组成部分（如有），例如支付处理人

contents.text: o the Organisation Components for any additional Organisations that the Merchant has included in the Offer Response Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 商户已包含在报价响应块中的任何其他组织的组织组件

contents.text: o any Trading Role Data Components that may be required (see section 7.17.1).
contents.zh-CHS: o 可能需要的任何交易角色数据组件（见第7.17.1节）。

contents.text: 8.11 Delivery Response Block
contents.zh-CHS: 8.11 传递响应块

contents.text: The Delivery Response Block contains a Delivery Note containing details on how the goods will be delivered. Its definition is as follows. Note that in a Delivery Response Block a Delivery Status Element with a DeliveryStatusCode of NotYetStarted or InProgress is invalid.
contents.zh-CHS: Delivery Response块包含一个交货通知，其中包含有关如何交货的详细信息。其定义如下。请注意，在交付响应块中，DeliveryStatusCode为NotYetStarted或InProgress的交付状态元素无效。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT DeliveryRespBlk (Status, DeliveryNote) >
<!ATTLIST DeliveryRespBlk
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Delivery Response Block within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP事务中传递响应块的标识符。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: Status Contains status information about the business success (see section 4.2) or failure of the delivery. Note that in a Delivery Response Block, a ProcessState of NotYetStarted or InProgress are illegal values.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态包含有关业务成功（见第4.2节）或交付失败的状态信息。请注意，在传递响应块中，NotYetStarted或InProgress的ProcessState是非法值。

contents.text: DeliveryNote The Delivery Note Component contains details about how the goods or services will be delivered (see section 7.15).
contents.zh-CHS: 交货说明交货说明组件包含有关如何交付货物或服务的详细信息（参见第7.15节）。

contents.text: 8.12 Inquiry Request Trading Block
contents.zh-CHS: 8.12 查询要求交易组

contents.text: The Inquiry Request Trading Block contains an Inquiry Type Component and an optional Payment Scheme Component to contain payment scheme specific inquiry messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 查询请求交易块包含一个查询类型组件和一个可选的支付方案组件，用于包含特定于支付方案的查询消息。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT InquiryReqBlk ( InquiryType, PaySchemeData? ) >
<!ATTLIST InquiryReqBlk
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Inquiry Request Trading Block within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP交易中查询请求交易块的标识符。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: InquiryType Inquiry Type Component (see section 7.18) that contains the type of inquiry.
contents.zh-CHS: InquiryType查询类型组件（参见第7.18节），其中包含查询类型。

contents.text: PaySchemeData Payment Scheme Component (see section 7.10) that contains payment scheme specific inquiry messages for inquiries on payments. This is present when the Type attribute of Inquiry Type Component is Payment.
contents.zh-CHS: PaySchemeData支付方案组件（参见第7.10节），其中包含特定于支付方案的查询消息，用于查询支付。当“查询类型”组件的“类型”属性为“付款”时，会出现此选项。

contents.text: 8.13 Inquiry Response Trading Block
contents.zh-CHS: 8.13 查询回应交易组

contents.text: The Inquiry Response Trading Block contains a Status Component and an optional Payment Scheme Component to contain payment scheme specific inquiry messages. Its purpose is to enquire on the current status of an IOTP transaction at a server.
contents.zh-CHS: 查询响应交易块包含一个状态组件和一个可选的支付方案组件，用于包含特定于支付方案的查询消息。其目的是查询服务器上IOTP事务的当前状态。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT InquiryRespBlk (Status, PaySchemeData?) >
<!ATTLIST InquiryRespBlk
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED
 LastReceivedIotpMsgRef NMTOKEN #IMPLIED
 LastSentIotpMsgRef  NMTOKEN #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Inquiry Response Trading Block within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP交易中查询响应交易块的标识符。

contents.text: LastReceivedIotpMsgRef Contains an Element Reference (see section 3.5) to the Message Id Component (see section 3.3.2) of the last message this server has received from the Consumer. If there is no previously received message from the Consumer in the pertinent transaction, this attribute should be contain the value Null. This attribute exists for debugging purposes.
contents.zh-CHS: LastReceivedIotpMsgRef包含一个元素引用（参见第3.5节），指向此服务器从使用者处收到的最后一条消息的消息Id组件（参见第3.3.2节）。如果在相关事务中没有以前从消费者处接收到的消息，则此属性应包含Null值。此属性的存在是为了调试目的。

contents.text: LastSentIotpMsgRef Contains an Element Reference (see section 3.5) to the Message Id Component (see section 3.3.2) of the last message this server has sent to the Consumer. If there is no previously sent message to the Consumer in the pertinent transaction, this attribute should contain the value Null. This attribute exists for debugging purposes.
contents.zh-CHS: LastSentIotpMsgRef包含一个元素引用（参见第3.5节），指向该服务器发送给消费者的最后一条消息的消息Id组件（参见第3.3.2节）。如果相关事务中没有以前发送给消费者的消息，则此属性应包含Null值。此属性的存在是为了调试目的。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: Status Contains status information about the business success (see section 4.2) or failure of a certain trading exchange (i.e., Offer, Payment, or Delivery).
contents.zh-CHS: Status包含有关某个交易交易所（即报价、付款或交付）的业务成功（见第4.2节）或失败的状态信息。

contents.text: PaySchemeData Payment Scheme Component (see section 7.10) that contains payment scheme specific inquiry messages for inquiries on payments. This is present when the Type attribute of StatusType attribute of the Status Component is set to Payment.
contents.zh-CHS: PaySchemeData支付方案组件（参见第7.10节），其中包含特定于支付方案的查询消息，用于查询支付。当状态组件的StatusType属性的Type属性设置为Payment时，会出现这种情况。

contents.text: 8.14 Ping Request Block
contents.zh-CHS: 8.14 Ping请求块

contents.text: The Ping Request Block is used to determine if a Server is operating and whether or not cryptography is compatible.
contents.zh-CHS: Ping请求块用于确定服务器是否正在运行以及加密是否兼容。

contents.text: The definition of a Ping Request Block is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: Ping请求块的定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT PingReqBlk (Org*)>
<!ATTLIST PingReqBlk
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED>
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Ping Request Trading Block within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP事务中Ping请求交易块的标识符。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: Org Optional Organisation Components (see section 7.6).
contents.zh-CHS: 组织可选组织组件（见第7.6节）。

contents.text: If no Organisation Component is present then the Ping Request is anonymous and simply determines if the server is operating.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果不存在任何组织组件，则Ping请求是匿名的，只需确定服务器是否正在运行。

contents.text: However if Organisation Components are present, then it indicates that the sender of the Ping Request wants to verify that digital signatures can be handled.
contents.zh-CHS: 但是，如果存在组织组件，则表示Ping请求的发送方希望验证是否可以处理数字签名。

contents.text: In this case the sender includes: o an Organisation Component that identifies itself specifying the Trading Role(s) it is taking in IOTP transactions (Merchant, Payment Handler, etc.) o an Organisation Component that identifies the intended recipient of the message.
contents.zh-CHS: 在这种情况下，发送方包括：o标识自身的组织组件，指定其在IOTP交易中的交易角色（商户、支付处理人等）；o标识消息的预期收件人的组织组件。

contents.text: These are then used to generate a signature over the Ping Response Block.
contents.zh-CHS: 然后，它们用于在Ping响应块上生成签名。

contents.text: 8.15 Ping Response Block
contents.zh-CHS: 8.15 Ping响应块

contents.text: The Ping Response Trading Block provides the result of a Ping Request.
contents.zh-CHS: Ping响应交易块提供Ping请求的结果。

contents.text: It contains an Organisation Component that identifies the sender of the Ping Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 它包含一个确定Ping响应发送者的组织组件。

contents.text: If the Ping Request to which this block is a response contained Organisation Components, then it also contains those Organisation Components.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果此块响应的Ping请求包含组织组件，则它也包含这些组织组件。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT PingRespBlk (Org+)>
<!ATTLIST PingRespBlk
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED
 PingStatusCode (Ok | Busy | Down) #REQUIRED
 SigVerifyStatusCode (Ok | NotSupported | Fail) #IMPLIED
 xml:lang           NMTOKEN #IMPLIED
 PingStatusDesc     CDATA   #IMPLIED>
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Ping Request Trading Block within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP事务中Ping请求交易块的标识符。

contents.text: PingStatusCode Contains a code which shows the status of the sender software which processes IOTP messages. Valid values are: o Ok. Everything with the service is working normally, including the signature verification. o Busy. Things are working normally but there may be some delays. o Down. The server is not functioning fully but can still provide a Ping response.
contents.zh-CHS: PingStatusCode包含一个代码，显示处理IOTP消息的发送方软件的状态。有效值为：o Ok。服务的一切都正常工作，包括签名验证。哦，很忙。一切正常，但可能会有一些延误。哦，下来。服务器未完全运行，但仍可提供Ping响应。

contents.text: SigVerifyStatusCode Contains a code which shows the status of signature verification. This is present only when the message containing the Ping Request Block also contains a Signature Block. Valid values are: o Ok. The signature has successfully been verified and proved compatible. o NotSupported The receiver of this Ping Request Block does not support validation of signatures. o Fail. Signature verification failed.
contents.zh-CHS: SigVerifyStatusCode包含显示签名验证状态的代码。只有当包含Ping请求块的消息也包含签名块时，才会出现这种情况。有效值为：o Ok。签名已成功验证并证明兼容。o不支持此Ping请求块的接收器不支持签名验证。o失败。签名验证失败。

contents.text: Xml:lang Defines the language used in PingStatusDesc. This is present when PingStatusDesc is present.
contents.zh-CHS: Xml:lang定义了PingStatusDesc中使用的语言。当PingStatusDesc存在时，此选项存在。

contents.text: PingStatusDesc Contains a short description of the status of the server which sends this Ping Response Block. Servers, if their designers want, can use this
contents.zh-CHS: PingStatusDesc包含发送此Ping响应块的服务器状态的简短描述。如果设计人员愿意，服务器可以使用此功能

contents.text: attribute to send more refined status information than PingStatusCode which can be used for debugging purposes, for example.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性发送比PingStatusCode更精确的状态信息，例如，PingStatusCode可用于调试目的。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: Org These are Organisation Components (see section 7.6).
contents.zh-CHS: 这些是组织的组成部分（见第7.6节）。

contents.text: The Organisation Components of the sender of the Ping Response is always included in addition to the Organisation Components sent in the Ping Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 除了在Ping请求中发送的组织组件外，始终包括Ping响应发送方的组织组件。

contents.text: Note: Ping Status Code values do not include a value such as Fail, since, when the software receiving the Ping Request message is not working at all, no Ping Response message will be sent back.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：Ping状态代码值不包括Fail之类的值，因为当接收Ping请求消息的软件完全不工作时，不会返回Ping响应消息。

contents.text: 8.16 Signature Block
contents.zh-CHS: 8.16 签名块

contents.text: The Signature Block contains one or more Signature Components and associated Certificates (if required) which sign data associated with the IOTP Transaction. For a general discussion and introduction to how IOTP uses signatures, see section 6 Digital Signatures. The definition of the Signature Component and certificates is contained in the paper "Digital Signatures for the Internet Open Trading Protocol", see [IOTPDSIG]. Descriptions of how these are used by IOTP is contained in sections 7.19 and 7.20.
contents.zh-CHS: 签名块包含一个或多个签名组件和相关证书（如果需要），用于对与IOTP事务相关联的数据进行签名。有关IOTP如何使用签名的一般性讨论和介绍，请参阅第6节数字签名。签名组件和证书的定义包含在“互联网开放交易协议的数字签名”一文中，见[IOTPDSIG]。第7.19节和第7.20节介绍了IOTP如何使用这些工具。

contents.text: The definition of a Signature Block is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 签名块的定义如下：

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT IotpSignatures (Signature+, Certificate*) >
<!ATTLIST IotpSignatures
  ID                ID      #IMPLIED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Signature Block within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP事务中签名块的标识符。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: Signature A Signature Component. See section 7.19.
contents.zh-CHS: 签名是一个签名组件。见第7.19节。

contents.text: Certificate A Certificate Component. See section 7.20.
contents.zh-CHS: 证书是一个证书组件。见第7.20节。

contents.text: The contents of a Signature Block depends on the Trading Block that is contained in the same IOTP Message as the Signature Block.
contents.zh-CHS: 签名块的内容取决于与签名块包含在同一IOTP消息中的交易块。

contents.text: 8.16.1 Signature Block with Offer Response
contents.zh-CHS: 8.16.1 带报价响应的签名块

contents.text: A Signature Block which is in the same message as an Offer Response Block contains just an Offer Response Signature Component (see section 7.19.2).
contents.zh-CHS: 与要约响应块位于同一消息中的签名块仅包含要约响应签名组件（见第7.19.2节）。

contents.text: 8.16.2 Signature Block with Payment Request
contents.zh-CHS: 8.16.2 带付款请求的签名块

contents.text: A Signature Block which is in the same message as a Payment Request Block contains:
contents.zh-CHS: 与付款请求块位于同一消息中的签名块包含：

contents.text: o an Offer Response Signature Component (see section 7.19.2), and
contents.zh-CHS: o 要约响应签名组件（见第7.19.2节），以及

contents.text: o if the Payment is dependent on an earlier step (as indicated by the StartAfter attribute on the Payment Component), then the Payment Receipt Signature Component (see section 7.19.3) generated by the previous step
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果付款依赖于较早的步骤（如付款组件上的StartAfter属性所示），则由先前步骤生成的付款收据签名组件（见第7.19.3节）

contents.text: 8.16.3 Signature Block with Payment Response
contents.zh-CHS: 8.16.3 带付款响应的签名块

contents.text: A Signature Block which is in the same message as a Payment Response Block contains just a Payment Receipt Signature Component (see section 7.19.3) generated by the step.
contents.zh-CHS: 与付款响应块位于同一消息中的签名块仅包含步骤生成的付款收据签名组件（见第7.19.3节）。

contents.text: 8.16.4 Signature Block with Delivery Request
contents.zh-CHS: 8.16.4 带传递请求的签名块

contents.text: A Signature Block which is in the same message as a Delivery Request Block contains:
contents.zh-CHS: 与传递请求块位于同一消息中的签名块包含：

contents.text: o an Offer Response Signature Component (see section 7.19.2), and
contents.zh-CHS: o 要约响应签名组件（见第7.19.2节），以及

contents.text: o the Payment Receipt Signature Component (see section 7.19.3) generated by the previous step.
contents.zh-CHS: o 上一步生成的付款收据签名组件（见第7.19.3节）。

contents.text: 8.16.5 Signature Block with Delivery Response
contents.zh-CHS: 8.16.5 带传递响应的签名块

contents.text: A Signature Block which is in the same message as a Delivery Response Block contains just a Delivery Response Signature component (see section 7.19.4) generated by the step.
contents.zh-CHS: 与交付响应块位于同一消息中的签名块仅包含由该步骤生成的交付响应签名组件（见第7.19.4节）。

contents.text: 8.17 Error Block
contents.zh-CHS: 8.17 错误块

contents.text: The Error Trading Block contains one or more Error Components (see section 7.21) which contain information about Technical Errors (see section 4.1) in an IOTP Message which has been received by one of the Trading Roles involved in the trade.
contents.zh-CHS: 错误交易块包含一个或多个错误组件（见第7.21节），其中包含交易中涉及的一个交易角色收到的IOTP消息中的技术错误信息（见第4.1节）。

contents.text: For clarity two phrases are defined which are used in the description of an Error Trading Block:
contents.zh-CHS: 为清楚起见，定义了两个短语，用于描述错误交易区块：

contents.text: o message in error. An IOTP message which contains or causes an error of some kind
contents.zh-CHS: o 错误消息。包含或导致某种错误的IOTP消息

contents.text: o message reporting the error. An IOTP message that contains an Error Trading Block that describes the error found in a message in error.
contents.zh-CHS: o 报告错误的消息。包含错误交易块的IOTP消息，用于描述在错误消息中发现的错误。

contents.text: An Error Trading Block may be contained in any message reporting the error. The action which then follows depends on the severity of the error. See the definition of an Error Component, for an explanation of the different types of severity and the actions which can then occur.
contents.zh-CHS: 错误交易块可能包含在任何报告错误的消息中。随后的操作取决于错误的严重程度。请参阅错误组件的定义，以了解不同类型的严重性以及随后可能发生的操作的说明。

contents.text: in3 Note: Although, an Error Trading Block can report multiple different errors using multiple Error Components, there is no obligation on a developer of an IOTP Aware Application to do so.
contents.zh-CHS: in3注：尽管错误交易块可以使用多个错误组件报告多个不同的错误，但IOTP感知应用程序的开发人员没有义务这样做。

contents.text: The structure of an Error Trading Block is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 错误交易区块的结构如下所示。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT ErrorBlk (ErrorComp+, PaySchemeData*) >
<!ATTLIST ErrorBlk
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Error Trading Block within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP交易中错误交易块的标识符。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: ErrorComp An Error Components (see section 7.21) that contains information about an individual Technical Error.
contents.zh-CHS: ErrorComp错误组件（见第7.21节），包含有关单个技术错误的信息。

contents.text: PaySchemeData An optional Payment Scheme Component (see section 7.10) which contains a Payment Scheme Message. See the appropriate payment scheme supplement to
contents.zh-CHS: PaySchemeData一个可选的支付方案组件（参见第7.10节），其中包含支付方案消息。请参阅本附录的相应付款方案

contents.text: determine whether or not this component needs to be present and for the definition of what it must contain.
contents.zh-CHS: 确定此组件是否需要存在，以及它必须包含的内容的定义。

contents.text: 8.18 Cancel Block
contents.zh-CHS: 8.18 取消块

contents.text: The Cancel Block is used by one Trading Role to inform any other that a transaction has been cancelled. Example usage includes:
contents.zh-CHS: 取消块由一个交易角色用于通知任何其他交易已被取消。示例用法包括：

contents.text: o a Consumer Role informing a non-Consumer role that it no longer plans to continue with the transaction. This will allow the server to close down the transaction tidily without a waiting for a time-out to occur
contents.zh-CHS: o 使用者角色通知非使用者角色它不再计划继续事务。这将允许服务器整齐地关闭事务，而无需等待超时发生

contents.text: o a non-Consumer Role to inform a Consumer role that the Transaction is being stopped. In this case, the Consumer is then unlikely to re-send the previous message that was sent in the mistaken understanding that the original was not received.
contents.zh-CHS: o 非使用者角色，用于通知使用者角色事务正在停止。在这种情况下，消费者不太可能重新发送在错误理解中发送的先前消息，即未收到原始消息。

contents.text: Its definition is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 其定义如下。

contents.text:
<!ELEMENT CancelBlk (Status) >
<!ATTLIST CancelBlk
 ID                 ID      #REQUIRED >
Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ID An identifier which uniquely identifies the Cancel Block within the IOTP Transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: ID唯一标识IOTP事务中取消块的标识符。

contents.text: Content:
contents.zh-CHS: 内容：

contents.text: Status Contains status information indicating that the IOTP transaction has been cancelled.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态包含指示IOTP事务已取消的状态信息。

contents.text: 9. Internet Open Trading Protocol Transactions
contents.zh-CHS: 9. 互联网开放交易协议交易

contents.text: The Baseline Internet Open Trading Protocol supports three types of transactions for different purposes. These are
contents.zh-CHS: 基准互联网公开交易协议支持三种不同目的的交易。这些是

contents.text: o an Authentication IOTP transaction which supports authentication of one party in a trade by another and/or requests information about another Trading Role
contents.zh-CHS: o 一种身份验证IOTP交易，支持交易中一方由另一方进行身份验证和/或请求关于另一交易角色的信息

contents.text: o IOTP Transactions that involve one or more payments. Specifically:
contents.zh-CHS: o 涉及一次或多次付款的IOTP交易。明确地：

contents.text: - Deposit
contents.zh-CHS: - 押金

contents.text: - Purchase
contents.zh-CHS: - 购买

contents.text: - Refund
contents.zh-CHS: - 退款

contents.text: - Withdrawal, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 撤回，以及

contents.text: - Value Exchange
contents.zh-CHS: - 价值交换

contents.text: o IOTP Transactions designed to check the correct function of the IOTP infrastructure. Specifically:
contents.zh-CHS: o IOTP事务旨在检查IOTP基础设施的正确功能。明确地：

contents.text: - Transaction Status Inquiry, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 交易状态查询，以及

contents.text: - Ping
contents.zh-CHS: - 发出砰的声响

contents.text: Although the Authentication IOTP Transaction can operate on its own, authentication can optionally precede any of the "payment" transactions. Therefore, the rest of this section is divided into two parts covering:
contents.zh-CHS: 尽管身份验证IOTP交易可以自行操作，但身份验证可以选择在任何“支付”交易之前进行。因此，本节的其余部分分为两部分，包括：

contents.text: o Authentication and Payment transactions (Authentication, Deposit, Purchase, Refund, Withdrawal and Value Exchange)
contents.zh-CHS: o 认证和支付交易（认证、存款、购买、退款、取款和价值交换）

contents.text: o Infrastructure Transactions (Transaction Status Inquiry and Ping) that are designed to support inquiries on whether or not a transaction has succeeded or a Trading Role's servers are operating correctly, and
contents.zh-CHS: o 基础架构事务（事务状态查询和Ping），用于支持查询事务是否成功或交易角色的服务器是否正常运行，以及

contents.text: 9.1 Authentication and Payment Related IOTP Transactions
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1 与身份验证和支付相关的IOTP交易

contents.text: The Authentication and Payment related IOTP Transactions consist of six Document Exchanges which are then combined in sequence to implement a specific transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: 与认证和支付相关的IOTP交易由六个文件交换组成，然后依次组合以实现特定交易。

contents.text: Generally, there is a close, but not exact, correspondence between a Document Exchange and a Trading Exchange. The main difference is that some Document Exchanges implement part or all of two Trading Exchanges simultaneously in order to minimise the number of actual IOTP Messages which must be sent over the Internet.
contents.zh-CHS: 一般来说，文件交换和交易交换之间存在密切但不确切的对应关系。主要区别在于，一些文件交换同时实施部分或全部两个交易交换，以尽量减少必须通过互联网发送的实际IOTP消息数量。

contents.text: The six Document Exchanges are:
contents.zh-CHS: 六次文件交换是：

contents.text: o Authentication. This is a direct implementation of the Authentication Trading Exchange
contents.zh-CHS: o 认证。这是交易所认证交易的直接实现

contents.text: o Brand Dependent Offer. This is the Offer Trading Exchange combined with the Brand Selection part of the Payment Trading Exchange. Its purpose is to provide the Merchant with information on the Brand selected so that the content of the Offer Response may be adapted accordingly
contents.zh-CHS: o 取决于品牌的报价。这是与支付交易交易所的品牌选择部分相结合的要约交易交易所。其目的是向商户提供所选品牌的信息，以便相应调整报价响应的内容

contents.text: o Brand Independent Offer. This is also an Offer Trading Exchange. However, in this instance, the content of the Offer Response does not depend on the Brand selected.
contents.zh-CHS: o 品牌独立报价。这也是一个要约交易交易所。但是，在这种情况下，报价响应的内容并不取决于所选品牌。

contents.text: o Payment. This is a direct implementation of the Payment part of a Payment Trading Exchange
contents.zh-CHS: o 付款这是支付交易交易所的支付部分的直接实现

contents.text: o Delivery. This is a direct implementation of the Delivery Exchange
contents.zh-CHS: o 传送这是传递交换的直接实现

contents.text: o Delivery with Payment. This is an implementation of combined Payment and Delivery Trading Exchanges
contents.zh-CHS: o 货到付款。这是一个联合支付和交付交易交易所的实现

contents.text: These Document Exchanges are combined together in different sequences to implement each IOTP Transaction. The way in which they may be combined is illustrated by the diagram below.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些文件交换以不同的顺序组合在一起，以实现每个IOTP事务。它们的组合方式如下图所示。

contents.text: Figure 17 Payment and Authentication Message Flow Combinations
contents.zh-CHS: 图17支付和认证消息流组合

contents.text: The combinations of Document Exchanges that are valid depend on the particular IOTP transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: 有效的文件交换组合取决于特定的IOTP交易。

contents.text: The remainder of this sub-section describes:
contents.zh-CHS: 本小节的其余部分描述：

contents.text: o each Document Exchange in more detail including descriptions of the content of each Trading Block in the Document Exchanges, and
contents.zh-CHS: o 每个文件交换的更详细信息，包括文件交换中每个交易区块的内容描述，以及

contents.text: o descriptions of how each IOTP Transaction uses the Document Exchanges to effect the desired result.
contents.zh-CHS: o 描述每个IOTP事务如何使用文档交换实现所需结果。

contents.text: Note: The descriptions of the Document Exchanges which follow describe the ways in which various Business Errors (see section 4.2) are handled. No reference is made however to the handling of Technical Errors (see section 4.1) in any of the messages since these are handled the same way irrespective of the context in which the message is being sent. See section 4 for more details.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：下面的文档交换说明描述了各种业务错误的处理方式（见第4.2节）。但是，未提及任何消息中技术错误的处理（见第4.1节），因为无论消息发送的上下文如何，技术错误的处理方式都是相同的。详见第4节。

contents.text: 9.1.1 Authentication Document Exchange
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1.1 身份验证文件交换

contents.text: The Authentication Document Exchange is a direct implementation of the Authentication Trading Exchange (see section 2.2.4). It involves:
contents.zh-CHS: 认证文件交换是认证交易交换的直接实现（见第2.2.4节）。它涉及：

contents.text: o an Authenticator - the Organisation which is requesting the authentication, and
contents.zh-CHS: o 认证机构-请求认证的组织，以及

contents.text: o an Authenticatee - the Organisation being authenticated.
contents.zh-CHS: o 认证者-被认证的组织。

contents.text: The authentication consists of:
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证包括：

contents.text: o an Authentication Request being sent by the Authenticator to the Authenticatee,
contents.zh-CHS: o 由认证者发送给被认证者的认证请求，

contents.text: o an Authentication Response being sent in return by the Authenticatee to the Authenticator which is then checked, and
contents.zh-CHS: o 被认证者将认证响应发送给认证者，然后进行检查，以及

contents.text: o an Authentication Status being sent by the Authenticator to the Authenticatee to provide an indication of the success or failure of the authentication.
contents.zh-CHS: o 由认证者发送给被认证者的认证状态，以提供认证成功或失败的指示。

contents.text: An Authentication Document Exchange also:
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证文档交换还包括：

contents.text: o provides an Authenticatee with an Organisation Component which describes the Authenticator, and
contents.zh-CHS: o 向认证者提供描述认证者的组织组件，以及

contents.text: o optionally provides the Authenticator with Organisation Components which describe the Authenticatee.
contents.zh-CHS: o 可选地向验证者提供描述验证者的组织组件。

contents.text: The Authentication Request may also be digitally signed which allows the Authenticatee to verify the credentials of the Authenticator.
contents.zh-CHS: 认证请求也可以是数字签名的，这允许认证者验证认证者的凭证。

contents.text: The IOTP Messages which are involved are illustrated by the diagram below.
contents.zh-CHS: 所涉及的IOTP消息如下图所示。

contents.text:
*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*
 Organisation 1
 (Authenticatee)
     |   Organisation 2
     |  (Authenticator)
STEP |     |
 1.          First Organisation takes an action (for example by
             pressing a button on an HTML page) which requires that
             the Organisation is authenticated
1 --> 2 Authentication Need (outside scope of IOTP)
contents.zh-CHS: 1-->2身份验证需要（超出IOTP范围）

contents.text: 2. The second Organisation generates: an Authentication Request Block containing one or more Authentication Request Components and/or a Trading Role Information Request Component, then sends it to the first Organisation
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 第二个组织生成：包含一个或多个身份验证请求组件和/或交易角色信息请求组件的身份验证请求块，然后将其发送给第一个组织

contents.text:
1 <-- 2 TPO & AUTHENTICATION REQUEST. IotpMsg: Trans Ref Block;
        Signature Block (optional); TPO Block; Auth Request Block

3. IOTP aware application started. If a Signature Block is present, the first Organisation may use this to check the credentials of the second Organisation. If credentials are OK, the first Organisation selects an Authentication Request to use (if present and more than one), then uses the authentication algorithm selected to generate an Authentication Response Block. If present, the Trading Role Information Request Component is used to generate Organisation Components. Finally a Signature Component is created if required and all components are then sent back to the second Organisation for validation.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. IOTP感知应用程序已启动。如果存在签名块，第一个组织可以使用该签名块检查第二个组织的凭据。如果凭证正常，则第一个组织选择要使用的身份验证请求（如果存在且不止一个），然后使用所选的身份验证算法生成身份验证响应块。如果存在，交易角色信息请求组件用于生成组织组件。最后，如果需要，将创建一个签名组件，然后将所有组件发送回第二个组织进行验证。

contents.text:
1 --> 2 AUTHENTICATION RESPONSE. IotpMsg; Trans Ref Block;
        Signature Block (optional) ; Auth Response Block

4. The second Organisation checks the Authentication Response against the data in the Authentication Request Block to check that the first Organisation is who they appear to be, and sends an Authentication Status Block to the first Organisation to indicate the result then stops.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 第二个组织根据身份验证请求块中的数据检查身份验证响应，以检查第一个组织是他们看起来是谁，并向第一个组织发送身份验证状态块以指示结果，然后停止。

contents.text:
1 <-- 2 AUTHENTICATION STATUS. IotpMsg: Trans Ref Block;
        Signature Block (optional); Auth Response Block
5. The first Organisation checks the authentication Status Block and optionally keeps information on the IOTP transaction for record keeping purposes and stops.
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 第一个组织检查身份验证状态块，并选择性地保留IOTP交易的信息，以备记录和停止。

contents.text: Figure 18 Authentication Document Exchange
contents.zh-CHS: 图18身份验证文档交换

contents.text: 9.1.1.1 Message Processing Guidelines
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1.1.1 信息处理指南

contents.text: On receiving a TPO & Authentication Request IOTP Message (see below), an Authenticatee may either:
contents.zh-CHS: 收到TPO和认证请求IOTP消息（见下文）时，认证对象可以：

contents.text: o generate and send an Authentication Response IOTP Message back to the Authenticator, or
contents.zh-CHS: o 生成认证响应IOTP消息并将其发送回认证者，或

contents.text: o indicate failure to comply with the Authentication Request by sending a Cancel Block back to the Authenticator containing a Status Component with a StatusType of Authentication a ProcessState of Failed and the CompletionCode (see section 7.16.4) set to either: AutEeCancel, NoAuthReq, TradRolesIncon or Unspecified.
contents.zh-CHS: o 通过将取消块发送回包含身份验证状态类型为Failed且CompletionCode（参见第7.16.4节）设置为AutEeCancel、NoAuthReq、TradRolesIncon或UNQUOTED的状态组件的身份验证程序，指示未能遵守身份验证请求。

contents.text: On receiving an Authentication Response IOTP Message (see below), an Authenticator should send in return, an Authentication Status IOTP Message (see below) containing a Status Block with a Status Component where the StatusType is set to Authentication, and:
contents.zh-CHS: 在接收到身份验证响应IOTP消息（见下文）时，身份验证人应返回发送身份验证状态IOTP消息（见下文），该消息包含一个状态块，该状态块带有一个状态组件，其中StatusType设置为Authentication，并且：

contents.text: o the ProcessState attribute of the Status Component is set to CompletedOk which indicates a successful completion, or
contents.zh-CHS: o 状态组件的ProcessState属性设置为CompletedOk，表示成功完成，或

contents.text: o the ProcessState attribute is set to Failed and the CompletionCode attribute is set to either: AutOrCancel, AuthFailed or Unspecified which indicates a failed authentication,
contents.zh-CHS: o ProcessState属性设置为Failed，CompletionCode属性设置为AutoCancel、AuthFailed或Unspecified，表示身份验证失败，

contents.text: On receiving an Authentication Status IOTP Message (see below), the Authenticatee should check the Status Component in the Status Block. If this indicates:
contents.zh-CHS: 在收到身份验证状态IOTP消息（见下文）时，被身份验证人应检查状态块中的状态组件。如果这表明：

contents.text: o a successful authentication, then the Authenticatee should either:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果身份验证成功，则Authenticate应：

contents.text: - continue with the next step in the IOTP Transaction of which the Authentication Document Exchange is part (if any), or
contents.zh-CHS: - 继续IOTP事务中的下一步，身份验证文档交换是该事务的一部分（如果有），或

contents.text: - indicate a failure to continue with the rest of the IOTP Transaction, by sending back to the Authenticator a Cancel Block containing a Status Component with a StatusType of Authentication, a ProcessState of Failed and the CompletionCode (see section 7.16.4) set to AutEeCancel.
contents.zh-CHS: - 通过向验证器发回一个Cancel块，该块包含一个状态组件，状态组件的身份验证类型为StatusType，ProcessState为Failed，CompletionCode（参见第7.16.4节）设置为AutEeCancel，指示无法继续IOTP事务的其余部分。

contents.text: o a failed authentication, then the failure should be reported to the Authenticatee and any further processing stopped.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果身份验证失败，则应将失败报告给AuthenticateTee，并停止任何进一步的处理。

contents.text: If the Authenticator receives an IOTP Message containing a Cancel block from a Consumer, then the Authenticatee may go to the CancelNetLocn specified on the Trading Role Element in the Organisation Component for the Authenticator contained in the Trading Protocol Options Block.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果验证者从消费者接收到包含取消块的IOTP消息，则被验证者可以转到在组织组件中的交易角色元素上为交易协议选项块中包含的验证者指定的CancelNetLocn。

contents.text: 9.1.1.2 TPO & Authentication Request IOTP Message
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1.1.2 TPO和身份验证请求IOTP消息

contents.text: Apart from a Transaction Reference Block (see section 3.3), this message consists of:
contents.zh-CHS: 除交易参考块（见第3.3节）外，该信息包括：

contents.text: o a Trading Protocol Options Block (see section 8.1)
contents.zh-CHS: o 交易协议期权块（见第8.1节）

contents.text: o an Authentication Request Block (see section 8.4), and
contents.zh-CHS: o 身份验证请求块（见第8.4节），以及

contents.text: o an optional Signature Block (see section 8.16).
contents.zh-CHS: o 可选的签名块（见第8.16节）。

contents.text: Each of these are described below.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面分别介绍其中的每一项。

contents.text: TRADING PROTOCOL OPTIONS BLOCK
contents.zh-CHS: 交易协议期权组

contents.text: The Trading Protocol Options Block (see section 8.1) must contain the following Trading Components:
contents.zh-CHS: 交易协议选项块（见第8.1节）必须包含以下交易组件：

contents.text: o one Protocol Options Component (see Section 7.1) which defines the options which apply to the whole Authentication Document Exchange.
contents.zh-CHS: o 一个协议选项组件（见第7.1节），定义适用于整个身份验证文档交换的选项。

contents.text: o one Organisation Component (see section 7.6) which describes the Authenticator. The Trading Role on the Organisation Component should indicate the role which the Authenticator is taking in the Trade, for example a Merchant or a Consumer.
contents.zh-CHS: o 一个描述认证者的组织组成部分（见第7.6节）。组织组成部分上的交易角色应表明认证人在交易中扮演的角色，例如商人或消费者。

contents.text: AUTHENTICATION REQUEST BLOCK
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证请求块

contents.text: The Authentication Request Block (see section 8.4) must contain the following Trading Components:
contents.zh-CHS: 认证请求块（见第8.4节）必须包含以下交易组件：

contents.text: o one Authentication Request Component (see section 7.2), and
contents.zh-CHS: o 一个身份验证请求组件（见第7.2节），以及

contents.text: SIGNATURE BLOCK (AUTHENTICATION REQUEST)
contents.zh-CHS: 签名块（身份验证请求）

contents.text: If the Authentication Request is being digitally signed then a Signature Block must be included. It contains Digests of the following XML elements:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果身份验证请求正在进行数字签名，则必须包括签名块。它包含以下XML元素的摘要：

contents.text: o the Transaction Reference Block (see section 3.3) for the IOTP Message that contains information that describes the IOTP Message and IOTP Transaction
contents.zh-CHS: o IOTP消息的事务参考块（见第3.3节），其中包含描述IOTP消息和IOTP事务的信息

contents.text: o the Transaction Id Component (see section 3.3.1) which globally uniquely identifies the IOTP Transaction
contents.zh-CHS: o 全局唯一标识IOTP交易的交易Id组件（见第3.3.1节）

contents.text: o the following components of the TPO Block :
contents.zh-CHS: o TPO块的以下组件：

contents.text: - the Protocol Options Component
contents.zh-CHS: - 协议选项组件

contents.text: - the Organisation Component
contents.zh-CHS: - 组织部分

contents.text: o the following components of the Authentication Request Block:
contents.zh-CHS: o 身份验证请求块的以下组件：

contents.text: - the Authentication Request Component
contents.zh-CHS: - 身份验证请求组件

contents.text: - the Trading Role Information Request Component
contents.zh-CHS: - 交易角色信息请求组件

contents.text: 9.1.1.3 Authentication Response IOTP Message
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1.1.3 身份验证响应IOTP消息

contents.text: Apart from a Transaction Reference Block (see section 3.3), this message consists of:
contents.zh-CHS: 除交易参考块（见第3.3节）外，该信息包括：

contents.text: o an Authentication Response Block (see section 8.5), and
contents.zh-CHS: o 认证响应块（见第8.5节），以及

contents.text: o an optional Signature Block (see section 8.16).
contents.zh-CHS: o 可选的签名块（见第8.16节）。

contents.text: Each of these are described below.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面分别介绍其中的每一项。

contents.text: AUTHENTICATION RESPONSE BLOCK
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证响应块

contents.text: The Authentication Response Block must contain the following Trading Component:
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证响应块必须包含以下交易组件：

contents.text: o one Authentication Response Component (see section 7.3)
contents.zh-CHS: o 一个认证响应组件（见第7.3节）

contents.text: o one Organisation Component for every Trading Role identified in the TradingRoleList attribute of the Trading Role Information Request Component contained in the Authentication Request Block.
contents.zh-CHS: o 身份验证请求块中包含的交易角色信息请求组件的TradingRoleList属性中标识的每个交易角色对应一个组织组件。

contents.text: SIGNATURE BLOCK (AUTHENTICATION RESPONSE)
contents.zh-CHS: 签名块（身份验证响应）

contents.text: If the Algorithm element (see section 12. IANA Considerations) within the Authentication Request Component contained in the Authentication Request Block indicates that the Authentication Response should consist of a digital signature then a Signature Block must be included in the same IOTP message that contains an Authentication Response Block. The Signature Component contains Digest Elements for the following XML elements:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果认证请求块中包含的认证请求组件中的算法元素（参见第12节IANA注意事项）指示认证响应应包含数字签名，则签名块必须包含在包含认证响应块的同一IOTP消息中。签名组件包含以下XML元素的摘要元素：

contents.text: o the Transaction Reference Block (see section 3.3) for the IOTP Message that contains information that describes the IOTP Message and IOTP Transaction
contents.zh-CHS: o IOTP消息的事务参考块（见第3.3节），其中包含描述IOTP消息和IOTP事务的信息

contents.text: o the Transaction Id Component (see section 3.3.1) which globally uniquely identifies the IOTP Transaction
contents.zh-CHS: o 全局唯一标识IOTP交易的交易Id组件（见第3.3.1节）

contents.text: o the following components of the Authentication Request Block:
contents.zh-CHS: o 身份验证请求块的以下组件：

contents.text: - the Authentication Request Component
contents.zh-CHS: - 身份验证请求组件

contents.text: - the Trading Role Information Request Component
contents.zh-CHS: - 交易角色信息请求组件

contents.text: o the Organisation Components contained in the Authentication Response Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 身份验证响应块中包含的组织组件

contents.text: Note: It should not be assumed that all trading roles can support the signing of data. Particularly it should not be assumed that Consumers support the signing of data.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：不应假设所有交易角色都可以支持数据签名。尤其不应假设消费者支持数据签名。

contents.text: 9.1.1.4 Authentication Status IOTP Message
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1.1.4 身份验证状态IOTP消息

contents.text: Apart from a Transaction Reference Block (see section 3.3), this message consists of:
contents.zh-CHS: 除交易参考块（见第3.3节）外，该信息包括：

contents.text: o an Authentication Status Block (see section 8.5), and
contents.zh-CHS: o 身份验证状态块（见第8.5节），以及

contents.text: o an optional Signature Block (see section 8.16).
contents.zh-CHS: o 可选的签名块（见第8.16节）。

contents.text: Each of these are described below.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面分别介绍其中的每一项。

contents.text: AUTHENTICATION STATUS BLOCK
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证状态块

contents.text: The Authentication Status Block (see section 8.6) must contain the following Trading Components:
contents.zh-CHS: 认证状态块（见第8.6节）必须包含以下交易组件：

contents.text: o one Status Component (see section 7.16) with a ProcessState attribute set to CompletedOk.
contents.zh-CHS: o 一个状态组件（参见第7.16节），其ProcessState属性设置为CompletedOk。

contents.text: SIGNATURE BLOCK (AUTHENTICATION STATUS)
contents.zh-CHS: 签名块（身份验证状态）

contents.text: If the Authentication Status Block is being digitally signed then a Signature Block must be included that contains a Signature Component with Digest elements for the following XML elements:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果身份验证状态块正在进行数字签名，则必须包括一个签名块，该签名块包含一个签名组件，其中包含以下XML元素的摘要元素：

contents.text: o the Transaction Reference Block (see section 3.3) for the IOTP Message that contains information that describes the IOTP Message and IOTP Transaction
contents.zh-CHS: o IOTP消息的事务参考块（见第3.3节），其中包含描述IOTP消息和IOTP事务的信息

contents.text: o the Transaction Id Component (see section 3.3.1) which globally uniquely identifies the IOTP Transaction
contents.zh-CHS: o 全局唯一标识IOTP交易的交易Id组件（见第3.3.1节）

contents.text: o the following components of the Authentication Status Block:
contents.zh-CHS: o 身份验证状态块的以下组件：

contents.text: - the Status Component (see section 7.16).
contents.zh-CHS: - 状态组件（见第7.16节）。

contents.text: Note: If the Authentication Document Exchange is followed by an Offer Document Exchange (see section 9.1.2) then the Authentication Status Block and the Signature Block (Authentication Status) may be combined with either:
contents.zh-CHS: 注：如果认证文件交换之后是报价文件交换（见第9.1.2节），则认证状态块和签名块（认证状态）可与以下任一项组合：

contents.text: o a TPO IOTP Message (see section 9.1.2.3), or
contents.zh-CHS: o TPO IOTP消息（见第9.1.2.3节），或

contents.text: o a TPO and Offer Response IOTP Message (see section 9.1.2.6)
contents.zh-CHS: o TPO和报价响应IOTP消息（见第9.1.2.6节）

contents.text: 9.1.2 Offer Document Exchange
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1.2 提供文件交换

contents.text: The Offer Document Exchange occurs in two basic forms:
contents.zh-CHS: 要约文件交换有两种基本形式：

contents.text: o Brand Dependent Offer Exchange. Where the content of the offer, e.g., the order details, amount, delivery details, etc., are dependent on the payment brand and protocol selected by the consumer, and
contents.zh-CHS: o 品牌相关的报价交换。如果优惠内容（例如订单详情、金额、交付详情等）取决于消费者选择的支付品牌和协议，以及

contents.text: o Brand Independent Offer Exchange. Where the content of the offer is not dependent on the payment brand and protocol selected.
contents.zh-CHS: o 品牌独立报价交换。报价的内容不取决于所选的支付品牌和协议。

contents.text: Each of these types of Offer Document Exchange may be preceded by an Authentication Document Exchange (see section 9.1.1).
contents.zh-CHS: 每种类型的报价文件交换之前都可以进行认证文件交换（见第9.1.1节）。

contents.text: 9.1.2.1 Brand Dependent Offer Document Exchange
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1.2.1 品牌相关报价文件交换

contents.text: In a Brand Dependent Offer Document Exchange the TPO Block and the Offer Response Block are sent separately by the Merchant to the Consumer, i.e.:
contents.zh-CHS: 在品牌相关的报价文件交换中，TPO块和报价响应块由商户分别发送给消费者，即：

contents.text: o the Brand List Component is sent to the Consumer in a TPO Block,
contents.zh-CHS: o 品牌列表组件在TPO块中发送给消费者，

contents.text: o the Consumer selects a Payment Brand, Payment Protocol and optionally a Currency and amount from the Brand List Component
contents.zh-CHS: o 消费者从品牌列表组件中选择支付品牌、支付协议以及可选的货币和金额

contents.text: o the Consumer sends the selected brand, protocol and currency/amount back to the Merchant in a TPO Selection Block, and
contents.zh-CHS: o 消费者在TPO选择块中将所选品牌、协议和货币/金额发送回商户，以及

contents.text: o the Merchant uses the information received to define the content of and then send the Offer Response Block to the Consumer.
contents.zh-CHS: o 商户使用接收到的信息来定义报价的内容，然后将报价响应块发送给消费者。

contents.text: This is illustrated by the diagram below.
contents.zh-CHS: 下图对此进行了说明。

contents.text:
*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*
   Consumer
     |  Merchant
STEP |     |
 1.          Consumer decides to trade and sends to the Merchant
             information (e.g., using HTML) that enables the Merchant
             to create an offer,
C --> M Offer information - outside scope of IOTP
2. Merchant decides which payment brand protocols, currencies and amounts apply, places then in a Brand List Component inside a TPO Block and sends to Consumer
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 商户决定采用哪种支付品牌协议、货币和金额，然后将其放入TPO区块内的品牌列表组件中，并发送给消费者

contents.text: C <-- M TPO. IotpMsg: Trans Ref Block; TPO Block
3. IOTP aware application started. Consumer selects the payment brand, payment protocol and currency/amount to use. Records selection in a Brand Selection Component and sends back to Merchant.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. IOTP感知应用程序已启动。消费者选择要使用的支付品牌、支付协议和货币/金额。在品牌选择组件中记录选择并发送回商户。

contents.text:
C --> M TPO SELECTION. IotpMsg: Trans Ref Block; TPO Selection
        Block

4. Merchant uses selected payment brand, payment protocol, currency/amount and the offer information to create an Offer Response Block containing details about the IOTP Transaction including price, etc. Optionally signs it and sends to the Consumer
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 商户使用选定的支付品牌、支付协议、货币/金额和优惠信息创建一个优惠响应块，其中包含IOTP交易的详细信息，包括价格等。可选择对其进行签名并发送给消费者

contents.text:
C <-- M OFFER RESPONSE. IotpMsg: Trans Ref Block; Signature Block
        (optional); Offer Response Block

5. Consumer checks the Offer is OK, then combines components from the TPO Block, the TPO Selection Block and the Offer Response Block to create the next IOTP Message for the Transaction and sends it together with the Signature block if present to the required Trading Role
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 消费者检查报价是否正常，然后组合来自TPO块、TPO选择块和报价响应块的组件，为交易创建下一条IOTP消息，并将其与签名块（如果存在）一起发送给所需的交易角色

contents.text: CONTINUED ...
contents.zh-CHS: 继续的。。。

contents.text: Figure 19 Brand Dependent Offer Document Exchange
contents.zh-CHS: 图19与品牌相关的报价文件交换

contents.text: Note, a Consumer identifies a Brand Dependent Offer Document Exchange, by the absence of an Offer Response Block in the first IOTP Message.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意，消费者通过在第一条IOTP消息中没有报价响应块来识别品牌相关的报价文档交换。

contents.text: MESSAGE PROCESSING GUIDELINES
contents.zh-CHS: 信息处理指南

contents.text: On receiving a TPO IOTP Message (see below), the Consumer may either:
contents.zh-CHS: 在收到TPO IOTP消息（见下文）时，消费者可以：

contents.text: o generate and send a TPO Selection IOTP Message back to the Merchant, or
contents.zh-CHS: o 生成TPO选择IOTP消息并发送回商户，或

contents.text: o indicate failure to continue with the IOTP Transaction by sending a Cancel Block back to the Merchant containing a Status Component with a StatusType of Offer, a ProcessState of Failed and the CompletionCode (see section 7.16.4) set to either: ConsCancelled or Unspecified.
contents.zh-CHS: o 通过将取消块发送回商户，指示无法继续IOTP交易，该商户包含一个状态组件，其StatusType为Offer，ProcessState为Failed，CompletionCode（参见第7.16.4节）设置为：ConsCancelled或Unspecified。

contents.text: On receiving a TPO Selection IOTP Message (see below) the Merchant may either:
contents.zh-CHS: 在收到TPO选择IOTP消息（见下文）时，商户可以：

contents.text: o generate and send an Offer Response IOTP Message back to the Consumer, or
contents.zh-CHS: o 生成并向消费者发送报价响应IOTP消息，或

contents.text: o indicate failure to continue with the IOTP Transaction by sending a Cancel Block back to the Consumer containing a Status Component with a StatusType of Offer, a ProcessState of Failed and the CompletionCode (see section 7.16.4) set to either: MerchCancelled or Unspecified.
contents.zh-CHS: o 通过向消费者发送一个包含StatusType为Offer、ProcessState为Failed且CompletionCode（参见第7.16.4节）设置为MerchCancelled或Unspecified的状态组件的取消块，指示无法继续IOTP事务。

contents.text: On receiving an Offer Response IOTP Message (see below) the Consumer may either:
contents.zh-CHS: 在收到要约响应IOTP消息（见下文）时，消费者可以：

contents.text: o generate and send the next IOTP Message in the IOTP transaction and send it to the required Trading Role. This is dependent on the IOTP Transaction, or
contents.zh-CHS: o 生成并发送IOTP事务中的下一条IOTP消息，并将其发送给所需的交易角色。这取决于IOTP交易，或

contents.text: o indicate failure to continue with the IOTP Transaction by sending a Cancel Block back to the Merchant containing a Status Component with a StatusType of Offer, a ProcessState of Failed and the CompletionCode (see section 7.16.4) set to either: ConsCancelled or Unspecified.
contents.zh-CHS: o 通过将取消块发送回商户，指示无法继续IOTP交易，该商户包含一个状态组件，其StatusType为Offer，ProcessState为Failed，CompletionCode（参见第7.16.4节）设置为：ConsCancelled或Unspecified。

contents.text: If the Merchant receives an IOTP Message containing a Cancel block, then the Consumer is likely to go to the CancelNetLocn specified on the Trading Role Element in the Organisation Component for the Merchant.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果商户收到包含取消块的IOTP消息，则消费者可能会转到商户组织组件中交易角色元素上指定的CancelNetLocn。

contents.text: If the Consumer receives an IOTP Message containing a Cancel block, then the information contained in the IOTP Message should be reported to the Consumer but no further action taken.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果消费者收到包含取消块的IOTP消息，则应向消费者报告IOTP消息中包含的信息，但不采取进一步措施。

contents.text: 9.1.2.2 Brand Independent Offer Document Exchange
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1.2.2 品牌独立报价文件交换

contents.text: In a Brand Independent Offer Document Exchange the TPO Block and the Offer Response Block are sent together by the Merchant to the Consumer, i.e. there is one IOTP Message that contains both a TPO Block, and an Offer Response Block.
contents.zh-CHS: 在品牌独立的报价文件交换中，TPO块和报价响应块由商户一起发送给消费者，即，有一条IOTP消息同时包含TPO块和报价响应块。

contents.text: The message flow is illustrated by the diagram below:
contents.zh-CHS: 消息流如下图所示：

contents.text:
*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*
 Consumer
     |  Merchant
STEP |     |
 1.          Consumer decides to trade and sends to the Merchant
             information (e.g., using HTML) that enables the Merchant
             to create an offer,
C --> M Offer information - outside scope of IOTP

2. Merchant decides which payment brand protocols, currencies and amounts apply, places then in a Brand List Component inside a TPO Block, creates an Offer Response containing details about the IOTP Transaction including price, etc., optionally signs it and sends to Consumer
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 商户决定采用哪种支付品牌协议、货币和金额，然后将其放入TPO区块内的品牌列表组件中，创建包含IOTP交易详细信息（包括价格等）的报价响应，选择性地签名并发送给消费者

contents.text:
C <-- M TPO & OFFER RESPONSE. IotpMsg: Trans Ref Block; Signature
        Block; TPO Block; Offer Response Block

3. IOTP aware application started. Consumer selects the payment brand, payment protocol and currency/amount to use. Records selection in a Brand Selection Component, checks offer is OK, combines the Brand Selection Component with information from the TPO Block and Offer Response Block to create the next IOTP Message for the Transaction and sends it together with the Signature Block if present to the required Trading Role.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. IOTP感知应用程序已启动。消费者选择要使用的支付品牌、支付协议和货币/金额。在品牌选择组件中记录选择，检查报价是否正常，将品牌选择组件与来自TPO块和报价响应块的信息相结合，为交易创建下一条IOTP消息，并将其与签名块（如果存在）一起发送给所需的交易角色。

contents.text: CONTINUED ...
contents.zh-CHS: 继续的。。。

contents.text: Figure 20 Brand Independent Offer Exchange
contents.zh-CHS: 图20品牌独立报价交换

contents.text: Note that a Brand Independent Offer Document Exchange always occurs when only one payment brand, protocol and currency/amount is being offered to the Consumer by the Merchant. It is also likely to, but will not necessarily, occur when multiple brands are being offered, the Payment Handler is the same, and all brands use the same set of protocols.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，当商户仅向消费者提供一种支付品牌、协议和货币/金额时，始终会发生与品牌无关的报价文件交换。当提供多个品牌，支付处理程序相同，且所有品牌使用相同的协议集时，也可能发生这种情况，但不一定会发生。

contents.text: Note that the TPO Block and the Offer Response Block can be sent in separate IOTP messages (see Brand Dependent Offer Document Exchange) even if the Offer Response Block does not change. However this increases the number of messages in the transaction and is therefore likely to increase transaction response times.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，即使要约响应块没有更改，TPO块和要约响应块也可以在单独的IOTP消息中发送（请参阅品牌相关要约文档交换）。但是，这会增加事务中的消息数量，因此可能会增加事务响应时间。

contents.text: IOTP aware applications supporting the Consumer Trading Role must check for the existence of an Offer Response Block in the first IOTP Message to determine whether the Offer Document Exchange is brand dependent or not.
contents.zh-CHS: 支持消费者交易角色的IOTP感知应用程序必须检查第一条IOTP消息中是否存在要约响应块，以确定要约文档交换是否依赖于品牌。

contents.text: MESSAGE PROCESSING GUIDELINES
contents.zh-CHS: 信息处理指南

contents.text: On receiving a TPO and Offer Response IOTP Message (see below), the Consumer may either:
contents.zh-CHS: 在收到TPO和Offer Response IOTP消息（见下文）时，消费者可以：

contents.text: o generate and send the next IOTP Message in the IOTP transaction and send it to the required Trading Role. This is dependent on the IOTP Transaction, or
contents.zh-CHS: o 生成并发送IOTP事务中的下一条IOTP消息，并将其发送给所需的交易角色。这取决于IOTP交易，或

contents.text: o indicate failure to continue with the IOTP Transaction by sending a Cancel Block back to the Merchant containing a Status Component with a StatusType of Offer, a ProcessState of Failed and the CompletionCode (see section 7.16.1) set to either: ConsCancelled or Unspecified.
contents.zh-CHS: o 通过将取消块发送回商户，指示无法继续IOTP交易，该商户包含一个状态组件，该状态组件的StatusType为Offer，ProcessState为Failed，CompletionCode（参见第7.16.1节）设置为：ConsCancelled或Unspecified。

contents.text: If the Merchant receives an IOTP Message containing a Cancel block, then the Consumer is likely to go to the CancelNetLocn specified on the Trading Role Element in the Organisation Component for the Merchant.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果商户收到包含取消块的IOTP消息，则消费者可能会转到商户组织组件中交易角色元素上指定的CancelNetLocn。

contents.text: 9.1.2.3 TPO IOTP Message
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1.2.3 TPO IOTP消息

contents.text: The TPO IOTP Message is only used with a Brand Dependent Offer Document Exchange. Apart from a Transaction Reference Block (see section 3.3), this message consists of just a Trading Protocol Options Block (see section 8.1) which is described below.
contents.zh-CHS: TPO IOTP消息仅用于品牌相关的报价文件交换。除交易参考块（见第3.3节）外，该消息仅包括交易协议选项块（见第8.1节），如下所述。

contents.text: TPO (TRADING PROTOCOL OPTIONS) BLOCK
contents.zh-CHS: TPO（交易协议期权）区块

contents.text: The Trading Protocol Options Block (see section 8.1) must contain the following Trading Components:
contents.zh-CHS: 交易协议选项块（见第8.1节）必须包含以下交易组件：

contents.text: o one Protocol Options Component which defines the options which apply to the whole IOTP Transaction. See Section 7.1.
contents.zh-CHS: o 一个协议选项组件，定义适用于整个IOTP事务的选项。见第7.1节。

contents.text: o one Brand List Component (see section 7.7) for each Payment in the IOTP Transaction that contain one or more payment brands and protocols which may be selected for use in each payment
contents.zh-CHS: o IOTP交易中的每笔支付都有一个品牌列表组件（见第7.7节），其中包含一个或多个支付品牌和协议，可选择在每笔支付中使用

contents.text: o Organisation Components (see section 7.6) with the following roles:
contents.zh-CHS: o 具有以下角色的组织组成部分（见第7.6节）：

contents.text: - Merchant who is making the offer
contents.zh-CHS: - 出价的商人

contents.text: - Consumer who is carrying out the transaction
contents.zh-CHS: - 执行交易的消费者

contents.text: - the PaymentHandler(s) for the payment. The "ID" of the Payment Handler Organisation Component is contained within the PhOrgRef attribute of the Payment Component
contents.zh-CHS: - 付款的付款处理程序。支付处理程序组织组件的“ID”包含在支付组件的PhOrgRef属性中

contents.text: If the IOTP Transaction includes a Delivery then the TPO Block must also contain:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果IOTP事务包括交付，则TPO块还必须包含：

contents.text: o Organisation Components with the following roles:
contents.zh-CHS: o 具有以下角色的组织组成部分：

contents.text: - DeliveryHandler who will be delivering the goods or services
contents.zh-CHS: - 将交付货物或服务的送货员

contents.text: - DelivTo i.e. the person or Organisation which is to take delivery
contents.zh-CHS: - 交付给，即接受交付的人员或组织

contents.text: AUTHENTICATION STATUS AND SIGNATURE BLOCKS
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证状态和签名块

contents.text: If the Offer Document Exchange was preceded by an Authentication Document Exchange, then the TPO IOTP Message may also contain:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果要约文件交换之前有身份验证文件交换，则TPO IOTP消息还可能包含：

contents.text: o an Authentication Status Block (see section 8.6), and
contents.zh-CHS: o 身份验证状态块（见第8.6节），以及

contents.text: o an optional Signature Block (Authentication Status) Signature Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 可选的签名块（身份验证状态）签名块

contents.text: See section 9.1.1.4 Authentication Status IOTP Message for more details.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关更多详细信息，请参阅第9.1.1.4节身份验证状态IOTP消息。

contents.text: 9.1.2.4 TPO Selection IOTP Message
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1.2.4 TPO选择IOTP消息

contents.text: The TPO Selection IOTP Message is only used with a Brand Dependent Offer Document Exchange. Apart from a Transaction Reference Block (see section 3.3), this message consists of just a TPO Selection Block (see section 8.1) which is described below.
contents.zh-CHS: TPO选择IOTP消息仅用于品牌相关的报价文件交换。除事务参考块（见第3.3节）外，该消息仅包括TPO选择块（见第8.1节），如下所述。

contents.text: TPO SELECTION BLOCK
contents.zh-CHS: TPO选择块

contents.text: The TPO Selection Block (see section 8.2) contains:
contents.zh-CHS: TPO选择块（见第8.2节）包含：

contents.text: o one Brand Selection Component (see section 7.8) for use in a later Payment Exchange. It contains the results of the consumer selecting a Payment Brand, Payment Protocol and currency/amount from the list provided in the Brand List Component.
contents.zh-CHS: o 一个品牌选择组件（见第7.8节），用于以后的支付交换。它包含消费者从品牌列表组件中提供的列表中选择支付品牌、支付协议和货币/金额的结果。

contents.text: 9.1.2.5 Offer Response IOTP Message
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1.2.5 提供响应IOTP消息

contents.text: The Offer Response IOTP Message is only used with a Brand Dependent Offer Document Exchange. Apart from a Transaction Reference Block (see section 3.3), this message consists of:
contents.zh-CHS: 要约响应IOTP消息仅用于与品牌相关的要约文档交换。除交易参考块（见第3.3节）外，该信息包括：

contents.text: o an Offer Response Block (see section 8.1) and
contents.zh-CHS: o 报价响应块（见第8.1节）和

contents.text: o an optional Signature Block (see section 8.16).
contents.zh-CHS: o 可选的签名块（见第8.16节）。

contents.text: OFFER RESPONSE BLOCK
contents.zh-CHS: 报价响应块

contents.text: The Offer Response Block (see section 8.3) contains the following components:
contents.zh-CHS: 报价响应块（见第8.3节）包含以下组件：

contents.text: o one Status Component (see section 7.16) which indicates the status of the Offer Response. The ProcessState attribute should be set to CompletedOk
contents.zh-CHS: o 一个状态组件（见第7.16节），指示报价响应的状态。ProcessState属性应设置为CompletedOk

contents.text: o one Order Component (see section 7.5) which contains details about the goods and services which are being purchased or the financial transaction which is taking place
contents.zh-CHS: o 一个订单组成部分（见第7.5节），其中包含正在购买的商品和服务或正在进行的金融交易的详细信息

contents.text: o one or more Payment Component(s) (see section 7.9) for each payment which is to be made
contents.zh-CHS: o 每次付款的一个或多个付款部分（见第7.9节）

contents.text: o zero or one Delivery Components (see section 7.13) containing details of the delivery to be made if the IOTP Transaction includes a delivery
contents.zh-CHS: o 零个或一个交付组件（见第7.13节），包含IOTP交易包括交付时的交付细节

contents.text: o zero or more Trading Role Data Components (see section 7.17) if required by the Merchant.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果商户要求，零个或多个交易角色数据组件（见第7.17节）。

contents.text: SIGNATURE BLOCK (OFFER RESPONSE)
contents.zh-CHS: 签名栏（报价响应）

contents.text: If the Authentication Status Block is being digitally signed then a Signature Block must be included that contains a Signature Component (see section 7.19) with Digest Elements for the following XML elements:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果身份验证状态块正在进行数字签名，则必须包括一个签名块，该签名块包含一个签名组件（见第7.19节），其中包含以下XML元素的摘要元素：

contents.text: If the Offer Response is being digitally signed then a Signature Block must be included that contains a Signature Component (see section 7.19) with Digest Elements for the following XML elements:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果对报价响应进行数字签名，则必须包括一个签名块，该签名块包含一个签名组件（见第7.19节），其中包含以下XML元素的摘要元素：

contents.text: o the Transaction Reference Block (see section 3.3) for the IOTP Message that contains information that describes the IOTP Message and IOTP Transaction
contents.zh-CHS: o IOTP消息的事务参考块（见第3.3节），其中包含描述IOTP消息和IOTP事务的信息

contents.text: o the Transaction Id Component (see section 3.3.1) which globally uniquely identifies the IOTP Transaction
contents.zh-CHS: o 全局唯一标识IOTP交易的交易Id组件（见第3.3.1节）

contents.text: o the following components of the TPO Block :
contents.zh-CHS: o TPO块的以下组件：

contents.text: - the Protocol Options Component, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 协议选项组件，以及

contents.text: - the Brand List Component
contents.zh-CHS: - 品牌列表组件

contents.text: - all the Organisation Components present
contents.zh-CHS: - 所有组织组成部分都在场

contents.text: o the following components of the Offer Response Block:
contents.zh-CHS: o 报价响应块的以下组件：

contents.text: - the Order Component
contents.zh-CHS: - 订单组件

contents.text: - all the Payment Components present
contents.zh-CHS: - 所有付款组件都存在

contents.text: - the Delivery Component if present
contents.zh-CHS: - 交付组件（如果存在）

contents.text: - any Trading Role Data Components present
contents.zh-CHS: - 存在任何交易角色数据组件

contents.text: 9.1.2.6 TPO and Offer Response IOTP Message
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1.2.6 TPO和提供响应IOTP消息

contents.text: The TPO and Offer Response IOTP Message is only used with a Brand Independent Offer Document Exchange. Apart from a Transaction Reference Block (see section 3.3), this message consists of:
contents.zh-CHS: TPO和报价响应IOTP消息仅用于品牌独立的报价文档交换。除交易参考块（见第3.3节）外，该信息包括：

contents.text: o a Trading Protocol Options Block (see section 8.1)
contents.zh-CHS: o 交易协议期权块（见第8.1节）

contents.text: o an Offer Response Block (see section 8.1) and
contents.zh-CHS: o 报价响应块（见第8.1节）和

contents.text: o an optional Signature Block (see section 8.16).
contents.zh-CHS: o 可选的签名块（见第8.16节）。

contents.text: TPO (TRADING PROTOCOL OPTIONS) BLOCK
contents.zh-CHS: TPO（交易协议期权）区块

contents.text: This is the same as the Trading Protocol Options Block described in TPO IOTP Message (see section 9.1.2.3).
contents.zh-CHS: 这与TPO IOTP消息中描述的交易协议选项块相同（见第9.1.2.3节）。

contents.text: OFFER RESPONSE BLOCK
contents.zh-CHS: 报价响应块

contents.text: This the same as the Offer Response Block in the Offer Response IOTP Message (see section 9.1.2.5).
contents.zh-CHS: 这与要约响应IOTP消息中的要约响应块相同（见第9.1.2.5节）。

contents.text: AUTHENTICATION STATUS
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证状态

contents.text: If the Offer Document Exchange was preceded by an Authentication Document Exchange, then the TPO and Offer Response IOTP Message may also contain an Authentication Status Block (see section 8.6).
contents.zh-CHS: 如果要约文件交换之前有身份验证文件交换，则TPO和要约响应IOTP消息也可能包含身份验证状态块（参见第8.6节）。

contents.text: SIGNATURE BLOCK
contents.zh-CHS: 签名块

contents.text: This is the same as the Signature Block in the Offer Response IOTP Message (see section 9.1.2.5) with the addition that:
contents.zh-CHS: 这与要约响应IOTP消息（见第9.1.2.5节）中的签名块相同，但增加了：

contents.text: o if the Offer Document Exchange is Brand Dependent then the Signature Component in the Signature Block additionally contains a Digest Element for the Brand Selection Component contained in the TPO Selection Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果报价文档交换依赖于品牌，则签名块中的签名组件还包含TPO选择块中包含的品牌选择组件的摘要元素

contents.text: o if the Offer Document Exchange was preceded by an Authentication Document Exchange then the Signature Component in the Signature Block additionally contains a Digest Element for the Authentication Status Block.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果要约文档交换之前有身份验证文档交换，则签名块中的签名组件还包含身份验证状态块的摘要元素。

contents.text: 9.1.3 Payment Document Exchange
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1.3 付款凭证交换

contents.text: The Payment Document Exchange is a direct implementation of the last part of a Payment Trading Exchange (see section 2.2.2) after the Brand has been selected by the Consumer. A Payment Exchange consists of:
contents.zh-CHS: 支付凭证交换是在消费者选择品牌后，直接实现支付交易交换的最后一部分（见第2.2.2节）。支付交换包括：

contents.text: o the Consumer requesting that a payment starts by generating Payment Request IOTP Message using information from previous IOTP Messages in the Transaction and then sending it to the Payment Handler
contents.zh-CHS: o 请求付款的消费者首先使用交易中以前的IOTP消息中的信息生成付款请求IOTP消息，然后将其发送给付款处理程序

contents.text: o the Payment Handler and the Consumer then swapping Payment Exchange IOTP Messages encapsulating payment protocol messages until the payment is complete, and finally
contents.zh-CHS: o 然后，支付处理程序和消费者交换支付交换IOTP消息，封装支付协议消息，直到支付完成，最后

contents.text: o the Payment Handler sending a Payment Response IOTP Message to the Consumer containing a receipt for the payment.
contents.zh-CHS: o 支付处理程序向消费者发送包含支付收据的支付响应IOTP消息。

contents.text: The IOTP Messages which are involved are illustrated by the diagram below.
contents.zh-CHS: 所涉及的IOTP消息如下图所示。

contents.text:
*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*
   Consumer
     |  Payment
     |  Handler
STEP |     |
 1.          Consumer generates Pay Request Block encapsulating a
             payment protocol message if required and sends to Payment
             Handler with the Signature Block if present

C --> P PAYMENT REQUEST. IotpMsg: Trans Ref Block; Signature
        Block (optional); Pay Request Block
2. Payment Handler processes Pay Request Block, checks optional signature and starts exchanging payment protocol messages encapsulated in a Pay Exchange Block, with the Consumer
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 支付处理程序处理支付请求块，检查可选签名，并开始与消费者交换封装在支付交换块中的支付协议消息

contents.text:
C <-> P PAYMENT EXCHANGE. IotpMsg: Trans Ref Block; Pay Exchange
        Block

3. Consumer and Payment Handler keep on exchanging Payment Exchange blocks until eventually payment protocol messages finish so Payment Handler creates a Pay Receipt Component inside a Pay Response Block, and an optional Signature Component inside a Signature Block, sends them to the Consumer and stops.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 消费者和支付处理程序继续交换支付交换块，直到最终支付协议消息完成，因此支付处理程序在支付响应块内创建支付收据组件，在签名块内创建可选签名组件，将其发送给消费者并停止。

contents.text:
C <-- P PAYMENT RESPONSE. IotpMsg: Trans Ref Block; Signature
        Block (optional); Pay Response Block

4. Consumer checks Payment Response is OK. Optionally keeps information on IOTP Transaction for record keeping purposes and either stops or creates the next IOTP message for the Transaction and sends it together with the Signature Block, if present, to the required Trading Role
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 消费者检查付款响应是否正常。可选地保留IOTP交易的信息以备记录，并停止或创建该交易的下一条IOTP消息，并将其与签名块（如果存在）一起发送给所需的交易角色

contents.text: Figure 21 Payment Document Exchange
contents.zh-CHS: 图21支付凭证交换

contents.text: 9.1.3.1 Message Processing Guidelines
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1.3.1 信息处理指南

contents.text: On receiving a Payment Request IOTP Message, the Payment Handler should check that they are authorised to carry out the Payment (see section 6 Digital Signatures). They may then either:
contents.zh-CHS: 收到付款请求IOTP消息后，付款处理人应检查其是否有权进行付款（参见第6节数字签名）。然后，他们可以：

contents.text: o generate and send a Payment Exchange IOTP Message back to the Consumer, if more payment protocol messages need to be exchanged, or
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果需要交换更多的支付协议消息，则生成支付交换IOTP消息并将其发送回消费者，或

contents.text: o generate and send a Payment Response IOTP Message if the exchange of payment protocol messages is complete, or
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果支付协议消息交换完成，则生成并发送支付响应IOTP消息，或

contents.text: o indicate failure to continue with the Payment by sending a Cancel Block back to the Consumer containing a Status Component with a StatusType of Payment, a ProcessState of Failed and the CompletionCode (see section 7.16.4) set to either: BrandNotSupp, CurrNotSupp, PaymtCancelled, AuthError, InsuffFunds, InstBrandInvalid, InstNotValid, BadInstrument or Unspecified.
contents.zh-CHS: o 通过向消费者发送一个取消块，该块包含一个状态组件，状态组件的状态类型为Payment，处理状态为Failed，并且完成代码（参见第7.16.4节）设置为：BrandNotSupp、CurrNotSupp、PaymtCancelled、AuthError、InsOffFunds、InstBrandInvalid、InstNotValid，仪器不良或未指明。

contents.text: On receiving a Payment Exchange IOTP Message, the Consumer may either:
contents.zh-CHS: 在收到支付交换IOTP消息时，消费者可以：

contents.text: o generate and send a Payment Exchange Message back to the Payment Handler or
contents.zh-CHS: o 生成支付交换消息并将其发送回支付处理程序或

contents.text: o indicate failure to continue with the Payment by sending a Cancel Block back to the Payment Handler containing a Status Component with a StatusType of Payment, a ProcessState of Failed and the CompletionCode (see section 7.16.2) set to either: ConsCancelled or Unspecified.
contents.zh-CHS: o 通过将取消块发送回包含状态组件的付款处理程序，指示继续付款失败，状态组件的状态类型为付款，处理状态为失败，并且完成代码（参见第7.16.2节）设置为：conscenecked或Unspecified。

contents.text: On receiving a Payment Exchange IOTP Message, the Payment Handler may either:
contents.zh-CHS: 在收到支付交换IOTP消息时，支付处理程序可以：

contents.text: o generate and send a Payment Exchange IOTP Message back to the Consumer, if more payment protocol messages need to be exchanged, or
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果需要交换更多的支付协议消息，则生成支付交换IOTP消息并将其发送回消费者，或

contents.text: o generate and send a Payment Response IOTP Message if the exchange of payment protocol messages is complete, or
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果支付协议消息交换完成，则生成并发送支付响应IOTP消息，或

contents.text: o indicate failure to continue with the Payment by sending a Cancel Block back to the Consumer containing a Status Component with a StatusType of Payment, a ProcessState of Failed and the CompletionCode (see section 7.16.2) set to either: PaymtCancelled or Unspecified.
contents.zh-CHS: o 通过向消费者发送一个取消块，该块包含一个状态组件，状态组件的状态类型为“付款”，处理状态为“失败”，并且完成代码（参见第7.16.2节）设置为“PaymtCancelled”或“Unspecified”，以指示未能继续付款。

contents.text: On receiving a Payment Response IOTP Message, the Consumer may either:
contents.zh-CHS: 在接收到付款响应IOTP消息时，消费者可以：

contents.text: o generate and send the next IOTP Message in the IOTP transaction and send it to the required Trading Role. This is dependent on the IOTP Transaction,
contents.zh-CHS: o 生成并发送IOTP事务中的下一条IOTP消息，并将其发送给所需的交易角色。这取决于IOTP交易，

contents.text: o stop, since the IOTP Transaction has ended, or
contents.zh-CHS: o 停止，因为IOTP事务已结束，或

contents.text: o indicate failure to continue with the IOTP Transaction by sending a Cancel Block back to the Merchant containing a Status Component with a StatusType of Payment, a ProcessState of Failed and the CompletionCode (see section 7.16.1) set to either: ConsCancelled or Unspecified.
contents.zh-CHS: o 通过将取消块发送回商户，指示无法继续IOTP交易，该商户包含状态组件，状态组件的状态类型为付款，处理状态为Failed，且完成代码（见第7.16.1节）设置为：conscelected或Unspecified。

contents.text: If the Consumer receives an IOTP Message containing a Cancel block, then the information contained in the IOTP Message should be reported to the Consumer but no further action taken.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果消费者收到包含取消块的IOTP消息，则应向消费者报告IOTP消息中包含的信息，但不采取进一步措施。

contents.text: If the Payment Handler receives an IOTP Message containing a Cancel block, then the Consumer is likely to go to the CancelNetLocn specified on the Trading Role Element in the Organisation Component for the Payment Handler from which any further action may take place.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果支付处理程序收到包含取消块的IOTP消息，则消费者可能会转到组织组件中交易角色元素上为支付处理程序指定的CancelNetLocn，从中可以执行任何进一步的操作。

contents.text: If the Merchant receives an IOTP Message containing a Cancel block, then the Consumer should have completed the payment but not continuing with the transaction for some reason. In this case the Consumer is likely to go to the CancelNetLocn specified on the Trading Role Element in the Organisation Component for the Merchant from which any further action may take place.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果商户收到包含取消块的IOTP消息，则消费者应已完成付款，但由于某种原因未继续交易。在这种情况下，消费者可能会前往商户组织组件中交易角色元素上指定的CancelNetLocn，从中可以采取任何进一步的行动。

contents.text: 9.1.3.2 Payment Request IOTP Message
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1.3.2 付款请求IOTP消息

contents.text: Apart from a Transaction Reference Block (see section 3.3), this message consists of:
contents.zh-CHS: 除交易参考块（见第3.3节）外，该信息包括：

contents.text: o a Payment Request Block, and
contents.zh-CHS: o 付款请求块，以及

contents.text: o an optional Signature Block
contents.zh-CHS: o 可选的签名块

contents.text: PAYMENT REQUEST BLOCK
contents.zh-CHS: 付款请求块

contents.text: The Payment Request Block (see section 8.7) contains:
contents.zh-CHS: 付款请求块（见第8.7节）包含：

contents.text: o the following components copied from the Offer Response Block from the preceding Offer Document Exchange:
contents.zh-CHS: o 从先前要约文档交换中的要约响应块复制的以下组件：

contents.text: - the Status Component
contents.zh-CHS: - 状态组件

contents.text: - the Payment Component for the payment which is being carried out
contents.zh-CHS: - 正在执行的付款的付款组件

contents.text: o the following components from the TPO Block:
contents.zh-CHS: o TPO块中的以下组件：

contents.text: - the Organisation Components with the roles of Merchant and for the PaymentHandler that is being sent the Payment Request Block
contents.zh-CHS: - 具有商户角色的组织组件，以及正在发送付款请求块的PaymentHandler

contents.text: - the Brand List Component for the payment, i.e. the Brand List referred to by the BrandListRef attribute on the Payment Component
contents.zh-CHS: - 支付的品牌列表组件，即支付组件上BrandListRef属性引用的品牌列表

contents.text: o one Brand Selection Component for the Brand List, i.e. the Brand Selection Component where BrandListRef attribute points to the Brand List. This component can be either:
contents.zh-CHS: o 品牌列表的一个品牌选择组件，即BrandListRef属性指向品牌列表的品牌选择组件。此组件可以是：

contents.text: - copied from the TPO Selection Block if the payment was preceded by a Brand Dependent Offer Document Exchange (see section 9.1.2.1), or
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果付款之前有品牌相关报价文件交换（见第9.1.2.1节），则从TPO选择块复制；或

contents.text: - created by the Consumer, containing the payment brand, payment protocol and currency/amount selected from the Brand List, if the payment was preceded by a Brand Independent Offer Document Exchange (see section 9.1.2.2)
contents.zh-CHS: - 由消费者创建，包含支付品牌、支付协议和从品牌列表中选择的货币/金额，前提是支付之前有品牌独立的报价文件交换（见第9.1.2.2节）

contents.text: o an optional Payment Scheme Component (see section 7.10) if required by the payment method used (see the Payment Method supplement to determine if this is needed).
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果所使用的支付方法需要，可选的支付方案组件（参见第7.10节）（参见支付方法补充以确定是否需要）。

contents.text: o zero or more Trading Role Data Components (see section 7.17).
contents.zh-CHS: o 零个或多个交易角色数据组件（见第7.17节）。

contents.text: Note that:
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意：

contents.text: o if there is more than one Payment Components in an Offer Response Block, then the second payment is the one within the Offer Response Block that contains a StartAfter attribute (see section 7.9) that identifies the Payment Component for the first payment
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果要约响应块中有多个支付组件，则第二次支付是要约响应块中包含StartAfter属性（参见第7.9节）的支付组件，该属性标识第一次支付的支付组件

contents.text: o the Payment Handler to include is identified by the Brand Selection Component (see section 7.8) for the payment. Also see section 6.3.1 Check Request Block sent Correct Organisation for an explanation on how Payment Handlers are identified
contents.zh-CHS: o 要包含的支付处理程序由支付的品牌选择组件（见第7.8节）标识。另请参见第6.3.1节“检查请求块发送至正确的组织”，了解如何识别支付处理人的说明

contents.text: o the Brand List Component to include is the one identified by the BrandListRef attribute of the Payment Component for the identified payment
contents.zh-CHS: o 要包括的品牌列表组件是由已标识付款的付款组件的BrandListRef属性标识的组件

contents.text: o the Brand Selection Component to include from the Offer Response Block is the one that contains an BrandListRef attribute (see section 3.5) which identifies the Brand List Component for the second payment.
contents.zh-CHS: o 要从报价响应块中包括的品牌选择组件是包含BrandListRef属性（参见第3.5节）的组件，该属性标识第二次付款的品牌列表组件。

contents.text: SIGNATURE BLOCK (PAYMENT REQUEST)
contents.zh-CHS: 签名栏（付款请求）

contents.text: If the either the preceding Offer Document Exchange included an Offer Response Signature (see section 9.1.2.5 Offer Response IOTP Message), or a preceding Payment Exchange included a Payment Response Signature
contents.zh-CHS: 如果先前的要约文件交换包含要约响应签名（见第9.1.2.5节要约响应IOTP消息），或先前的支付交换包含支付响应签名

contents.text: (see section 9.1.3.4 Payment Response IOTP Message) then they should both be copied to the Signature Block in the Payment Request IOTP Message.
contents.zh-CHS: （参见第9.1.3.4节付款响应IOTP消息）然后，它们都应复制到付款请求IOTP消息中的签名块。

contents.text: 9.1.3.3 Payment Exchange IOTP Message
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1.3.3 支付交换IOTP消息
